title: Blueprint for a Self-Learning Organization: Codifying Thought Processes with AI

detail.abstract: This paper discusses a fundamental challenge in applying AI to management. For the foundational management model "Quartet Model" and the AI architecture proposed in prior research to function effectively, the "quality" of the input data is of decisive importance. While many digital transformation (DX) initiatives stop at digitizing results such as procedural manuals, this paper argues that the key to maximizing AI's potential lies in the "thought processes" that form the core of veteran employees' tacit knowledge. Focusing on Japanese companies facing structural issues in skill transfer, it highlights the severity of problems like individualized craftsmanship and the disruption of its succession. The paper then proposes a concrete framework for efficiently collecting and accumulating these thought processes-which have traditionally been difficult to codify-by embedding generative AI into on-the-job training (OJT) and daily operations. This approach suggests the possibility of building a new symbiotic relationship between humans and AI, evolving organizations from static machines into "self-learning organizations," thereby transforming work styles in an era of population decline and enabling the visualization of new forms of corporate value, including organizational culture.

AI.tldr: 论文探讨了AI在管理中应用的核心挑战，指出输入数据质量对管理模型和AI架构至关重要。针对日本企业技能传承的结构性问题，提出通过将生成式AI嵌入OJT和日常运营来收集和积累传统难以编码的思维过程，构建人机共生关系，打造自学习型组织。
AI.research_question: 如何有效收集和积累资深员工隐性知识中的思维过程，以最大化AI在管理中的应用潜力？
AI.motivation: 日本企业面临技能传承的结构性问题，如个体化工匠技艺和传承中断，而许多数字化转型仅停留在结果数字化，未能捕捉核心思维过程。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Quartet Model管理模型和AI架构理论，强调输入数据质量的决定性作用，提出人机共生和自学习型组织理论框架。
AI.method: 提出将生成式AI嵌入到在岗培训(OJT)和日常运营中的具体框架，用于高效收集和积累传统难以编码的思维过程。
AI.findings: 通过该方法可以构建新的人机共生关系，使组织从静态机器演变为自学习型组织，实现工作方式转型和企业价值可视化。
AI.theory_contributions: 发展了人机共生理论，提出了自学习型组织的新概念，拓展了隐性知识编码和传承的理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为解决人口减少时代的工作方式转型提供具体方案，为企业文化等新型企业价值的可视化提供实践路径，助力日本企业应对技能传承挑战。

title: Human vs. Virtual Streamers in Live-Streaming Commerce: How Attachment Style Influences Purchase Intention
affiliations: University Putra Malaysia - Putra Business School, City University of Macau, University Putra Malaysia - Putra Business School and Chongqing University of Science and Technology

detail.title: Human vs. Virtual Streamers in Live-Streaming Commerce: How Attachment Style Influences Purchase Intention
detail.abstract: The growing popularity of virtual streamers has greatly influenced live-stream shopping; however, few studies have examined how consumer psychological traits impact purchasing decisions within this context. Given the importance of personal traits in shaping consumer behavior and their potential contribution to personalized marketing strategies, this study investigates the effects of attachment styles (anxious and avoidant) on purchase intention, mediated by social anxiety and social presence. It exmines whether streamer type (virtual vs. human) moderates these relationships. Attachment styles were chosen as the focus due to the highly interactive and emotionally driven nature of live-streaming commerce, which is known to influence social interactions and emotional engagement. Two experimental studies reveal that both attachment avoidance and anxiety increase social anxiety, which subsequently reduces perceived social presence and purchase intention. Notably, these effects persist regardless of streamer type (virtual vs. human). The results of this work extend attachment theory to live-streaming contexts, deepen the understanding of consumer psychology in digital retailing, and offer insightful implications for live-streaming commerce practices.

AI.tldr: 这篇论文通过两个实验研究探索了附着风格（焦虑垂和避免垂）如何通过社交焦虑和社交存在感影响直播购物意向，并考察主播类型（虚拟vs人类）的调节作用。结果显示附着避免和焦虑都会增加社交焦虑，降低社交存在感和购买意向，且这些效应不受主播类型影响。
AI.research_question: 附着风格（焦虑垂和避免垂）如何影响消费者在直播购物中的购买意向？社交焦虑和社交存在感在其中起什么作用？主播类型（虚拟vs人类）是否调节这些关系？
AI.motivation: 虚拟主播的日益普及很大程度影响了直播购物，但少有研究考察消费者心理特质在这一背景下对购买决策的影响。个人特质对于形成消费行为和个性化营销策略的重要性是研究的动国。
AI.theoretical_framework: 附着理论（Attachment Theory），重点关注焦虑垂附着和避免垂附着两种附着风格。社交焦虑理论和社交存在理论作为中介机制。
AI.method: 两个实验研究，使用实验法来测试附着风格对购买意向的影响，以及社交焦虑和社交存在感的中介作用，同时考察主播类型的调节效应。
AI.findings: 附着避免和焦虑都会增加社交焦虑，而社交焦虑会降低社交存在感和购买意向。这些效应在虚拟主播和人类主播情况下都持续存在，主播类型并不调节这些关系。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了附着理论在直播商务情境下的应用，深化了对数字零售中消费者心理学的理解，为附着风格在新兴商业模式中的作用提供了理论支撑。
AI.practical_contributions: 为直播商务实践提供了深刻的启示，帮助业界更好地理解不同附着风格消费者的需求和行为特征，以开发更有效的个性化营销策略。

title: An Efficient Database-Driven School Management System for Streamlining Attendance Tracking and Administration
affiliations: University of Cyberjaya,  University of Cyberjaya and  University of Cyberjaya

detail.title: An Efficient Database-Driven School Management System for Streamlining Attendance Tracking and Administration

declarations.declarationOfInterest: No personal or financial relationship with other people or organizations that may have or could be perceived to have influenced this study.
declarations.ethicsApproval: No patient/participants involve.
declarations.funderStatement: Research not funded.

detail.abstract: Traditional, paper-based attendance management methods in schools are often timeconsuming, prone to human error, and susceptible to fraud. While many modern solutions utilize advanced technologies like biometrics or RFID, they can be costly and technically complex, making them inaccessible for many institutions. This project introduces a streamlined, database-driven School Management System (SMS) designed to address these challenges by providing an affordable and scalable solution for attendance tracking. By leveraging a PostgreSQL database, the system automates attendance recording and generates real-time reports, which helps reduce administrative work and minimizes manual errors. The system's design focuses on four main user roles Admin, Teacher, Student, and Parent with customized dashboards and permissions to ensure usability and data security. A systematic literature review and various testing phases, including unit and acceptance testing, were conducted to ensure the system's reliability and efficiency. The results demonstrate that this approach offers a practical, cost-effective alternative to traditional and expensive hardwaredependent systems, contributing to improved institutional efficiency and data-driven decisionmaking in education.

AI.tldr: 这篇论文提出了一种基于PostgreSQL数据库的学校管理系统，通过自动化考勤管理和实时报告功能，为教育机构提供了一种成本效益高的传统考勤管理方案的替代方案。
AI.research_question: 如何开发一种成本效益高、易于使用的学校考勤管理系统，以替代传统的纸质考勤记录和费用较高的硬件依赖系统？
AI.motivation: 传统的纸质考勤管理方法耗时易错，且容易出现欺诈；而现代生物识别或RFID等技术方案成本高、技术复杂，让许多教育机构无法承受。
AI.theoretical_framework: 系统设计基于数据库驱动架构和角色基于权限管理理论，通过PostgreSQL数据库实现数据自动化处理和实时报告生成。
AI.method: 进行系统性文献综述，开发包含四个主要用户角色（管理员、教师、学生、家长）的系统，并通过单元测试和接受测试确保系统的可靠性和效率。
AI.findings: 该系统提供了一种实用、成本效益高的替代方案，能够有效减少行政工作量、最小化手工错误，并支持基于数据的教育决策。
AI.theory_contributions: 论文在教育信息化领域提供了一种基于开源数据库技术的实用系统设计案例，为低成本教育管理系统开发提供了理论参考。
AI.practical_contributions: 开发的系统为学校和教育机构提供了一种可扩展、易于部署的考勤管理解决方案，有助于提高机构运作效率和数据利用率。

title: Research on Multi-Level Container Security Isolation Operation Strategy Based on Static Game
affiliations: Beijing Jiaotong University, Beijing Jiaotong University, Beijing Jiaotong University and Beijing Jiaotong University

detail.title: Research on Multi-Level Container Security Isolation Operation Strategy Based on Static Game
detail.abstract: With the increasing pressure on rail transit passenger services, the introduction of cloud-edge collaborative computing technology into passenger service systems has emerged as a research hotspot in recent years. The key issue in applying cloud computing to passenger service systems lies in enhancing the security and reliability of containers within cloud computing environments. Since passenger service systems operate in open network environments, they are exposed to numerous security vulnerabilities and malicious cyber-attacks, potentially leading to system crashes or the leakage of critical data. To mitigate the severe impacts of such attacks, effective container security isolation policies must be implemented. Firstly, a multi-level container security isolation model is proposed, along with the design of rules for configuring model security policies. Subsequently, a static game model is utilized to dynamically adjust optimal security strategies. By integrating the wolf pack algorithm with the co-evolution algorithm, a wolf pack-co-evolution algorithm is devised to ascertain the optimal solution for the static game, thereby determining the optimal security strategy. Finally, simulation experiments demonstrate that the wolf pack-co-evolution algorithm can effectively solve for the Nash equilibrium in the multi-level container security isolation static game model, enabling dynamic adjustments to be made to security strategies. This approach ensures the security of both container subjects and objects while enhancing container computing efficiency.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于狼群协同进化算法的多层容器安全隔离模型，通过静态博弈动态调整最优安全策略，有效提升云计算环境下容器的安全性和计算效率。
AI.research_question: 如何在云计算环境中实现有效的容器安全隔离，以应对开放网络环境中的安全威胁和恶意攻击？
AI.motivation: 随着轨道交通客运服务压力的增加，云边协同计算技术在客运服务系统中的应用成为研究热点，但开放网络环境中的安全漏洞和网络攻击威胁系统安全。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于多层容器安全隔离模型和静态博弈理论，结合安全策略配置规则设计。
AI.method: 提出多层容器安全隔离模型，设计安全策略配置规则，利用静态博弈模型动态调整安全策略，开发狼群-协同进化算法求解博弈最优解。
AI.findings: 仿真实验表明，狼群-协同进化算法能有效求解多层容器安全隔离静态博弈模型的纳什均衡，实现安全策略的动态调整。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了结合狼群算法和协同进化算法的混合优化方法，为容器安全隔离提供了新的理论解决方案。
AI.practical_contributions: 该方法能确保容器主体和客体的安全，同时提高容器计算效率，可应用于轨道交通客运服务系统等实际场景。

title: Do Product Market Threats affect the Leasing Decision?
affiliations: University of Queensland - Business School, University of Queensland, New Mexico State University and Macquarie University

detail.title: Do Product Market Threats affect the Leasing Decision?
detail.abstract: We examine the impact of product market threats on firms' leasing decisions. Using fluidity as a measure of these threats, our analysis shows that product market threats significantly increase firms' reliance on leases. This effect is more pronounced for firms with greater financial constraints, cash-flow volatility, predation and obsolescence risk, information asymmetries, and weak corporate governance. We also show that the economic benefits of leasing to counter competitive threats are substantial and diverse, including capturing growth, maintaining profitability, and mitigating inefficient capital allocation. These findings suggest that firms strategically use leasing as a defense mechanism against product market threats.

AI.tldr: 产品市场竞争威胁显著增加企业对租赁的依赖，特别是财务约束大、现金流波动大、信息不对称和治理弱的企业，租赁作为防御机制带来增长、盈利和资本配置效率等多重经济收益
AI.research_question: 产品市场竞争威胁如何影响企业的租赁决策？
AI.motivation: 探讨企业如何通过租赁策略应对产品市场竞争压力，特别是在面临财务约束和信息不对称等挑战时的战略选择
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于代理理论、信息不对称理论和竞争战略理论，分析租赁作为应对竞争威胁的防御机制
AI.method: 使用流动性作为产品市场威胁的衡量指标，通过实证分析检验威胁与企业租赁决策的关系
AI.findings: 产品市场威胁显著增加企业租赁依赖度，对财务约束大、现金流波动大、信息不对称和治理弱的企业影响更明显，租赁带来增长、盈利和资本配置效率等多重收益
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了租赁决策理论，将产品市场竞争威胁纳入分析框架，揭示了租赁作为竞争防御机制的理论机制
AI.practical_contributions: 为企业管理者提供应对竞争威胁的租赁策略指导，帮助企业在竞争环境中优化资本配置和维持竞争优势

title: Undocumented Immigration & Crime in the United States: A Micro-Level Analysis
affiliations: Charles University in Prague - Faculty of Law

detail.title: Undocumented Immigration & Crime in the United States: A Micro-Level Analysis
detail.abstract: This paper examines the relationship between undocumented immigration and crime using commercial property data covering approximately 16,000 migrant hotel rooms in New York City. I exploit the timing of migrant busing from the southern border as an exogenous source of variation in a difference-in-differences specification. I find that an additional 100 migrant shelter hotel rooms (per 100k Hispanics) are associated with 1.11 more Hispanic arrests (per 100k Hispanics) at the modified zip code-by-week level. Hypergranular estimates from a linear probability model reveal that arrestees within 500 meters of a migrant hotel are 1.9 percentage points (5.5% relative to the overall mean) more likely to be Hispanic in the post-treatment period. The baseline results are driven by cash-generating offenses-such as petit and grand larceny-and hinge on access to informal construction hiring hubs. Crime reporting, law enforcement activity, and media saliency do not appear to be significant factors.

AI.tldr: 本文通过差分中差分设计分析纽约市近万六千租房数据，发现无证件移民增加与西班牙语裂影响犯罪率上升相关，特别是为获取现金的相关犯罪，且依赖于非正式建筑聚聚地。
AI.research_question: 无证件移民是否以及如何影响地方犯罪水平？
AI.motivation: 理解无证件移民与犯罪关系的机制，以反馈相关政策制定。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于经济需求和就业机会的犯罪经济学理论，重点考察非正式市场对犯罪行为的影响。
AI.method: 利用纽约市近16,000个移民旅馆房间数据，采用差分中差分设计，以南部边境移民大巴车为外生冲击，进行空间粒度分析和线性概率模型估计。
AI.findings: 每增加100个移民旅馆房间（每10万西班牙语人口）对应增加1.11个西班牙语裂捕（每10万人）；移民旅馆500米内的裂捕者中西班牙语人口比例在处理后期高出1.9个百分点（5.5%）；效应主要来自现金相关犯罪，且依赖于非正式建筑聚聚地的近距离。
AI.theory_contributions: 为犯罪经济学提供了关于非正式就业机会与犯罪关系的实证支撑，强调了经济需求在移民犯罪问题中的中介作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 给政策制定者提供了有关无证件移民安置政策的实证基础，建议重点关注非正式就业市场的规范以降低犯罪风险。

title: Resilience and Adaptation: Assessing the Effects of COVID-19 on Hospital Efficiency and Quality
affiliations: York University - Schulich School of Business, York University - Schulich School of Business, York University - Schulich School of Business, University of Toronto - Department of Medicine and University of Toronto - Department of Medicine

detail.title: Resilience and Adaptation: Assessing the Effects of COVID-19 on Hospital Efficiency and Quality

declarations.declarationOfInterest: No conflict of interest.
declarations.funderStatement: Canadian Institutes of Health Research (CIHR).

detail.abstract: This study examines the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on hospital operations in Ontario, Canada. Using clinical and administrative data from 734,319 admissions across 20 hospitals between January 2018 and August 2021, we apply bootstrapped Data Envelopment Analysis (DEA) to operationalize three wellestablished measures of hospital performance: clinical efficiency, technical efficiency, and patient experience. DEA inputs reflect hospital capacity and resource levels, while outputs capture effectiveness across key service dimensions. We use the DEA scores as dependent variables in a Regression Discontinuity in Time model to estimate the immediate impact of the COVID-19 pandemic, and in an Interrupted Time Series analysis to assess long-term trends. Results indicate a sharp decline in all three efficiency metrics at the onset of the pandemic, with sustained negative effects. Multiple robustness checks confirm the consistency of these findings. To disentangle operational drivers from changes in patient acuity, we use Structural Equation Modeling to estimate the direct and indirect effects of the COVID-19 pandemic on outcomes such as hospital length-of-stay, mortality, ICU priority, and discharge destination. This is complemented by interviews with senior health leaders. Our findings identify a range of challenges and detail the operational changes hospitals adopted in response. Results show that changes to health outcomes appear to be as strongly associated with operational adjustments as to the direct effect of the pandemic. The analysis highlights opportunities for better coordination and broader sharing of best practices. Together, our results offer evidence-based recommendations to enhance hospital resilience and preparedness for future health crises.

AI.tldr: 这篇论文通过数据包绕分析和结构方程模型研究了COVID-19大流行对加拿大安大略省医院运营的即时和长期影响，发现病毒直接影响和运营调整都对医疗结果产生了重要影响，并提出了提高医院弹性和准备度的建议。
AI.research_question: COVID-19大流行对医院运营效率和病人体验产生了什么影响？运营调整在缓解病毒直接影响中发挥了什么作用？
AI.motivation: 理解COVID-19大流行对医疗系统的影响对于提高未来公共卫生危机应对能力至关重要，需要系统性评估病毒直接效应和医院运营调整的相对重要性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于数据包绕分析(DEA)的效率测量理论，结合断点时间回归(RDiT)和断点时间序列(ITS)分析方法，以及结构方程模型(SEM)来解构直接和间接效应。
AI.method: 采用20家医院2018年1月至2021年8月期间734,319例入院病例的临床和行政数据，使用贝叶斯统计数据包绕分析计算临床效率、技术效率和病人体验指标，然后通过断点回归和断点时间序列分析评估疫情影响，最后用结构方程模型分离病人患病严重程度变化的干扰。
AI.findings: 疫情爆发后所有效率指标都出现尽头下降，并持续恶化；健康结果的变化与医院运营调整的关联性不弱于病毒直接影响；调查发现了多种运营挑战和应对策略。
AI.theory_contributions: 提供了一种结合定量分析和定性调查的方法论案来分离公共卫生危机中病毒直接效应和组织调整间接效应的方法，丰富了医疗管理学在危机响应领域的理论基础。
AI.practical_contributions: 为医院管理者提供了具体的效率评估指标和分析方法，识别出关键的运营挑战和有效应对策略，提出了提高协调和最佳实践分享的建议，有助于增强医院对未来公共卫生危机的弹性和准备度。

title: Relational Frictions Along the Supply Chain: Evidence from Senegalese Traders
affiliations: Harvard University and Harvard University

detail.title: Relational Frictions Along the Supply Chain: Evidence from Senegalese Traders
detail.abstract: Search and trust frictions have historically made it hard for small firms in lower-income countries to buy inputs from foreign markets. The growth in smartphone ownership and social media usage has the potential to alleviate these barriers. Informed by a dynamic model of relational contracting, we run a field experiment leveraging these technological tools to provide exogenous variation in (1) search frictions and (2) trust frictions (adverse selection and moral hazard) in a large international import market. In the search treatment, we connect a randomly selected 80% of 1,862 small garment firms in Senegal to new suppliers in Türkiye. We then cross-randomize two trust treatments that provide additional information about the types (adverse selection) and incentives (moral hazard) of these new suppliers. Reducing search frictions is sufficient to increase access to foreign markets: in all treated groups, firms are 26% more likely to have the varieties a mystery shopper requests, and the goods sold are 30% more likely to be high quality. However, the trust treatments are necessary for longer-term effects: using both transaction-level mobile payments data and a follow-up survey, we show that these groups are significantly more likely to develop the connections into relationships that persist beyond the endline survey. These new relationships lead to increases in medium-run profit and sales. Finally, we use the treatment effects to estimate the model and counterfactually lower the trust frictions among the whole supplier pool for a given firm, finding that the largest gains come from alleviating adverse selection.

AI.tldr: 通过地理实验研究，发现减少搜索障碍能够提升塞内加小型服装企业获得国外供应商的可能性，但只有同时减少信任障碍才能建立长期稳定的供应链关系，其中解决逆向选择问题的效果最为显著。
AI.research_question: 智能手机和社交媒体的普及如何影响低收入国家小企业从国际市场购买输入品的搜索障碍和信任障碍？
AI.motivation: 历史上，搜索障碍和信任障碍使得低收入国家的小企业难以从国际市场购买输入品，智能手机和社交媒体的普及有可能缓解这些障碍。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于关系合约的动态模型，考虑逆向选择和道德风险等信任障碍。
AI.method: 在塞内加对1,862家小型服装企业进行地理实验：随机选择80%企业与土耳其新供应商建立联系（减少搜索障碍），并交叉随机提供供应商类型和激励机制信息（减少信任障碍）。
AI.findings: 减少搜索障碍可以提高获得国外供应商的可能性（+26%）和质量（+30%），但只有同时减少信任障碍才能建立长期稳定的供应链关系，并带来销售和利润增长。解决逆向选择问题的效果最为显著。
AI.theory_contributions: 通过实证验证了关系合约动态模型，重新定义了搜索障碍和信任障碍在国际贸易中的作用机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为低收入国家小企业提供了通过数字技术连接国际供应链的具体实践方法，并明确了解决逆向选择问题的优先性。

title: Economists Have No Defense: A Critical Review of National Defense in Economics Textbooks
affiliations: George Mason University

detail.title: Economists Have No Defense: A Critical Review of National Defense in Economics Textbooks

publicationDetails.detailsText: Journal of Private Enterprise, Volume 31 , Issue Winter 2016 ( (2016)) pp.65-83

detail.abstract: National defense is the textbook example of a public good. To understand how economists present public goods to undergraduates, we analyze fifty texts from across three widely taught        undergraduate economics courses: principles of economics, intermediate microeconomics, and public finance. We find that textbooks overwhelmingly present national defense as a public good and        rarely mention the possibility of government failure. This presentation leaves students with an incomplete and biased exposure to the government provision of public goods. We reconsider some        of the main assumptions associated with the standard treatment of national defense as the quintessential public good and discuss opportunities for educators to better prepare students as        economists and citizens. __________________________________________________________

AI.tldr: 经济学教科书将国防作为公共品的典型例子，但缺乏对政府失灾的讨论，导致学生获得偏见和不完整的知识。本文分析了三门经济学课程的50本教科书，重新考虑国防作为公共品的偏见假设，并提出教育改进建议。
AI.research_question: 经济学教科书如何向本科生呈现国防作为公共品的相关内容？这种呈现是否存在偏见和不完整性？
AI.motivation: 国防作为公共品的典型例子在经济学教育中广泛使用，但现有教科书可能忽视了政府失灾等重要问题，导致学生形成不完整的认识。
AI.theoretical_framework: 公共品理论、政府失灾理论、教育经济学
AI.method: 内容分析法，对三门本科经济学课程（经济学原理、中级微观经济学、公共财政）的50本教科书进行系统分析
AI.findings: 教科书绝大多数将国防呈现为公共品，很少提及政府失灾的可能性，导致学生获得偏见和不完整的知识体系
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了经济学教育中对公共品理论呈现的批判性视角，完善了公共品理论的教育实践
AI.practical_contributions: 为经济学教育者提供了改进教学内容的建议，帮助学生作为经济学家和公民更好地理解政府供给公共品的复杂性

title: FDA Resilience after Loper Bright
affiliations: University of Missouri School of Law

detail.title: FDA Resilience after Loper Bright

contentType.other: law review article accepted for publication

detail.abstract:
This Article illustrates that Loper Bright may empower the U.S. Food and Drug Administration in unexpected ways. Loper Bright, which overruled the Chevron decision from 1984, tells us that a court should determine the meaning of all statutory provisions for itself — rather than deferring to the views of the federal agencies that implement those provisions. This Article grapples with the effect of the decision at FDA — one of the most important federal agencies, affecting the life of every person in the United States and regulating about a quarter of all consumer spending in the country, i.e., over $4 trillion annually. It makes three novel and potentially surprising claims, as follows.

First, the Chevron doctrine meant less to FDA than conventional wisdom supposes. Empirical studies of litigation during the Chevron years — one published by the author and one published by a different team — show that FDA often lost cases at “step one” of Chevron, after reviewing courts decided the agency’s statute clearly answered the question differently than the agency had. This Article also offers the first review of litigation against FDA in the decade before Chevron, finding that the agency generally prevailed in cases involving statutory interpretation even without Chevron in play. Indeed, with one possible exception, no case would have clearly come out differently after Chevron, i.e., none that FDA lost and that it unquestionably would have won after 1984.

Second, if Loper Bright and the formalist principles ascendant in the judiciary are understood properly, FDA should now win many cases that it would have won previously on the basis of Chevron deference. But the reasoning will be different. In many of these instances, the agency was not really interpreting its statute. Instead, it was engaged in policymaking. If FDA policymaking was authorized by Congress, judicial review — even after Loper Bright — remains deferential. Thus, some territory that agency defenders fear was lost with elimination of the Chevron framework will be regained if the agency persuades courts of its statutory authority to make discretionary calls. Scouring FDA’s statute for evidence of this authorization has not been a priority in the past, but this Article shows that the search may be surprisingly fruitful.
Finally, de novo review may yield new and surprising results, but not in the cases that people expect. The defeats should not stem from judicial interpretation of ambiguous statutory provisions as to which those courts would previously have deferred to FDA. Again, many of those agency actions should today be understood as policymaking. Instead, the surprises will come when courts review actual interpretations that have not been challenged previously. Some of FDA’s statutory interpretations are half a century old, or older, and experts in the field have simply internalized them, without realizing that federal judges coming to the issues cold will see things very differently. That said, regulated parties may decline to upset the apple cart. And the Court’s increasingly formalist Article III standing jurisprudence may limit the others who would seek to do so.
Scholars and others writing in health law and policy were almost uniformly alarmed by the Loper Bright certiorari grant and have continued to express concern that the decision will hamstring FDA. These concerns were overblown. FDA may be surprisingly resilient. This Article is meant to illustrate how it could defend itself and also offer ideas for other agencies that face challenge in the new era.

AI.tldr: 本文分析Loper Bright案推翻Chevron原则后对FDA的影响，指出FDA可能比预期更具韧性，通过重新定位其政策制定权而非法律解释权来适应新司法环境。
AI.research_question: Loper Bright案推翻Chevron原则后，对美国食品药品监督管理局（FDA）会产生什么样的实际影响？
AI.motivation: Loper Bright案是重大司法变革，推翻了40年的Chevron deference原则，而FDA作为监管美国四分之一消费支出（超4万亿美元）的重要机构，其受影响程度需要重新评估。
AI.theoretical_framework: 行政法理论、司法审查理论、Chevron deference原则、法律形式主义
AI.method: 实证研究（分析Chevron时期FDA诉讼案例）、历史比较（分析Chevron前十年FDA诉讼）、法律文本分析
AI.findings: 1) Chevron原则对FDA的实际意义被高估；2) Loper Bright后FDA可通过证明政策制定权而非法律解释权来赢得案件；3) 真正的挑战来自对陈旧法律解释的新司法审查
AI.theory_contributions: 重新评估司法 deference 理论在监管实践中的实际作用，提出政策制定权与法律解释权的区分框架
AI.practical_contributions: 为FDA和其他监管机构提供在新司法环境下的防御策略，指出应重点挖掘国会授权的政策制定权限

title: Housing Justice beyond Affordability: Systemic Inequalities Faced by Migrants with Moderate Economic Resources
affiliations: Institute for Inclusive Urban Development and Independent

detail.title: Housing Justice beyond Affordability: Systemic Inequalities Faced by Migrants with Moderate Economic Resources
detail.abstract: This study examines how skilled migrants with moderate economic resources could still face persistent barriers to adequate housing. While housing inequality research often centres on affordability, supply, and physical adequacy, these measures could overlook structural and powerbased mechanisms of inequality. Drawing on 13 in-depth interviews with migrant tenants and three with housing support practitioners, the study identifies four such mechanisms: informational asymmetry, inequities embedded in housing systems, discriminatory rental practices, and employerdominated housing arrangements. Using the capability approach, these are conceptualised as conversion factors that limit the transformation of financial resources into real opportunities to reside in ways they have reason to value. By grounding its analysis in lived experiences, the study makes the recognitional and power dimensions of housing justice more tangible and policy-relevant, offering empirically anchored concepts that can guide actionable agendas. The study contributes to advancing housing justice debates by demonstrating the need for extending the policy focus from distributing dwellings and subsidies to ensuring meaningful opportunities to adequate housing.

AI.tldr: 该研究探讨了中等经济资源的熟练移民在住房方面面临的持续性障碍，识别了信息不对称、住房系统不平等、歧视性租赁实践和雇主主导住房安排四种结构性机制，并提出了从分配住房转向确保有意义的住房机会的政策建议。
AI.research_question: 中等经济资源的熟练移民为何仍面临持续的住房障碍？这些障碍背后的结构性机制是什么？
AI.motivation: 现有住房不平等研究主要关注可负担性、供应和物理适宜性，但忽视了结构性和权力基础的不平等机制，需要更深入地理解移民住房障碍的本质。
AI.theoretical_framework: 能力方法（capability approach），将住房障碍概念化为限制财务资源转化为实际住房机会的转换因素。
AI.method: 质性研究方法，包括13个移民租户的深度访谈和3个住房支持从业者的访谈。
AI.findings: 识别了四种结构性障碍机制：信息不对称、住房系统内嵌的不平等、歧视性租赁实践、雇主主导的住房安排。
AI.theory_contributions: 通过能力方法框架将住房障碍概念化，使住房正义的认可性和权力维度更加具体化和政策相关。
AI.practical_contributions: 提供了实证基础的概念来指导可操作的政策议程，建议政策重点从分配住房和补贴转向确保有意义的住房机会。

title: Mental Barriers to Investing: Psychological Costs and Stock Market Participation
affiliations: University of Münster - Finance Center Muenster and University of Münster - Finance Center Münster

detail.title: Mental Barriers to Investing: Psychological Costs and Stock Market Participation
detail.abstract: This study examines how affective states, referring to individuals' mood, psychological condition, and ability to process uncertainty, influence household stock market participation. Using mental health data from the German SocioEconomic Panel (SOEP) as a proxy for affective states, we show that better mental health significantly increases the likelihood of stock ownership, while symptoms of depression and chronic worry reduce participation. Our estimates suggest that a one-standarddeviation improvement in overall mental health translates to approximately 120,000 stock market entering households annually in Germany. To address endogeneity, we exploit the COVID-19 pandemic as a natural experiment using a Difference-inDifferences Instrumental Variables (DiD-IV) approach. We find that individuals with weaker pre-crisis social networks experienced larger declines in mental health during the pandemic and are significantly less likely to become stockholders than those with stronger social ties. Conceptually, we identify three channels through which mental health affects financial decision-making: external beliefs (expectations about returns), internal beliefs (perceived capability to invest), and preferences (risk tolerance).

AI.tldr: 心理健康状况显著影响家庭股市参与，心理健康改善可增加约12万德国家庭进入股市，通过外部信念、内部信念和偏好三个渠道影响金融决策
AI.research_question: 情感状态（心理健康）如何影响家庭股市参与决策？
AI.motivation: 理解心理健康状况对家庭金融决策的影响，特别是股市参与这一重要投资行为
AI.theoretical_framework: 行为金融学、心理健康与决策理论，通过三个渠道：外部信念（收益预期）、内部信念（投资能力感知）和偏好（风险容忍度）
AI.method: 使用德国社会经济面板（SOEP）数据，采用双重差分工具变量（DiD-IV）方法，利用COVID-19疫情作为自然实验解决内生性问题
AI.findings: 更好的心理健康显著增加持股可能性，抑郁和慢性担忧症状降低参与度；疫情中社交网络较弱者心理健康下降更严重，成为股东的可能性更低
AI.theory_contributions: 识别心理健康影响金融决策的三个理论渠道，为行为金融学提供新的心理机制解释
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供改善心理健康以促进股市参与的实证依据，年均可增加约12万德国家庭进入股市

title: The Pass-Through Effect of Exchange Rate in the ECOWAS: Empirical Evidence from the ARDL Panel Model
affiliations: Université Cheikh Anta Diop (UCAD) - Economics Department

detail.title: The Pass-Through Effect of Exchange Rate in the ECOWAS: Empirical Evidence from the ARDL Panel Model

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The authors declare that they have no known competing financial interests or personal relationships that could have appeared to influence the work reported in this paper.
declarations.funderStatement: this working has not receive funding

contentType.other: This is an article for publication.

detail.abstract: The aim of this article is to assess the effect of the exchange rate, in relation to the type of exchange rate regime, on inflation rates in ECOWAS. To this end, we assess the impact of the exchange rate on inflation (ERPT) by distinguishing between countries with a fixed exchange rate regime (WAEMU and Cavbo Verde) and countries with a flexible exchange rate regime (WAMZ). Applying the ARDL panel model, the results obtained from estimating the ERPT show an incomplete pass-through effect for the ECOWAS countries, the UEMOA and Cabo-Verde countries and for the WAMZ countries. For fixed exchange rate countries, the exchange rate pass-through is positive and significant in the short term. In fact, a real appreciation of the exchange rate of 1% leads to an increase in the price level in the WAEMU and Cape Verde of 0.20% in the short term and 0.16% in the long term, which is not significant. For countries with a flexible exchange rate, the significant effect of the pass-through is noted in the short and long term. A 1% loss of competitiveness leads to inflation of 0.13% in the short term and disinflation of 0.8% in the long term.

AI.tldr: 本研究评估了西非国家经济共同体（ECOWAS）中汇率制度类型对汇率传递效应的影响，发现固定汇率制国家在短期有显著正向汇率传递，而浮动汇率制国家在短期和长期都有显著影响。
AI.research_question: 汇率制度类型如何影响西非国家经济共同体（ECOWAS）的汇率传递效应（ERPT）？
AI.motivation: 评估不同汇率制度下汇率变动对通货膨胀的影响，为ECOWAS国家的货币政策制定提供参考。
AI.theoretical_framework: 汇率传递理论（Exchange Rate Pass-Through, ERPT），区分固定汇率制（WAEMU和佛得角）与浮动汇率制（WAMZ）的经济体。
AI.method: 应用ARDL面板模型进行实证分析，估计不同汇率制度国家的汇率传递系数。
AI.findings: 1）ECOWAS国家整体存在不完全汇率传递；2）固定汇率制国家短期汇率传递显著正向（1%实际升值导致0.20%通胀）；3）浮动汇率制国家短期和长期都有显著影响（1%竞争力损失导致0.13%通胀和0.8%通缩）。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了汇率传递理论在发展中国家特别是非洲地区的实证证据，验证了汇率制度差异对传递效应的影响机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为ECOWAS国家货币政策制定者提供了汇率制度选择的重要参考，有助于更好地管理通货膨胀和汇率波动风险。

title: Health Shocks, Skills, and Labor Market Outcomes Before and After COVID-19
affiliations: Slippery Rock University

detail.title: Health Shocks, Skills, and Labor Market Outcomes Before and After COVID-19

declarations.declarationOfInterest: None.
declarations.ethicsApproval: Not applicable. This study relies exclusively on publicly available secondary data sources and did not involve the collection of new data from human subjects.
declarations.funderStatement: None.

detail.abstract: We examine how health shocks affect U.S. workers' labor-market outcomes from 2014 to 2023, comparing pre-and post-COVID periods and exploring heterogeneity by occupational skills and age. Using the 2014, 2018, 2020, and 2021 panels of the Survey of Income and Program Participation (SIPP), we estimate effects with difference-in-differences designs that combine matching and entropy-balancing weights, and we apply difference-in-differences causal forests to characterize treatment-effect heterogeneity. The adverse effects observed before COVID-19 —a 1.2-1.7 month reduction in employment and a 0.7-0.8 log-point decline in earnings—are no longer evident after COVID-19, with post-COVID estimates being small and statistically indistinguishable from zero. Heterogeneity analyses based on O*NET-derived skill indices (cognitive, interpersonal, manual) show that negative effects on employment, DI receipt, and monthly earnings increase with age and are attenuated for workers in cognitively or interpersonally demanding occupations. We find no evidence that health shocks lead to shifts toward less-manual occupations or increased enrollment in education or training. Occupational and industry switching rose after COVID-19 for all workers, with smaller differences between those experiencing health shocks and others, consistent with a more flexible post-pandemic labor market.

AI.tldr: 这篇论文研究了2014-2023年间健康冲击对美国劳动者就业和收入的影响，发现COVID-19前后存在显著差异，负面影响在疾病大流行后消失，且影响程度因年龄和职业技能类型而异。
AI.research_question: 健康冲击如何影响美国劳动者的劳动市场结果？COVID-19前后是否存在差异？不同职业技能类型和年龄组的异质性如何？
AI.motivation: 健康问题对劳动力市场的影响是重要的社会经济学议题，特别是在COVID-19大流行后，劳动市场环境发生了重大变化，需要重新评估健康冲击的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 以医学和健康经济学中的健康人力资本理论为基础，考虑健康状况对劳动力供给的影响，结合职业技能分类理论进行异质性分析。
AI.method: 使用2014、2018、2020和2021年SIPP数据，采用双重差分设计，结合匹配法和熵质平衡权重，并应用双重差分因果森林方法来描述治疗效果的异质性。
AI.findings: 1）COVID-19前健康冲击导致就业减少1.2-1.7个月，收入下降0.7-0.8对数百分点；2）COVID-19后这些负面影响消失；3）负面影响随年龄增加而增强，但在认知或人际技能要求高的职业中减弱；4）无证据显示健康冲击导致职业转向或教育培训增加；5）疾病大流行后所有劳动者的行业和职业切换增加，体现了更灵活的劳动力市场。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了健康人力资本理论在疾病大流行背景下的应用，提供了关于健康冲击影响随时间和职业技能类型变化的新见解，为理论模型添加了异质性元素。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了有关健康冲击影响的实证依据，特别是在疾病大流行后劳动力市场变化的情况下，对于设计有效的社会保障政策和劳动市场政策具有重要意义。

title: Impact of Climate-Finance on Economic Growth: Evidence from Panel Analysis
affiliations: Department of Economics, Rutgers University, New Brunswick, NJ 08901, USA

detail.title: Impact of Climate-Finance on Economic Growth: Evidence from Panel Analysis
detail.abstract: The paper examines the impact of climate finance on economic growth using a panel of four selected countries (China, Indonesia, Egypt, and Turkey). The findings reveal that climate-related expenditure contributes positively to economic growth irrespective of the models considered (pooled model, fixed effects or random effects models). Similarly, the result also shows that frequency of climate-related disasters has a positive impact on economic growth. However, population is found to negatively impact economic growth. The findings underscore the need to see climate finance beyond merely a response to environmental risks but as a catalyst for inclusive and resilient economic transformation.

AI.tldr: 气候金融对经济增长有积极影响，气候相关支出和灾害频率都促进经济增长，但人口增长对经济有负面影响
AI.research_question: 气候金融对经济增长的影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 探讨气候金融不仅作为环境风险应对措施，更作为包容性和韧性经济转型催化剂的作用
AI.theoretical_framework: 气候金融与经济增长关系理论，环境经济学理论
AI.method: 面板数据分析，使用混合模型、固定效应模型和随机效应模型分析四个国家（中国、印尼、埃及、土耳其）的数据
AI.findings: 1. 气候相关支出对经济增长有正向影响；2. 气候相关灾害频率对经济增长有正向影响；3. 人口对经济增长有负面影响
AI.theory_contributions: 拓展了气候金融理论，证明其不仅是环境风险管理工具，更是经济增长催化剂
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供依据，应将气候金融视为促进包容性和韧性经济转型的重要工具

title: Impact of Antibiotic Residues in Poultry Waste as Manure on Environmental Health and Bacterial Resistant Genes
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology, Ghana and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Impact of Antibiotic Residues in Poultry Waste as Manure on Environmental Health and Bacterial Resistant Genes
detail.abstract: Antibiotic resistance is a mounting global health crisis, with the environment emerging as a critical yet under-monitored reservoir for resistance development and transmission. In many low- and middle-income countries, the uncontrolled use of veterinary antibiotics in agriculture particularly in poultry farming has led to widespread contamination of ecosystems through untreated manure application. This study assessed the levels of antibiotic residues in poultry waste used as manure and their impact on microbial resistance and ecological risk in selected agricultural sites across Ghana. LC-MS/MS analysis confirmed high concentrations of ampicillin, tetracycline, neomycin sulfate, and sulfamethoxazole (6,025.4–8,460.4 µg/kg), while ecological risk assessments indicated a low-to-medium risk for species from tetracycline residues. Surveys with vegetable farmers highlighted limited awareness of antibiotic contamination and its risks. Bacteriological profiling showed total viable counts ranging from 2.5 × 105 to 4.1 × 1011 CFU/mL, with Escherichia coli detected in all samples. Antibiotic susceptibility testing revealed that 92% of bacterial isolates were resistant to ticarcillin–clavulanic acid and norfloxacin, while susceptibility to amikacin remained high. Multidrug resistance was evident in samples such as FMV1, where 50% of isolates exhibited resistance across multiple antibiotics. Alarmingly, 100% of surveyed vegetable farmers reported unawareness of antibiotic residues in manure and admitted to using poultry waste without any form of treatment. These findings highlight a critical environmental health threat posed by poultry manure and its role in perpetuating antimicrobial resistance.

AI.tldr: 这篇论文研究了加纳农业区鸡类红作为肉用胞的抗生素污染问题，发现高污染水平、广泛的抗药性和多药者性，而农民对此却很少知情。
AI.research_question: 鸡类红作为肉用胞中抗生素残留的水平如何；它们对微生物抗药性和生态风险产生了什么影响？
AI.motivation: 抗生素者性是全球急速严重的公共卫生危机，环境作为抗药性发育和传播的关键低监测储库。在许多低中收入国家，畜牧业中抗生素的无控使用导致生态系统污染。
AI.theoretical_framework: 环境抗生素者性学理论，农业污染物传播模型，生态风险评估框架。
AI.method: 采用LC-MS/MS分析抗生素残留水平，进行生态风险评估，对蔽菜农民进行调查，完成绝绝大部分学统计分析和抗生素敏感性测试。
AI.findings: 检测到高污染水平的胱尿苷、四环素、新霉素硫酸盐和磺甲恶唑（6,025.4-8,460.4µg/kg）；生态风险为低到中等；92%的细菌分离物对柯湿西林-克拉维酸和诺沙星抗药；50%的分离物显示多药者性；100%的农民不知道抗生素残留风险且不经处理使用鸡类红。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了环境抗生素者性学理论，为低中收入国家的农业抗药性传播模型提供了实证数据支撑。
AI.practical_contributions: 提醒政府和相关部门关注农业抗生素污染问题，建议加强农民抗生素知识宣传教育，建立监测体系。

title: The Impact of \Human Capital Development on the Under-5 Mortality Rate in South Africa Article in Applied Health Economics and Health Policy

detail.title: The Impact of \Human Capital Development on the Under-5 Mortality Rate in South Africa Article in Applied Health Economics and Health Policy

declarations.declarationOfInterest: There are not conflicts of interests.
declarations.funderStatement: No funding was obtained for the paper.

detail.abstract: While many scholars argue that education plays a significant role in promoting human capital development evidence suggest that South Africa's human capital index is relatively lower than other countries (0.4 in 2020) as the nation is still making strides in boosting its childhood environment and this is seen in its under-5 mortality rate (U5MR) which has increased enormously between 2020 and 2022 from 29 to 40 deaths per 1000 live births. The study examined the impact of human capital development on U5MR in South Africa using time series data spanning from 1994 to 2023. The Ordinary Least Squares (OLS) method was utilised to investigate the longrun correlation between U5MR and explanatory variables, namely female literacy(FL), health access and quality(HAQ), child immunization rate (CIR), access to improved sanitation and clean water (ISW) and prevalence of HIV/AIDS (POH) in South Africa. The analysis reveals that FL, HAQ and CIR have an insignificant correlation with U5MR. Furthermore, the analysis shows that there exists a positive correlation between ISW and U5MR and a negative correlation between POH and U5MR in the nation. This study, therefore, recommends the "start before conception and continue through the postpartum period" strategies by the health facilities to reduce under-5 mortality in local and international contexts.

AI.tldr: 这篇论文研究了南非人力资本发展对5岁以下儿童死亡率的影响，发现女性语文识字率、健康服务质量和儿童宜苗接种率与U5MR无显著相关，而改善环境卫生条件与U5MR呈正相关，艾滋病普及率与U5MR呈负相关

AI.method: 使用1994-2023年时间序列数据，采用普通最小二乘法(OLS)分析长期相关性，解释变量包括女性语文识字率、健康服务质量、儿童宜苗接种率、改善环境卫生条件和艾滋病普及率
AI.findings: 女性语文识字率、健康服务质量和儿童宜苗接种率与U5MR无显著相关；改善环境卫生条件与U5MR呈正相关；艾滋病普及率与U5MR呈负相关
AI.theory_contributions: 对人力资本理论在南非的适用性提供了实证支撑，发现了不同人力资本指标与儿童死亡率的特殊关系模式
AI.practical_contributions: 建议采用"如孕前开始并一直持续到产后期"的健康干预策略，为降低南非和国际儿童死亡率提供具体攻略

detail.title: How Do Private Firms Affect Collusion among Public Firms Driven by Common Institutional Ownership?

publicationDetails.detailsText: Kilts Center at Chicago Booth Marketing Data Center Paper
publicationDetails.journalName: Kilts Center at Chicago Booth Marketing Data Center Paper Series

detail.abstract: I examine, for the first time in the literature, whether the presence of private firms affects the relationship between common institutional ownership of public firms and their collusive behavior. Utilizing a comprehensive dataset from the NielsenIQ Retail Scanner Data, I analyze both the firm and firm-product-category levels to assess the impact of private firms’ market presence. I find that the effect of common ownership on a firm’s collusive behavior is more pronounced when private firms possess a relatively smaller market share. Exploiting the BlackRock-Barclays Global Investors merger as a quasi-natural experiment to examine the variations in common ownership, I find robust evidence supporting this key finding. Moreover, the effects are stronger in product categories with a lower elasticity of substitution or less fragmented market presence of private firms. My findings highlight the critical role of private firms in mitigating the potential for tacit collusion facilitated by common institutional investors among public firms.

AI.tldr: 本文首次研究私营企业存在如何影响公共企业共同机构所有权与其合谋行为之间的关系。研究发现，当私营企业市场份额较小时，共同所有权对企业合谋行为的影响更显著。

AI.motivation: 填补文献空白，首次探讨私营企业在共同机构所有权与公共企业合谋行为关系中的调节作用。
AI.theoretical_framework: 产业组织理论、共同所有权理论、合谋理论

AI.theory_contributions: 首次将私营企业纳入共同所有权与合谋行为关系的研究框架，拓展了相关理论边界
AI.practical_contributions: 揭示了私营企业在抑制公共企业间默契合谋中的关键作用，为监管机构和投资者提供了重要参考

title: From Micro to Macro: Can Machines Unlock New Real-Time Economic Signals from Firm-Level Accounting Data?
affiliations: Central University of Finance and Economics (CUFE) - School of Economics, Central University of Finance and Economics (CUFE) - School of Economics and Central University of Finance and Economics (CUFE) - School of Economics

detail.title: From Micro to Macro: Can Machines Unlock New Real-Time Economic Signals from Firm-Level Accounting Data?
detail.abstract: This paper investigates whether machines can unlock new real-time economic signals from firm-level accounting data. We develop the Firm-level Accounting data-based Machine Learning (FAML) framework, which applies machine learning algorithms directly to firm-level corporate financial reports to nowcast aggregate economic output. Unlike "aggregate-then-nowcast" approaches, which average firm-level variables into market or sector aggregates, or "factor-then-nowcast" methods, which extract common factors via dynamic factor models, our FAML method operates on the full set of firm-level accounting variables, retaining the informational detail embedded in firm-level heterogeneity and cross-firm interactions while minimizing information loss. Empirically, the FAML framework reduces root mean squared error by over 70% relative to a random walk benchmark and consistently outperforms both aggregation- and factor-based methods. Variable importance analysis further shows that accounting data from the industrials, utilities, and consumer discretionary sectors are particularly informative for economic output nowcasting. These findings underscore the value of leveraging machine learning to transform micro-level accounting data into timely macroeconomic insights.

AI.tldr: 本文开发了基于公司层面会计数据的机器学习框架(FAML)，直接利用企业财务报表进行宏观经济产出实时预测，相比传统方法显著提升了预测精度。
AI.research_question: 机器能否从公司层面会计数据中挖掘出新的实时经济信号？
AI.motivation: 传统宏观经济预测方法存在信息损失问题，需要探索如何更好地利用微观企业数据来提升预测准确性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于机器学习理论，特别是如何处理高维度和异质性数据的技术框架。
AI.method: 开发FAML框架，直接在公司层面会计数据上应用机器学习算法，避免先聚合或提取因子的信息损失。
AI.findings: FAML方法相比随机游走基准降低了70%以上的均方根误差，显著优于聚合方法和因子方法；工业、公用事业和可选消费品行业的会计数据对经济产出预测特别重要。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了直接从微观数据到宏观预测的新理论框架，突破了传统两步法的局限。
AI.practical_contributions: 为宏观经济预测提供了更准确、更及时的新方法，有助于政策制定者和投资者做出更好的决策。

title: Urban Water Supply System Performance Assesment: The Case of Alem Gena Town
affiliations: Addis Ababa University - Addis Ababa Institute of Technology

detail.title: Urban Water Supply System Performance Assesment: The Case of Alem Gena Town
detail.abstract: Intermittent water distribution is the key problems of many water authorities in developing countries including Ethiopia. Water demand has been increasing significantly in most cities due to population growth and other factors. As a result, town water utilities are struggling to provide customers with adequate and reliable water supply service in spite of obstacles which hinder water utilities not to provide the required service. This study assesses the performance of Alem Gena town water supply sub-system based on main performance indicators namely Demand and supply, water loss, water quality, customers satisfaction and operation and maintenance. These indicators have been cited the main factors which reflect the performance of many urban water supply systems. Highwater loss, customer complaints and operation and maintenance problems indicate that there are deficiencies on the quality of the service. To conduct this research, data of water production and consumption, water supply system data were obtained from the water utility records, other data not found in the water utility records is collected using instruments. Hydraulic performance of the system is also evaluated by modeling the system. Water quality tests were conducted and compared with the national and international standards. Household interviews were made to understand customers’ satisfaction towards the water supply. The result shows that water loss is 37.38% higher than the generally accepted value of 25%. There is a frequent interruption of boreholes. The water quality test shows some parameters departed from the standard set on the Ethiopian and WHO water quality guidelines. In addition, there is customer’s complaint towards continuous access of water. The operation and maintenance in the town is identified to be poor. In conclusion, the town’s water supply system is poor in managing water loss, water quality, operation and maintenance with the worst condition of continuous generation of water from sources continuously without interruption. It is recommended that the water utility develop a strategy and work hard on the indicated system deficiencies especially on operation and maintenance to improve the water supply system performance and provide customers with good quality service.

AI.tldr: 本研究评估了埃塞俄比亚Alem Gena镇供水子系统的性能，发现水损失率高达37.38%（超过25%的公认标准），存在频繁的井孔中断、水质参数不符合标准、客户投诉以及运维管理薄弱等问题。
AI.research_question: Alem Gena镇供水子系统的性能表现如何？主要存在哪些问题？
AI.motivation: 发展中国家城市供水系统普遍存在间歇性供水问题，水资源需求因人口增长等因素显著增加，供水企业难以提供充足可靠的服务。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于城市供水系统主要性能指标框架：供需平衡、水损失、水质、客户满意度和运维管理。
AI.method: 收集供水企业记录的生产和消费数据，使用仪器收集缺失数据，进行系统水力建模，开展水质测试并与国家标准对比，进行家庭访谈了解客户满意度。
AI.findings: 水损失率37.38%远超25%标准；井孔频繁中断；部分水质参数不符合埃塞俄比亚和WHO标准；客户对持续供水有投诉；运维管理状况较差。
AI.theory_contributions: 为发展中国家城市供水系统性能评估提供了实证研究案例，验证了主要性能指标框架的有效性。
AI.practical_contributions: 识别了具体系统缺陷，建议供水企业制定策略重点改善运维管理，提升供水系统性能和服务质量。

title: What Undermines Migrants' Right to Adequate Housing?: Inequality, Capabilities, and Barriers to Information and Belonging
affiliations: Institute for Inclusive Urban Development and Independent

detail.title: What Undermines Migrants' Right to Adequate Housing?: Inequality, Capabilities, and Barriers to Information and Belonging

declarations.funderStatement: This research was funded by the Seoul Housing Welfare Centre as part of the commissioned project ‘A Study on Securing Housing Rights for Marriage Migrants’

detail.abstract: Despite broad recognition of adequate housing as a human right, many migrants face persistent inequality in claiming and exercising this right. This paper presents what barriers constrain migrants' real opportunities-capabilities-to realise their right to adequate housing, with the case of marriage migrants in South Korea. Drawing on 15 in-depth interviews and co-produced with a grassroots migrant women's organisation, we identify two major categories of barriers: informational barriers that limit migrants' opportunities to access and act on housing-related knowledge, and institutional barriers to belonging, rooted in exclusionary assumptions about citizenship, family norms, and gendered roles. Both barriers reflect deeper structural inequalities shaped by intersecting forces of nationalism, racism, sexism, and familism. The findings contribute to housing justice discourse by highlighting the need to engage more fully with issues of relational inequality and recognition, beyond the distributive concerns around housing availability, affordability and spatial segregation. The study also illustrates how a capability-oriented analytical focus brings these dimensions to the forefront, offering a more human right-based lens on housing inequality and justice.

AI.tldr: 本文通过韩国婚姻移民案例，揭示了移民在实现适宜住房权时遇到的信息障碍和制度障碍，讨论了国家主义、种族主义、性别偏见和家族主义等结构性不平等问题。
AI.research_question: 什么障碍限制了移民实现适宜住房权的真正机会？
AI.motivation: 虽然适宜住房被认为是一种人权，但许多移民在声纳和实践这一权利时仍然面临持续的不平等。
AI.theoretical_framework: 能力方法论（capability approach），重点关注个体的真正机会和能力。
AI.method: 基于15个深度访谈，与基层移民妇女组织合作完成。
AI.findings: 识别出两类主要障碍：信息障碍（限制移民获取和利用住房知识的机会）和制度障碍（来自排外性公民观念、家庭规范和性别角色的归属障碍）。
AI.theory_contributions: 为住房正义讨论提供了更全面的视角，强调需要更充分关注关系性不平等和认可问题，而不仅仅是分配性问题。
AI.practical_contributions: 通过能力导向的分析视角，为住房不平等和正义问题提供了更基于人权的观点。

title: A Comparative Study of Journal Finder (JF) Systems' Effectiveness in Fulfilling Authors' Submission Requirements: Evidence from Elsevier, Sage, Brill, Springer, Taylor & Francis, MDPI, Wiley, and other Platforms

A comparative study of journal finder (JF) systems’ effectiveness in fulfilling authors’ submission requirements: Evidence from Elsevier, Sage, Brill, Springer, Taylor & Francis, MDPI, Wiley, JMIR, and other platforms. Science, Education and Innovations in the Context of Modern Problems, 8(10), 810–824. https://doi.org/10.56352/sei/8.10.72
declarations.funderStatement: There is no funder

detail.abstract: Research is a fundamental activity for faculty members, doctoral scholars, and undergraduate/postgraduate students, as well as a critical component in various university and institutional accreditation processes. To support the research community, many publishers have introduced Journal Finder services. This study evaluates the performance of selected Journal Finder platforms by using a predefined set of keywords from the information technology and data science domain to determine which service provides the most suitable journal recommendations. The chosen thematic focus, "distributed incremental clustering," belongs to broader fields such as machine learning, data mining, artificial intelligence, and computer engineering. Consequently, the findings are expected to benefit researchers working within this specific domain and related disciplines by offering a targeted list of relevant journals and their associated publication details, enabling quicker and more informed journal selection. The analysis demonstrates how Journal Finder tools can be used effectively by researchers who possess a preliminary article title, an abstract draft, and a set of keywords. In this context, we propose the term JournoMetrics to describe a consolidated approach for evaluating and comparing these services. Such a framework not only supports the identification of suitable journals but also addresses factors such as review timelines, acceptance rates, and thematic relevance, which are often decisive in journal selection.

AI.tldr: 这篇论文评估了多个期刊找到工具的性能，使用信息技术和数据科学领域的关键词来确定哪个服务能提供最合适的期刊推荐，并提出JournoMetrics框架来结合评估这些工具。
AI.research_question: 哪个期刊找到平台能够为信息技术和数据科学领域的研究者提供最合适的期刊推荐？
AI.motivation: 研究是教师、博士学者和本科/研究生的基本活动，也是大学和机构认证过程的关键组成部分。许多出版商推出了期刊找到服务，需要评估这些平台的性能。
AI.theoretical_framework: 研究基于期刊找到工具的性能评估理论，提出JournoMetrics框架来结合评估期刊推荐服务的多个维度。
AI.method: 使用预定义的信息技术和数据科学领域关键词集（特别是"分布式增量聚类"主题），对选定的期刊找到平台进行性能评估。
AI.findings: 分析显示了各种期刊找到工具的表现差异，以及如何有效利用这些工具来获得有针对性的相关期刊推荐和出版信息。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出JournoMetrics概念，为期刊找到工具的综合性评估提供了理论框架，包括审核时间线、接受率和主题相关性等关键因素。
AI.practical_contributions: 为信息技术和数据科学领域的研究者提供了有针对性的期刊选择指南，帮助研究者更快速、更明智地选择适合的发表期刊，提高研究效率。

title: Corporate Hierarchy
affiliations: Columbia University and Columbia University

detail.title: Corporate Hierarchy
detail.abstract: We introduce a novel measure of corporate hierarchies for over 2,500 U.S. public firms. This measure is obtained from online resumes of 16 million employees and a network estimation technique that allows us to identify hierarchical layers. Equipped with this measure, we document several facts about corporate hierarchies. Firms have on average ten hierarchical layers and a pyramidal organizational structure. More hierarchical firms have a more educated workforce, higher internal promotion rates, and longer employee tenure. Their operating performance is higher, but they face higher administrative costs. They are more active acquirers and produce more patents, but not higher-quality patents. They exhibit lower stock return volatility and more stable cash flows. We also examine how companies adjust their hierarchies in response to demand and knowledge shocks. We find that biotech companies increased their number of layers following the Covid-19 pandemic, while companies flattened their hierarchies following the adoption of artificial intelligence (AI) technologies. These findings are consistent with the theoretical predictions of existing models of corporate hierarchies.

AI.tldr: 本文开发了一种基于1600万员工在线简历的新企业层级度量方法，发现美国上市公司平均有10个层级，金字塔结构。层级多的企业员工教育水平更高、内部晋升率更高、任期更长，运营表现更好但行政成本更高，并购和专利活动更活跃但专利质量不高，股价波动和现金流更稳定。生物科技公司在疫情后增加层级，而AI技术采用后企业扁平化。
AI.research_question: 如何测量企业层级结构？企业层级结构与企业特征、绩效和市场表现有何关系？企业如何应对外部冲击调整层级结构？
AI.motivation: 现有研究缺乏对企业层级结构的系统性度量方法，无法深入分析层级结构对企业运营和市场表现的影响，以及企业如何动态调整层级结构应对环境变化。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于企业组织理论和层级结构理论，特别是信息处理、协调控制和激励机制等相关理论框架。
AI.method: 利用1600万员工的在线简历数据，通过网络估计技术识别企业层级层数，对2500多家美国上市公司进行横截面和动态分析。
AI.findings: 企业平均10个层级，呈金字塔结构；层级多的企业员工素质更高、内部晋升更多、任期更长；运营绩效更好但行政成本更高；并购和专利活动更活跃但专利质量不高；股价波动和现金流更稳定；生物科技公司疫情后增加层级，AI技术采用后企业扁平化。
AI.theory_contributions: 开发了新的企业层级度量方法，验证了现有层级理论模型的预测，为组织设计理论提供了实证支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 为企业管理者提供了层级结构设计的实证参考，帮助理解不同层级结构对运营绩效、创新活动和风险管理的实际影响。

title: Talent Without Borders Leading Across Cultures, Faiths, and Wounds
affiliations: Independent

detail.title: Talent Without Borders Leading Across Cultures, Faiths, and Wounds

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The author affirms that there exist no personal, financial, or professional affiliations with any entities or individuals that may have directly or indirectly influenced the design, execution, interpretation, or presentation of this research. This work was undertaken with complete intellectual independence, free from any conflicts of interest or external pressures that could compromise the objectivity and integrity of the study.
declarations.ethicsApproval: The research conducted did not involve human participants or animals and therefore did not necessitate approval from an ethics committee or institutional review board.
declarations.funderStatement: This study was carried out without any external financial backing. No individual, institution, or organization provided funding, ensuring full independence and integrity throughout the research process.

detail.abstract: In an increasingly interconnected yet fragmented world, the concept of "talent" must evolve beyond conventional frameworks of skill, productivity, and performance. This paper introduces a humanistic paradigm of borderless talent management-one that recognises the intricate interplay between culture, faith, and woundedness. Drawing on insights from intercultural leadership, trauma-informed organisational theory, and ethical inclusivity, the study argues that sustainable leadership in the 21 st century must transcend geographic, spiritual, and psychological barriers. The paper explores how historical traumas, inherited biases, and unacknowledged narratives continue to shape individual and collective potential. Ultimately, it proposes a model of leadership rooted not merely in tolerance, but in sacred stewardship, empathetic resonance, and the art of leading with presence. This inquiry is both a challenge and an invitation to leaders, educators, and institutions to see talent not as a resource to extract, but as a soul to honour.

AI.tldr: 这篇论文提出了一种人文主义的无边界人才管理范式，重视文化、信仰和心理伤痕对人才发展的深层影响，建议通过神圣管理、共情共鸣和在场领导来实现可持续领导力。
AI.research_question: 如何在全球化与分裂并存的世界中，构建一种能够越越地理、灵性和心理障碍的人文主义人才管理范式？
AI.motivation: 传统人才概念在当今互联互通但分裂的世界中已不能满足需求，需要重新考虑文化、信仰和心理伤痕等因素对人才发展的深层影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 跨文化领导力、创伤知识组织理论、以及道德包容性理论。
AI.method: 理论探讨和概念构建方法，分析历史伤痕、遗传偏见和未被承认的史述如何形成个体和集体潜能。
AI.findings: 可持续的21世纪领导力需要越越传统的技能、生产力和表现框架，建立在神圣管理、共情共鸣和在场领导的基础上。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了人文主义人才管理的新范式，扩展了对人才概念的理论理解，融合了跨文化领导、创伤知识组织和道德包容性的理论视角。
AI.practical_contributions: 为领导者、教育工作者和机构提供了一种将人才视为需要尊重的灵魂而非只是提取资源的实践框架，促进更包容和可持续的领导方式。

title: Beyond Opt-Out: How Presumed-Consent Language Shapes Persuasion
affiliations: Erasmus University, Rotterdam School of Management, EDHEC Business School and Erasmus University Rotterdam (EUR) - Department of Marketing Management

detail.title: Beyond Opt-Out: How Presumed-Consent Language Shapes Persuasion
detail.abstract: When using opt-out (vs. opt-in) policies, choice architects presume that people consent, rather than explicitly asking them to state their consent. While opt-out policies often increase compliance, they are also associated with managerial issues such as ethical considerations, legal regulations, limited public support, and increased no-show rates. This research demonstrates that choice architects can also establish presumed consent through the language they use, holding the opt-in policy constant. Seven studies in various health domains indicate that presumed-consent language (e.g., “a vaccine was arranged for you”), rather than explicit-consent language (e.g., “you can choose to get a vaccine”), increases persuasion (i.e., behavioral intentions and actual behaviors). This effect occurs through perceived endorsement: Decision-makers infer through the presumed-consent language that the desired health behavior (e.g., vaccination) is the recommended course of action. Furthermore, this research examines the proposed endorsement process under various conditions. When product tangibility is low (e.g., a flu shot), the effectiveness of presumed-consent language stems primarily from perceived endorsement rather than psychological ownership or perceived ease. In contrast, when product tangibility is high (e.g., a sunscreen lotion), the effect stems primarily from psychological ownership rather than perceived endorsement or perceived ease.

AI.tldr: 研究表明，通过使用推定同意语言（如"为您安排了疫苗"）而非明确同意语言（如"您可以选择接种疫苗"），可以在保持选择加入政策不变的情况下提高说服效果，这种效果通过感知认可机制实现，且在不同产品有形性条件下作用机制不同。
AI.research_question: 选择架构师如何通过语言表达方式建立推定同意，从而影响健康行为的说服效果？
AI.motivation: 虽然选择退出政策能提高合规率，但存在伦理、法律、公众支持度低和缺席率高等管理问题，需要探索在保持选择加入政策的同时提高说服效果的方法。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于选择架构理论和推定同意理论，探讨语言表达对行为决策的影响机制。
AI.method: 在多个健康领域进行了七项研究，测量行为意向和实际行为，检验感知认可、心理所有权和感知易用性等中介机制。
AI.findings: 推定同意语言比明确同意语言更能提高说服效果；低有形性产品主要通过感知认可机制，高有形性产品主要通过心理所有权机制。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了语言表达建立推定同意的机制，拓展了选择架构理论的应用边界，明确了不同产品特性下作用机制的差异。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和健康促进者提供了在不改变选择政策的前提下，通过语言优化提高行为依从性的实用策略。

title: A Decentralized Liquidity Architecture for the Global Financial System: Tokenized Buffers and Non-Enforceable Collateral Management
affiliations: Independent Researcher – Monetary & Market Plumbing

detail.title: A Decentralized Liquidity Architecture for the Global Financial System: Tokenized Buffers and Non-Enforceable Collateral Management

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The author declares no conflicts of interest related to this research.
declarations.ethicsApproval: Not applicable. This study does not involve human participants or animal subjects.
declarations.funderStatement: This research received no specific grant from any funding agency in the public, commercial, or not-for-profit sectors.

detail.abstract: This paper proposes a structural redesign of global liquidity access through a decentralized system of mutualized tokenized collateral buffers, managed under algorithmic governance and covenants programmed into smart contracts. The model replaces individual collateral enforcement with a framework of systemic haircuts and proportional adjustments, eliminating the need for forced liquidations and allowing functional liquidity to be maintained even in the face of partial deterioration of underlying assets. The architecture redefines stablecoins as an endogenous, mutualized cash-forcollateral swap, in which issued tokens represent continuous access rights to the collective value of the buffer rather than ownership claims over specific assets. This creates a parallel infrastructure that acts as a pressure-release valve for dealer and other intermediary balance sheets, easing stress in repo markets, FX swaps, and crosscurrency swaps, and reducing the risk of market dislocations during periods of tension. The system is inclusive and neutral: it enables participants across multiple jurisdictions-including those without access to central bank reserves or swap lines-to post eligible collateral and receive liquidity in the form of tokens, without reliance on political agreements. It is also compatible with the integration of private credit markets, DLT infrastructures, and real asset tokenization processes, thereby facilitating interoperability with the traditional financial system.

AI.tldr: 本文提出通过去中心化的互助化货币化抵押缓冲系统，重构全球流动性访问机制，取代伪强制清算，维持功能性流动性。
AI.research_question: 如何通过去中心化算法治理和智能合约构建互助化货币化抵押系统，以解决传统金融系统的流动性风险问题？
AI.motivation: 传统金融系统在压力期间存在强制清算、市场失调风险，且访问流动性的政治间障和地域限制。
AI.theoretical_framework: 去中心化金融理论、智能合约算法治理、系统性风险管理和货币化资产理论。
AI.method: 设计结构性重构方案，通过算法治理和编程息约管理互助化货币化抵押缓冲区，实现系统性减值和比例调整机制。
AI.findings: 该模型能够消除强制清算需求，维持功能性流动性，缓解代理商和中介机构的平衡表压力，降低市场失调风险。
AI.theory_contributions: 重新定义稳定币为内生性互助化现金-抵押兑换机制，为去中心化金融体系提供理论基础。
AI.practical_contributions: 建立包容性、中立的平行基础设施，支持多资产、多法征参与者，促进私人信贷市场、DLT基础设施和传统金融系统的互操性。

title: Securities Law Enforcement and Credible Deterrence: Lessons for India from the United States and Singapore
affiliations: Jagran Lakecity University

detail.title: Securities Law Enforcement and Credible Deterrence: Lessons for India from the United States and Singapore
detail.abstract: This study undertakes a comparative examination of securities law enforcement frameworks in India, the United States, and Singapore, focusing on the structural allocation of power, procedural mechanisms, and interagency coordination. This study observes that, while the United States adopts a parallel investigation model, where the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and the Department of Justice (DOJ) conduct independent yet coordinated proceedings, Singapore employs a joint investigation framework integrating the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) and the Commercial Affairs Department (CAD) to ensure procedural fairness and transparency. By contrast, India centralizes investigative, adjudicative, and prosecutorial powers within the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI), a model that raises concerns regarding functional overlap, procedural efficiency, and the perception of impartiality. Drawing on statutory provisions, case law, regulatory manuals, and policy reports, this study identifies the critical enforcement gaps in India's current framework. Emphasis is placed on the evidentiary standard required to establish violations, absence of structured inter-agency cooperation, and limited adoption of global enforcement best practices. The analysis situates these shortcomings against the principles of credible deterrence articulated by the International Organization of Securities Commissions (IOSCO), arguing that without institutional separation of functions and strengthened coordination between civil and criminal enforcement authorities, India's capacity to address market misconduct will remain constrained.

AI.tldr: 本研究比较了印度、美国和新加坡的证券执法框架，发现美国采用平行调查模式，新加坡采用联合调查框架，而印度将调查、裁决和起诉权集中在一个机构SEBI，存在功能重叠、程序效率和公正性等问题。
AI.research_question: 印度、美国和新加坡证券执法框架的结构性权力分配、程序机制和机构间协调有何差异？
AI.motivation: 分析不同国家证券执法框架的优缺点，识别印度现行框架中的执法差距，为改进印度证券执法体系提供参考。
AI.theoretical_framework: 国际证券委员会组织（IOSCO）提出的可信威慑原则，强调机构功能分离和民事刑事执法机构协调的重要性。
AI.method: 比较研究方法，基于法规条款、判例法、监管手册和政策报告，分析三国证券执法框架的结构和程序机制。
AI.findings: 美国SEC和DOJ采用平行调查模式，新加坡MAS和CAD采用联合调查框架，印度SEBI集中三权于一身，存在功能重叠、程序效率和公正性担忧。
AI.theory_contributions: 为证券执法框架的比较研究提供理论分析，验证IOSCO可信威慑原则在不同制度环境下的适用性。
AI.practical_contributions: 识别印度证券执法框架的关键缺陷，提出需要机构功能分离和加强民事刑事执法协调的建议，为印度监管改革提供实践指导。

title: Omnichannel Fulfillment Optimization Using Quantum-Informed and Simulation-Based Routing Analytics: Integrating Demand, Location, Cost, and Capacity
affiliations: Independent Researcher

detail.title: Omnichannel Fulfillment Optimization Using Quantum-Informed and Simulation-Based Routing Analytics: Integrating Demand, Location, Cost, and Capacity

keywords: Omnichannel Fulfillment Optimization Using Quantum-Informed and Simulation-Based Routing Analytics: Integrating Demand

detail.abstract: The relentless growth of omnichannel retail, demanding seamless integration of online and physical channels, has rendered traditional fulfillment models inadequate. Optimizing shipfrom-store (SFS), Buy Online Pick Up In-Store (BOPIS), and Distribution Center (DC) allocation under dynamic constraints requires sophisticated analytics. This research paper presents a comprehensive framework leveraging quantum-informed algorithms and simulation-based analytics for routing optimization within omnichannel fulfillment networks. We integrate multi-source data (demand forecasts, geospatial locations, operational costs, node capacities) into multi-objective optimization models. Discrete-Event Simulation (DES) and Agent-Based Modeling (ABM) simulate complex fulfillment scenarios, while quantum annealing principles address NP-hard routing problems intractable for classical solvers at scale. Comparative analysis demonstrates that hybrid approaches combining metaheuristics, simulation, and quantum-informed logic significantly reduce fulfillment costs (12-18%), improve on-time delivery performance (15-22%), enhance capacity utilization (10-15%), and decrease last-mile emissions (8-12%) compared to traditional rule-based or isolated optimization methods. The framework provides robust decision support under demand volatility and network constraints, offering retailers a scalable path towards efficient and sustainable omnichannel fulfillment.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一个结合量子启发算法和模拟分析的框架，用于优化全渠道零售中的配送路由问题，显著降低了成本、提高了配送时效和可持续性。
AI.research_question: 如何在全渠道零售环境中优化ship-from-store、BOPIS和配送中心分配，以应对动态约束并实现成本效益和可持续性目标？
AI.motivation: 全渠道零售的快速增长使得传统配送模式不再适用，需要更复杂的分析方法来处理在线和实体渠道的无缝整合需求。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于量子退火原理、多目标优化理论、离散事件模拟和基于代理的建模，构建综合优化框架。
AI.method: 整合多源数据（需求预测、地理空间位置、运营成本、节点容量）到多目标优化模型中，使用离散事件模拟和基于代理的建模模拟复杂配送场景，应用量子启发算法解决NP难路由问题。
AI.findings: 混合方法（元启发式+模拟+量子启发逻辑）相比传统方法显著降低配送成本（12-18%）、提高准时交付率（15-22%）、提升容量利用率（10-15%）、减少最后一英里排放（8-12%）。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了量子启发算法与模拟分析相结合的新理论框架，为解决大规模NP难路由问题提供了新的理论方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 为零售商提供了可扩展的决策支持框架，能够在需求波动和网络约束下实现高效、可持续的全渠道配送优化。

title: The Influence of Automation on Global Competitiveness of Manufacturing Firms and its Implications for Domestic Employment
affiliations: Independent

detail.title: The Influence of Automation on Global Competitiveness of Manufacturing Firms and its Implications for Domestic Employment
detail.abstract: This study investigates the influence of automation on the global competitiveness of manufacturing firms and its subsequent implications for domestic employment. As industries increasingly adopt automated technologies, understanding the balance between enhanced productivity and workforce displacement becomes crucial. The research examines how automation affects operational efficiency, cost structures, and market positioning within the global manufacturing landscape. Additionally, it explores the ramifications for domestic labor markets, focusing on job displacement, skill requirements, and potential shifts in employment patterns. By analyzing case studies and industry data, the study aims to provide insights into the dual-edged nature of automation: while it fosters competitiveness and innovation, it also raises significant challenges for workforce stability and economic equity. The findings are intended to inform policymakers and industry leaders about the need for strategic interventions that support workforce adaptation in the face of rapid technological change.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨自动化对制造业企业全球竞争力的影响及其对国内就业的影响，分析自动化在提升生产效率和造成劳动力替代之间的平衡关系。
AI.research_question: 自动化如何影响制造业企业的全球竞争力，以及这种影响对国内就业市场产生什么后果？
AI.motivation: 随着各行业日益采用自动化技术，理解生产效率提升与劳动力替代之间的平衡变得至关重要，需要研究自动化对运营效率、成本结构和市场定位的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于技术创新理论、竞争力理论和劳动力市场理论，分析自动化对制造业全球竞争力和就业市场的双重影响。
AI.method: 通过案例研究和行业数据分析，考察自动化对运营效率、成本结构和市场定位的影响，以及对国内劳动力市场的就业模式变化。
AI.findings: 自动化具有双刃剑性质：一方面促进竞争力和创新，另一方面对劳动力稳定性和经济公平性带来重大挑战。
AI.theory_contributions: 深化了对自动化技术双重影响的理论理解，为技术创新与劳动力市场关系的理论框架提供实证支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和行业领导者提供战略干预的见解，支持劳动力在快速技术变革中的适应性调整。

title: Transforming Quick commerce in India
affiliations: Independent

detail.title: Transforming Quick commerce in India
detail.abstract: Blinkit, a leading quick-commerce platform in India, has transformed grocery and essentials delivery with its 10–20 minute service. This paper explores Blinkit’s growth, operations, features, and benefits for consumers, businesses, and delivery partners, as well as its market impact, innovation in logistics, and contribution to India’s retail landscape.

AI.tldr: Blinkit作为印度领先的即时商务平台，通过10-20分钟配送服务改变了杂货和必需品配送模式。本文分析了其增长、运营、市场影响和创新物流体系。
AI.research_question: Blinkit如何通过其快速配送模式改变印度零售格局，以及对消费者、商家和配送伙伴的影响是什么？

title: Consumer-Centric Supply Chain Models for Enhancing Responsiveness and Flexibility in the Retail Sector

detail.title: Consumer-Centric Supply Chain Models for Enhancing Responsiveness and Flexibility in the Retail Sector
detail.abstract: In today's highly competitive retail environment, the demand for supply chains that are both responsive and flexible is more crucial than ever. This research examines consumer-focused supply chain models as a strategic means to enhance adaptability and responsiveness in retail operations. Utilizing a mixed-methods approach, this study combines quantitative analysis of consumer data with qualitative case studies from prominent retail brands. The key findings indicate that incorporating consumer insights into supply chain decision-making not only streamlines inventory management but also enhances customer satisfaction and loyalty. The paper concludes with a proposed framework for developing consumer-centric supply chains that utilize advanced analytics and collaborative strategies, providing retailers with a pathway to succeed in an ever-evolving market. The implications of this study extend beyond operational efficiency, offering a roadmap for achieving sustainable competitive advantage in the retail sector.

detail.abstract: Interest rate risk remains a central concern for bond market participants, especially in the context of large-scale infrastructure investment. This paper examines the relationship between interest rate fluctuations and bond market behaviour, with a particular focus on Macaulay Duration as a measure of interest rate sensitivity. Building on recent literature, including Kandil's (2025) analysis of Macaulay Duration in infrastructure bond markets, the discussion explores how bond sellers respond strategically to mitigate cost increases. Additionally, insights from Kandil's (2024) work on supply chain and cost management integrity provide a cross-sectoral perspective, highlighting how macroeconomic factors and financial risk management practices intersect. The paper concludes with policy implications and recommendations for market participants.

title: The Global Footprint of American Legal Mind
affiliations: Chicago-Kent College of Law - Illinois Institute of Technology

detail.title: The Global Footprint of American Legal Mind
detail.abstract: With the advent of Trump 2.0, the U.S.'s unprecedented disruption of the rules-based multilateral trading order has raised serious questions about its perception of international norms and institutions. To explore this issue, this Essay introduces the concept of the "American Legal Mind" (ALM) defined as a distinctive pattern of legal thought shaped by the historical evolution of U.S. legal culture, particularly in relation to international law. Drawing from judicial practice and scholarly commentary, this Essay argues that ALM embodies a strong form of dualism, treating compliance with international law as a matter of political discretion. To test this claim, the Essay examines how the U.S. trade court engages with World Trade Organization (WTO) precedent. It finds that the court selectively invokes WTO case law, embracing it when aligned with U.S. agency decisions while dismissing it as "non-binding" when in conflict. Ultimately, the U.S. trade court's approach to WTO precedent serves less as a normative guide shaping legal reasoning and more as a post hoc justification for predetermined positions. The Essay concludes by advocating for an American legal education that fosters greater openness to diverse legal traditions.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨特朗普2.0时代美国对基于规则的多边贸易秩序的破坏，提出"美国法律思维"概念，分析其对国际法的二元态度，并通过美国贸易法院对WTO判例的选择性使用来验证这一理论。
AI.research_question: 美国如何认知国际规范与制度？美国法律思维如何影响其对国际法的态度和实践？
AI.motivation: 特朗普2.0时代美国前所未有地破坏基于规则的多边贸易秩序，引发对其国际规范认知的严重质疑
AI.theoretical_framework: 美国法律思维（ALM）理论 - 由美国法律文化历史演变形成的独特法律思维模式，特别是在国际法方面体现强烈的二元主义
AI.method: 分析司法实践和学术评论，重点考察美国贸易法院如何引用WTO判例
AI.findings: 美国贸易法院选择性引用WTO判例：当与美机构决定一致时采纳，冲突时则以"无约束力"为由拒绝；WTO判例更多用作事后合理化而非规范性指导
AI.theory_contributions: 提出"美国法律思维"概念，深化对美国国际法实践的理论理解，揭示其二元主义特征
AI.practical_contributions: 为理解美国国际法行为提供分析框架，倡导美国法律教育应更加开放包容不同法律传统

title: Trading TP 2 Option Violations
affiliations: Columbia Business School, Columbia University - Columbia Business School and Stevens Institute of Technology

detail.title: Trading TP 2 Option Violations
detail.abstract: Call option prices in the Black-Scholes model are totally positive of order 2 (TP 2), meaning that the ratio of the price of a higher-strike call to a lower-strike call increases with time-to-expiry, with adjustments for dividends and interest. This property, which strengthens the absence of calendar-spread arbitrage, holds in many, but not all standard theoretical models. We investigate whether it holds empirically in the market for call options on the S&P 500 index, and whether a closely related property holds for puts. We find that violations of TP 2 are rare and usually reverse quickly. We examine the combinations of strikes and expiries most likely to produce violations, and we investigate the impact of market conditions on violation rates. We propose long-short option trading strategies designed to profit from violations. In our preferred implementation, these strategies substantially outperform the index on both an absolute and risk-adjusted basis. Individual trades based on individual TP 2 violations have very high hit rates. These findings suggest that deviations from TP 2 in market prices are anomalies and can be exploited profitably when they occur.

AI.tldr: 本文研究发现S&P 500指数看涨期权价格在实证中基本满足TP2性质（二阶完全正性），违反情况罕见且快速反转。基于TP2违反构建的交易策略在绝对和风险调整基础上显著优于指数表现。
AI.research_question: S&P 500指数看涨期权价格是否在实证中满足TP2性质？看跌期权是否满足类似性质？违反TP2的情况是否可以构建盈利交易策略？
AI.motivation: Black-Scholes模型中期权价格具有TP2性质，但现实中许多标准理论模型并不都满足这一性质。需要实证检验市场中期权价格是否满足TP2，并探索违反情况下的交易机会。
AI.theoretical_framework: 二阶完全正性（TP2）理论，即较高执行价看涨期权与较低执行价看涨期权的价格比率随时间增加而上升（考虑股息和利率调整）。该性质强化了日历价差套利的缺失。
AI.method: 实证分析S&P 500指数期权市场数据，检验TP2性质的违反情况，分析违反模式与市场条件的关系，构建基于TP2违反的长短仓期权交易策略。
AI.findings: TP2违反罕见且快速反转；特定执行价和到期日组合更容易产生违反；市场条件影响违反率；基于TP2违反的交易策略在绝对和风险调整基础上显著跑赢指数；单个交易命中率极高。
AI.theory_contributions: 首次对TP2性质进行系统性实证检验，证实该性质在现实市场中基本成立，违反属于异常现象，为期权定价理论提供了实证支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 开发了基于TP2违反的盈利交易策略，为投资者提供了新的套利机会，策略表现优异且具有很高的命中率。

detail.abstract: After an analysis of the origin and meaning of the acronym DAO, this paper offers an overview of certain regulations that have governed the phenomenon and attempts to trace it back to Italian corporate law, with particular attention to cases of spontaneous cooperation among users through voluntary submission to governance rules implemented via smart contracts (i.e., without the formal establishment of an associative or corporate vehicle). Finally, it investigates the implications in terms of attribution and liability for decisions made through the execution of consensus protocols run on DLT.

detail.title: Index Manipulation vs Index Arbitrage: Economic Impacts of the Jane Street Scandal
detail.abstract: This paper aims to examine the economic impacts of the 2025 Jane Street scandal and take a deeper look at the financial markets of India, focusing on the distinction between index arbitrage and index manipulation. The paper analyses Jane Street's alleged trading strategy involving the Bank Nifty Index and its potential classification as manipulation by the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI). This study focuses on the aftermath of the incident, showcasing the decline the the turnover of the derivatives market turnover, shift in confidence of investors and potential reputation damage of the overall market culture of India. The aim is to understand the deeper economic consequences and reveal vulnerabilities in the regulatory structure of the Indian financial markets.
