detail.title: Effectiveness of Land Conservation Programs: Evidence from a Regression Discontinuity Design
detail.abstract: Substantial public funds have been invested in farmland preservation in the United States, particularly to fund the purchase of agricultural conservation easements (PACE). In this study, we employ a regression discontinuity design (RDD) to evaluate the impact of Colorado’s conservation investments on easement-level conservation outcomes. Colorado enacted two policies in the 1990s to incentivize conservation: the implementation of lottery dollars to fund conservation projects, and state tax incentives to encourage landowners to put easements on their undeveloped lands. We use fine-scale spatial data on conservation outcomes from counties surrounding the Colorado-Wyoming border to estimate the effects of the conservation investments on four variables of interest: agricultural quality of the land protected, the value of the land protected, easement size, and a measure of how close an easement is placed to other easements. We show that the PACE program in Colorado led to easements on higher quality, lower value land. Our findings suggest that additional funds resulted in conservation decisions that account for both budgetary constraints and state priorities to protect lands of high quality.

AI.tldr: 这篇论文使用回归断点设计方法评估了美国科罗拉多州农田保护投资的效果，发现资金投入导致保护了质量更高、价值较低的农田，体现了预算约束和保护优先级的平衡。
AI.research_question: 科罗拉多州农业保护投资如何影响保护地的质量、价值、规模和空间分布？
AI.motivation: 美国投入大量公共资金用于农田保护，特别是购买农业保护地征权，需要评估这些投资的效果和效率。
AI.theoretical_framework: 公共投资效果评估理论、保护地政策分析、回归断点设计方法论
AI.method: 采用回归断点设计（RDD），利用科罗拉多-怀昂明边境周边县的精细空间数据，分析保护投资对四个关键变量的影响
AI.findings: 科罗拉多州的PACE程序导致保护了质量更高、价值较低的农田，资金增加使保护决策考虑了预算约束和保护优先级的平衡
AI.theory_contributions: 提供了保护投资效果评估的实证方法，丰富了公共资金使用效率的理论研究
AI.practical_contributions: 为农田保护政策提供了重要参考，帮助政府更有效分配保护资金，优化保护效果

title: Natural Gas Transmission Project and Air Pollution in China
affiliations: ShanghaiTech University and ShanghaiTech University - School of Entrepreneurship and Management

detail.title: Natural Gas Transmission Project and Air Pollution in China
detail.abstract: The overall effects of nationwide environmental policies are ambiguous, especially when multiple levels of government and institutions jointly implement them. Using a 17-year panel dataset (1999–2015) on satellite-based air quality (Aerosol Optical Depth) and nationwide construction information on natural gas pipeline networks from 276 cities, we investigate how the natural gas transmission project (NGTP) has affected air pollution in China. We leverage predicted earliest pipeline connection time as a new instrumental variable to address the endogenous issue in cities' pipeline connection time during the network expansion period. We find that cities' real pipeline connections significantly reduced average air pollution by 8.5%. The magnitude is larger than the OLS estimation. Using the predicted IV and nationwide individual dataset from China Health Nutrition Survey (2000-2015), we also find the project improved residents' health in treated counties. The average individuals' treatment costs decreased by around 4,200 yuan per year, and communities' health scores were significantly improved. As a result of home gas upgrade, heterogeneous effects on health between husbands and wives also exist.

AI.tldr: 本研究利用1999-2015年卫星空气质量数据和天然气管道网络信息，通过构建新的工具变量，发现中国天然气传输项目使城市空气污染平均降低8.5%，并显著改善居民健康，年治疗费用减少约4200元。
AI.research_question: 中国天然气传输项目（NGTP）如何影响城市空气污染和居民健康？
AI.motivation: 全国性环境政策的总体效果存在模糊性，特别是在多级政府和机构共同实施的情况下，需要实证评估天然气管道项目对空气质量和健康的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于环境经济学和健康经济学理论，研究基础设施投资对环境污染和公共健康的外部性效应。
AI.method: 使用1999-2015年276个城市的卫星空气质量数据（气溶胶光学厚度）和天然气管道网络数据，构建预测的最早管道连接时间作为工具变量解决内生性问题，并利用中国健康营养调查个体数据进行健康效应分析。
AI.findings: 1）实际管道连接使城市空气污染平均降低8.5%；2）项目改善居民健康，个体年治疗费用减少约4200元，社区健康评分显著提升；3）存在家庭燃气升级导致的夫妻健康效应异质性。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了预测最早管道连接时间的新工具变量方法，解决了基础设施扩张期的内生性问题，为评估大型环境政策提供了方法论创新。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政府评估天然气基础设施投资的环境和健康效益提供了实证依据，支持清洁能源政策的持续实施和优化设计。

title: Freight Activity and Stock Returns: Evidence from Truck-Level Geolocation Data
affiliations: Tongji University, Tongji University and Shanghai Normal University

detail.title: Freight Activity and Stock Returns: Evidence from Truck-Level Geolocation Data
detail.abstract: This paper investigates whether firm-level freight activity captures corporate fundamentals and predicts stock returns. Using smartphone geolocation data of truck drivers from 2019 to 2024, we construct a novel freight growth index (FGI) to quantify firms' freight activity in the Chinese stock market. We find that firms' freight growth is strongly associated with current operating performance and predicts future stock returns. A long-short portfolio sorted on FGI generates significant risk-adjusted monthly returns ranging from 57 to 72 basis points. Further evidence suggests that freight growth forecasts earnings announcement returns and is more predictive for firms with low information transparency. Moreover, freight growth provides incremental information in predicting stock returns beyond analyst forecasts. Our findings highlight that firm-level freight activity contains novel insights into firm fundamentals and stock pricing.

AI.tldr: 使用卡车司机智能手机地理位置数据构建的运输增长指数(FGI)能够预测股票收益率，有效揭示企业基本面信息
AI.research_question: 企业层面的运输活动是否能够抓取公司基本面信息并预测股票收益率
AI.motivation: 开发新型数据源来揭示企业基本面信息对股票市场定价的重要作用
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于信息不对称理论和基本面分析理论，运输活动作为企业生产经营活动的直接代理变量
AI.method: 使用2019-2024年卡车司机智能手机地理位置数据，构建运输增长指数(FGI)，进行回归分析和长短仓策略测试
AI.findings: FGI与当前运营表现强相关，预测未来股票收益，长短策略月收益57-72基点，对低信息透明度企业更有预测力，超越分析师预测
AI.theory_contributions: 提供了使用新型大数据(运输活动数据)揭示企业基本面信息的理论案例，扩展了信息不对称理论在实证中的应用
AI.practical_contributions: 为投资者提供了一个新的基本面分析工具，可用于股票投资策略构建和风险管理，对中国股市投资者具有实质应用价值

title: Marketron through the Looking Glass: From Equity Dynamics to Option Pricing in Incomplete Markets
affiliations: Fidelity Investments, Inc. and New York University (NYU) - NYU Tandon School of Engineering

detail.title: Marketron through the Looking Glass: From Equity Dynamics to Option Pricing in Incomplete Markets

declarations.declarationOfInterest: No potential conflict of interest was reported by the authors.
declarations.funderStatement: No funding was received.

detail.abstract: The Marketron model, introduced by [Halperin, Itkin, 2025], describes price formation in inelastic markets as the nonlinear diffusion of a quasiparticle (the marketron) in a multidimensional space comprising the log-price x, a memory variable y encoding past money flows, and unobservable return predictors z. While the original work calibrated the model to S&P 500 time series data, this paper extends the framework to option markets-a fundamentally distinct challenge due to market incompleteness stemming from non-tradable state variables. We develop a utility-based pricing approach that constructs a risk-adjusted measure via the dual solution of an optimal investment problem. The resulting Hamilton-Jacobi-Bellman (HJB) equation, though computationally formidable, is solved using a novel methodology enabling efficient calibration even on standard laptop hardware. Having done that, we look at the additional question to answer: whether the Marketron model, calibrated to market option prices, can simultaneously reproduce the statistical properties of the underlying asset's log-returns. We discuss our results in view of the long-standing challenge in quantitative finance of developing an unified framework capable of jointly capturing equity returns, option smile dynamics, and potentially volatility index behavior.

AI.tldr: 本文扩展了Marketron模型到期权市场，开发了基于效用的定价方法，解决了市场不完全性带来的挑战，并通过新颖计算方法实现了高效校准。
AI.research_question: Marketron模型在校准到期权市场价格后，是否能同时重现基础资产对数收益的统计特性？
AI.motivation: 解决由于不可交易状态变量导致的市场不完全性问题，为量化金融开发能够同时捕捉股票收益、期权微笑动态和波动率指数行为的统一框架。
AI.theoretical_framework: Marketron模型（价格形成作为准粒子在多维空间中的非线性扩散）、基于效用的定价理论、Hamilton-Jacobi-Bellman方程、风险调整测度构建
AI.method: 通过最优投资问题的对偶解构建风险调整测度，使用新颖计算方法求解HJB方程，实现高效校准
AI.findings: 开发了能够处理市场不完全性的定价方法，实现了在标准笔记本电脑硬件上的高效计算校准
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展Marketron模型到不完全市场，发展了基于效用的风险调整定价理论，提供了统一框架的理论基础
AI.practical_contributions: 提供了在实际硬件上可实现的校准方法，为同时建模股票收益和期权定价提供了实用工具

title: Securing Sideways: Thwarting Lateral Movement by Implementing Active Directory Tiering
affiliations: The MITRE Corporation and Yale University

detail.title: Securing Sideways: Thwarting Lateral Movement by Implementing Active Directory Tiering

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The authors declare that the research was conducted without any commercial or financial relationships that could be construed as a conflict of interest.
declarations.ethicsApproval: n/a
declarations.funderStatement: TS’ work was supported by the Yale Digital Ethics Center Director’s Fellowship and the Pauli Murray Mellon Research Fellowship for Seniors at Yale University.

detail.abstract: The advancement of computing equipment and the advances in services over the Internet has allowed corporations, higher education, and many other organizations to pursue the shared computing network environment. A requirement for shared computing environments is a centralized identity system to authenticate and authorize user access. An organization's digital identity plane is a prime target for cyber threat actors. When compromised, identities can be exploited to steal credentials, create unauthorized accounts, and manipulate permissions-enabling attackers to gain control of the network and undermine its confidentiality, availability, and integrity. According to the FBI's Internet Crime Complaint Center (IC3), cybercrime losses reached a record of 16.6 B in the United States in 2024, a 33% increase from 2023. For organizations using Microsoft software, Active Directory is the on-premises identity system of choice. In this article, we examine the challenge of security compromises in Active Directory (AD) environments and present effective strategies to prevent credential theft and limit lateral movement by threat actors. These strategies include: 1) Active Directory Tiering-a method of logically segmenting the network into three tiers based on the sensitivity of the systems and data within each tier; 2) implementing the technical steps necessary to deploy AD Tiering; and 3) evaluating the benefits and potential trade-offs, such as setup time, hardware costs, ongoing maintenance, and required adjustments to business processes. Our proposed approaches aim to confine the movement of compromised credentials, preventing significant privilege escalation and theft. We argue that through our illustration of real-world scenarios, tiering can halt lateral movement and advanced cyber-attacks, thus reducing ransom escalation. Our work bridges a gap in existing literature by combining technical guidelines with theoretical arguments in support of tiering, positioning it as a vital component of modern cybersecurity strategy even though it cannot function in isolation. As the hardware advances and the cloud sourced services along with AI is advancing with unprecedented speed, we think it is important for security experts and the business to work together and start designing and developing software and frameworks to classify devices automatically and accurately within the tiered structure.

AI.tldr: 本文研究Active Directory环境中的安全风险，提出通过AD层化策略来防范凭证盗窃和限制攻击者横向移动，并分析了实施成本与效益。
AI.research_question: 如何通过Active Directory层化策略有效防范网络安全风险和限制攻击者的横向移动？
AI.motivation: 随着计算设备和网络服务的发展，企业和组织通常采用集中式身份系统来认证和授权用户访问。但这些数字身份平面成为网络威胁攻击者的主要目标，一旦被突破，导致凭证盗窃、权限操纵等严重后果。FBI数据显示2024年美国网络犯罪损失达到166亿美元，同比增长33%。
AI.theoretical_framework: 网络安全分层理论、权限控制理论、凭证保护理论以及横向移动防范策略。
AI.method: 提出了三个核心策略：1）Active Directory层化-将网络逻辑分割为三个层次，根据系统和数据的敏感性进行分类；2）实施AD层化的技术步骤；3）评估层化的效益以及成本交易（包括搭建时间、硬件成本、维护成本和业务流程调整）。通过实际场景案例进行验证。
AI.findings: 层化策略能够有效限制被突破凭证的流动，阻止权限升级和数据盗窃，通过停止横向移动来阻止高级网络攻击，从而降低赍金敏诉风险。
AI.theory_contributions: 填补了现有文献中的空白，将技术指南与理论论证相结合，位层化作为现代网络安全战略的关键组成部分，虽然它不能独立运作。
AI.practical_contributions: 为使用Microsoft Active Directory的组织提供了具体的安全部署方案，包括层化设计、技术实施步骤和成本效益分析，帮助企业降低网络安全风险。建议安全专家与业务部门合作，开发能够自动准确分类设备到层级结构中的软件和框架。

title: Housing Affordability, Instability, and Investment Motives Among Older Households: Evidence from South Korea
affiliations: Keimyung University and Keimyung University

detail.title: Housing Affordability, Instability, and Investment Motives Among Older Households: Evidence from South Korea
detail.abstract: The COVID-19 pandemic significantly increased housing and economic insecurity, especially among older households aiming to age in place. However, empirical research on the pandemic’s effects on housing cost burdens and their implications for aging in place among older households in South Korea remains limited. In this study, we developed a Housing Affordability Stress indicator to assess how housing affordability stress affected residential relocation among older South Korean homeowners. We differentiated between those with and without mortgages and examined various pandemic phases. We also analyzed investment and consumption motives in the Seoul Metropolitan Area (SMA) and non-SMA regions, which experienced different levels of housing price growth. The results indicate that older households with moderate housing affordability stress (spending 30–50% of income on housing) were significantly more likely to have moved in the past year. This likelihood was even higher among those with severe housing affordability stress (spending over 50%). The coefficients for the likelihood of moving decreased across pandemic phases; however, households with severe housing affordability stress continued to experience the highest housing instability. Additionally, older households without a mortgage were more likely to relocate than those with a mortgage. In non-SMA regions, where housing prices showed limited growth, mortgage-free older households were more likely to liquidate their housing wealth. In contrast, older households in the SMA, where housing prices increased substantially, tended to retain ownership because of strong investment incentives from these price increases.

AI.tldr: 这篇论文研究了COVID-19大流行期间韩国老年户主房价负担压力对民居迁移的影响，发现房价负担压力越大的老年家庭迁移概率越高，且无按揭家庭更容易迁移，同时房价增长区域的投资动机会减少迁移出现。
AI.research_question: 大流行期间房价负担压力如何影响韩国老年房主的民居迁移决策？按揭状况和地理区域差异会产生什么不同影响？
AI.motivation: COVID-19大流行加剧了老年家庭的房地产和经济不安全感，特别是对于希望原地安老的人群。但韩国在这方面的实证研究仍然缺乏，需要探索大流行对老年家庭房价负担压力和安老选择的具体影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 房地产可持续性理论、家庭财务决策理论、生命周期理论中的健康迁移模型，以及房地产市场变化对家庭消费与投资行为的影响机制。
AI.method: 建立房价负担压力指标(Housing Affordability Stress indicator)，采用跨时间数据分析，对比有无按揭的老年房主，分阶段分析大流行不同时期的影响，并分析首都圈和非首都圈区域的投资与消费动机差异。
AI.findings:
1.房价负担压力越大的老年家庭迁移概率越高(中度压力30-50%和严重压力>50%)
2.迁移概率随大流行阶段逐渐下降，但严重压力家庭仍最高
3.无按揭老年家庭比有按揭家庭更容易迁移
4.非首都圈区域房价增长有限，无按揭家庭更容易出售房产变现
5.首都圈房价大幅上涨，强烈投资动机使家庭更愿意保持房产所有权
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了大流行期间房地产市场变化对老年人口安居选择的理论研究，完善了房价负担压力与民居稳定性的理论框架，为变动环境下的老年家庭财务决策提供了新的理论视角。
AI.practical_contributions: 为韩国政府制定老年安居政策提供实证基础，帮助识别高风险家庭群体，为地区性房地产政策和老年社会服务提供具体建议，促进老年人口在变动环境下实现原地安老。

title: Borrow Long, Dump Short: How Firms Game Negative Interest Rates?
affiliations: Curtin University, Curtin University - School of Economics and Finance, Niagara University and Curtin University

detail.title: Borrow Long, Dump Short: How Firms Game Negative Interest Rates?
detail.abstract: We examine the impact of negative interest rate policy (NIRP) on corporate capital structure using a Difference-in-Differences (DiD) strategy on a panel of over 58,000 firms across 127 countries. We find that firms exposed to NIRP significantly reduce their short-term debt while increasing long-term debt, consistent with a strategy to lock in unusually low long-term rates. The shift in maturity structure is most pronounced among smaller, older, highly levered, and less liquid firms. While aggregate leverage remains stable in the short run, we observe a delayed increase in total debt levels when NIRP persists beyond five years. To interpret these findings, we develop two complementary frameworks. First, a stylised model highlights the role of refinancing frictions: because short-term debt requires frequent rollover, firms exposed to refinancing costs optimally shift toward longer-term debt under low-rate regimes. Second, a DSGE model calibrated to the Euro Area replicates the observed maturity reallocation and delayed leverage response via two channels. A compression in the long-term yield under NIRP (term structure channel) incentivises long-term borrowing, while the net worth effects from reserve-carry taxes (liquidity channel) suppress leverage initially unless the policy is gradual or sustained. Together, the stylised and quantitative models jointly rationalise our empirical findings and emphasise that the firm-level transmission of NIRP depends not only on the level of rates but also on the frequency of debt adjustment, balance sheet frictions, and the policy’s anticipated duration. Our results highlight that while NIRP can reshape debt maturity composition rapidly, its effect on corporate leverage is contingent on the temporal design of the policy.

AI.tldr: 负利率政策使企业减少短期债务增加长期债务，导致债务到期结构重新分配，而总体债务水平在短期保持稳定但长期持续时会延迟上升
AI.research_question: 负利率政策如何影响企业资本结构？
AI.motivation: 了解负利率政策在微观层面对企业债务结构的影响机制
AI.theoretical_framework: 重融资磕碍理论和DSGE模型，通过利率期限结构渠道咍流动性渠道解释政策传导
AI.method: 双重差分法(DiD)分析127个国家过58,000家企业数据
AI.findings: 企业在NIRP下显著减少短期债务增加长期债务，小型、低流动性企业效应更明显，总体债务在短期稳定但长期持续时会延迟上升
AI.theory_contributions: 提出重融资磕碍理论框架，证明债务到期调整频率、保持表磕碍咍政策预期持续时间都是重要传导渠道
AI.practical_contributions: 为负利率政策的微观效应提供实证支撑，帮助政策制定者理解政策对企业资本结构的影响机制

title: The Procyclicality of Fdic Deposit Insurance Premiums
affiliations: Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) and University of Georgia - Terry College of Business

detail.title: The Procyclicality of Fdic Deposit Insurance Premiums
detail.abstract: Exploiting unique changes to deposit insurance premium rate schedules set by regulatory agencies during the global financial crisis, we examine the procyclical effect of FDIC insurance premiums on bank credit. Using confidential supervisory data, we identify the effect of deposit insurance premium changes that are plausibly exogenous to the performance of an individual bank. Using credit unions, which are subject to different insurance premium regulations, as a control group, we document empirically a significant procyclical effect of deposit insurance premiums on bank lending during the crisis and show that community banks were disproportionately affected by this mechanism.

AI.tldr: 利用金融危机期间存款保险保费率调整的外生变化，研究发现FDIC保险保费对银行信贷产生明显的顺周期效应，小银行受影响更大
AI.research_question: 存款保险保费的变化如何影响银行在金融危机期间的信贷政策？
AI.motivation: 理解金融监管政策(如存款保险制度)在经济周期中的影响，尤其是在危机期间对银行信贷行为的作用
AI.theoretical_framework: 存款保险制度理论、银行信贷周期性理论、监管政策的顺周期效应
AI.method: 利用监管机构在金融危机期间调整存款保险保费率的外生实验设计，使用机密监管数据，并以受不同保费规定的信贷联合会作为对照组
AI.findings: 存款保险保费对银行贷款产生了显著的顺周期效应，在危机期间小型社区银行受到了不成比例的负面影响
AI.theory_contributions: 实证证明了存款保险制度在金融危机中的顺周期特征，丰富了监管政策对银行行为影响的理论
AI.practical_contributions: 为监管机构调整存款保险保费政策提供了实证基础，特别是在考虑小银行受影响方面

title: Shining a Light on Firms' Political Connections: The Role of Dark Money
affiliations: Carnegie Mellon University - Tepper School of Business and University of South Carolina - Department of Finance

detail.title: Shining a Light on Firms' Political Connections: The Role of Dark Money
detail.abstract: We study the emergence of a new channel for firm political activity using dark money through undisclosed and unlimited contributions. Following U.S. federal court decisions in 2010, there has been a striking rise in S&P 500 firms' use of dark money. We find that dark money contributions complement political engagement through campaign contributions and lobbying. Firms disclose dark money contributions when they face heightened non-disclosure costs. Firms contributing to dark money groups benefit by receiving more procurement contracts and increased government subsidies. Our findings highlight that political connections by firms are evolving and expanding through new and largely unexplored channels.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了企业通过暗钱（未披露且无限制的政治捐款）进行政治活动的新渠道。研究发现2010年美国联邦法院裁决后，标普500企业暗钱使用显著增加，暗钱捐款与竞选捐款和游说形成互补，企业在面临高披露成本时选择暗钱，且暗钱捐款企业获得更多政府采购合同和政府补贴。
AI.research_question: 企业如何通过暗钱渠道进行政治活动？暗钱捐款如何影响企业的政治联系和政府资源获取？
AI.motivation: 随着2010年美国联邦法院裁决允许未披露且无限制的政治捐款，企业政治活动渠道发生变化，需要研究这种新型暗钱渠道的运作机制和影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于企业政治战略理论、资源依赖理论和政治联系理论，探讨企业如何通过不同渠道建立政治联系并获取政府资源。
AI.method: 实证研究，使用标普500企业数据，分析法院裁决前后暗钱使用变化，检验暗钱捐款与政府采购、政府补贴的关系。
AI.findings: 1）2010年后企业暗钱使用显著增加；2）暗钱与竞选捐款、游说形成互补；3）高披露成本时企业选择暗钱；4）暗钱捐款企业获得更多政府采购合同和政府补贴。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了企业政治活动理论，揭示了暗钱作为新型政治渠道的运作机制，丰富了政治联系理论的内涵。
AI.practical_contributions: 为监管机构提供政策启示，帮助企业理解新型政治活动渠道的风险和收益，为投资者评估企业政治风险提供参考。

title: Explainable Information Design
affiliations: Harvard University, Harvard University, Chinese University of Hong Kong and Yale University

detail.title: Explainable Information Design
detail.abstract:
The optimal signaling schemes in information design (Bayesian persuasion) problems often involve non-explainable randomization or disconnected partitions of state space, which are too intricate to be audited or communicated. We propose explainable information design in the context of information design with a continuous state space, restricting the information designer to use K-partitional signaling schemes defined by deterministic and monotone partitions of the state space, where a unique signal is sent for all states in each part. We first prove that the price of explainability (PoE)-the ratio between the performances of the optimal explainable signaling scheme and unrestricted signaling scheme-is exactly 1/2 in the worst case, meaning that partitional signaling schemes are never worse than arbitrary signaling schemes by a factor of 2.

We then study the complexity of computing optimal explainable signaling schemes. We show that the exact optimization problem is NP-hard in general. But for Lipschitz utility functions, an ε-approximately optimal explainable signaling scheme can be computed in polynomial time. And for piecewise constant utility functions, we provide an efficient algorithm to find an explainable signaling scheme that provides a 1/2 approximation to the optimal unrestricted signaling scheme, which matches the worst-case PoE bound.

A technical tool we develop is a conversion from any optimal signaling scheme (which satisfies a bi-pooling property) to a partitional signaling scheme that achieves 1/2 fraction of the expected utility of the former. We use this tool in the proofs of both our PoE result and algorithmic result.

AI.tldr: 本文研究可解释信息设计，限制信号方案使用K-分区确定性单调划分，证明可解释性代价为1/2，即分区方案性能不低于任意方案的50%，并提供了计算近似最优方案的算法。
AI.research_question: 在连续状态空间的信息设计中，使用K-分区可解释信号方案相对于无限制信号方案的性能损失是多少？以及如何有效计算最优可解释信号方案？
AI.motivation: 最优信号方案通常包含难以审计或沟通的非解释性随机化或断开的状态空间划分，需要设计可解释的信号方案来解决实际问题中的可解释性需求。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于贝叶斯劝说（Bayesian persuasion）和信息设计理论，特别是连续状态空间下的信号方案设计框架。
AI.method: 理论分析证明可解释性代价（PoE）为1/2，开发了从最优信号方案到分区方案的转换工具，并针对不同效用函数类型设计了算法复杂度分析。
AI.findings: 分区信号方案在最坏情况下性能不低于任意信号方案的50%；精确优化是NP难的，但对Lipschitz效用函数可多项式时间计算ε近似解，对分段常数效用函数可达到1/2近似。
AI.theory_contributions: 建立了可解释信息设计的理论框架，证明了可解释性代价的紧确界（1/2），开发了双向池化性质到分区方案的转换技术。
AI.practical_contributions: 提供了实际可用的算法来计算近似最优的可解释信号方案，使信息设计结果更容易被审计和沟通，适用于需要解释性的实际应用场景。

title: An Analysis of the Pay-Performance Relationship in the English Premier League
affiliations: University of San Diego

detail.title: An Analysis of the Pay-Performance Relationship in the English Premier League
detail.abstract: This study examines the relationship between player salaries and on-field performance in the English Premier League (EPL) from the 2021/22 to 2023/24 seasons. Using salary data from Capology and Spotrac and performance metrics from ESPN and the Premier League's official website, the analysis covers 1,276 players across three seasons. Nine linear regressions were conducted, both with and without team fixed effects, to identify performance metrics that significantly influence player wages. Results indicate that Passes Completed consistently exhibit a strong positive correlation with salaries for all outfield positions, while Minutes Played frequently shows a negative correlation. Position-specific findings reveal that Goals and Offsides are most economically significant for forwards, Assists for midfielders, and Saves for goalkeepers, whereas traditional defensive metrics such as Tackles Won, Interceptions, and Clearances show little wage relevance for defenders. The findings suggest that while certain performance indicators are valued in contract negotiations, many factors beyond on-field output likely contribute to salary determination in the EPL. This research contributes to the literature on sports economics by highlighting the limitations of performance-based pay models in professional football and pointing to the need for further investigation into non-performance determinants of player compensation.

AI.tldr: 本研究分析英超联赛球员薪资与表现指标的关系，发现传球成功率、进球、助攻和救球等具有薪资相关性，而传统防守指标影响较小，表明薪资决定参考了多重因素
AI.research_question: 英超联赛球员薪资与场上表现指标之间的关系是什么？哪些表现指标对薪资决定有显著影响？
AI.motivation: 球员薪资在体育经济学中是重要研究议题，但现有研究多聚焦美国体育，对足球领域的系统性分析较少，特别是对不同位置球员的薪资决定因素知识缺失
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于人力资本理论和表现基硅薪资理论，假设球员薪资主要由其场上表现决定
AI.method: 采用线性回归分析，数据来源于Capology、Spotrac、ESPN和英超官网，覆盖2021/22至2023/24赛季的1,276名球员，进行了九次回归分析（包含与不包含队伍固定效应）
AI.findings: 传球成功率在所有场上位置都与薪资呈显著正相关；出场时间经常呈负相关；前锋的进球和越位最具经济意义；中场的助攻最关键；门将的救球重要；传统防守指标如抢断、抶截、解围对后卫薪资影响较小
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了体育经济学中表现基硅薪资理论的应用，揭示了英超薪资决定中表现指标的差异性效应，指出了现有理论模型的局限性
AI.practical_contributions: 为球队管理层提供薪资调整的实证基硅，帮助球员和经纪人理解薪资决定机制，为赛事资本投资者提供决策参考

title: Financial Development, Income Inequality, and Trade
affiliations: Hiroshima University

detail.title: Financial Development, Income Inequality, and Trade
detail.abstract: This study examines the impact of financial development (FD) on income inequality within a general-equilibrium model that incorporates credit constraints and international trade. FD reduces financial frictions and hence allows small enterprises to access external finance. We find that FD always reduces inter-group inequality, whereas its impact on intra-group inequality depends on the levels of FD and trade costs. When trade costs are high, FD monotonically increases intra-group inequality. By contrast, when trade costs are low, the relationship between FD and intra-group inequality exhibits a U-shaped pattern. The results support empirical findings and clarify ambiguity in the literature. This study also contributes to the ongoing debate on equality and efficiency by demonstrating that FD-related policies can simultaneously enhance both in the context of the global economy.

AI.tldr: 金融发展通过降低金融摩擦改善小企业融资，减少组间不平等，但对组内不平等的影响取决于金融发展水平和贸易成本。高贸易成本时金融发展增加组内不平等，低贸易成本时呈U型关系。
AI.research_question: 金融发展对收入不平等的影响机制是什么？特别是在考虑信贷约束和国际贸易的情况下。
AI.motivation: 现有文献关于金融发展与收入不平等关系存在模糊性，需要构建包含信贷约束和国际贸易的一般均衡模型来澄清这种关系。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于一般均衡理论，结合信贷约束模型和国际贸易理论，分析金融发展通过降低金融摩擦影响企业融资和收入分配的机制。
AI.method: 构建理论模型，包含信贷约束和国际贸易要素，分析金融发展对不同维度不平等的影响，并进行数值模拟验证。
AI.findings: 1. 金融发展始终降低组间不平等；2. 对组内不平等的影响取决于金融发展水平和贸易成本；3. 高贸易成本时金融发展单调增加组内不平等；4. 低贸易成本时呈U型关系。
AI.theory_contributions: 1. 澄清了金融发展与不平等关系的模糊性；2. 揭示了贸易成本在其中的调节作用；3. 提供了同时考虑效率和公平的理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了金融发展政策设计的理论依据，表明在全球化背景下可以通过金融发展政策同时提升效率和促进公平。

title: Blockchain & Digital Watermarking
affiliations: Independent

detail.title: Blockchain & Digital Watermarking
detail.abstract: This research explores the integration of blockchain technology with digital watermarking techniques to enhance the security, authenticity, and traceability of digital assets. The purpose of the study is to investigate how blockchain's immutable ledger can complement watermarking methods to provide robust proof of ownership, prevent unauthorized use, and enable transparent tracking of digital content distribution. The methodology involves a systematic analysis of existing watermarking algorithms combined with blockchain-based timestamping and registration frameworks. Key findings indicate that the hybrid approach significantly improves copyright protection by enabling verifiable, tamper-proof records of watermarked content, facilitating effective detection of counterfeit or altered media. The study demonstrates the potential for this synergy to revolutionize digital rights management in fields such as digital art, media distribution, and document authentication.

AI.tldr: 本文探订品牌建设的多元化策略，包括品牌媒体广告、社交媒体互动、内容营销、客户关系维护以及社会责任等方面，以提升品牌意识度、建立品牌联想、增强客户忠诚度和确立市场定位。
AI.research_question: 如何通过多元化的品牌建设策略来提升品牌价值和市场竞争力？
AI.motivation: 当今市场竞争激烈，品牌建设对于企业成长和绩效至关重要。企业需要系统性地建立和维护品牌形象，以引导消费者认知、增强市场区隔度并建立长期的客户关系。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于品牌管理理论、媒体播放理论、社交媒体营销理论、客户关系管理理论和社会责任理论，构建了一个多元化的品牌建设理论框架。
AI.method: 采用理论分析和实践案例研究方法，通过对品牌建设各个维度的系统分析，探讨有效的品牌策略实施方式。
AI.findings: 研究发现品牌建设需要多维度协同进行，包括：媒体广告提升品牌意识度；社交媒体互动建立品牌联想；内容营销优化传播效果；客户服务增强忠诚度；社会责任建立品牌信誉。同时强调一致性传播品牌价值观和明确市场定位的重要性。
AI.theory_contributions: 本文丰富了品牌管理理论体系，提出了一个整合性的品牌建设框架，将传统广告、数字化营销、客户关系管理和社会责任等多个维度结合起来，为品牌管理研究提供了新的理论视角。
AI.practical_contributions: 研究为企业实践提供了具体的品牌建设指南，包括如何通过媒体广告提升品牌曝光度，如何利用社交媒体与消费者互动，如何制作疯狂传播的内容，如何通过客户服务建立忠诚度，以及如何通过社会责任实践增强品牌形象等。这些实践建议对企业制定和执行品牌策略具有重要的应用价值。

title: Commercial Sexual Exploitation of Children in Pakistan's Transport Sector: Legal Framework, Practices, and Policy Gaps

declarations.declarationOfInterest: This research paper was primarily made for my dissertation subject in LLB

detail.abstract: This research project aims to analyse the matter of commercial sexual exploitation of children, sexual abuse of children suffered in Pakistan and its prevalence in the country. The research will go in depth with the various kinds and causes of commercial sexual exploitation and abuse. It will also look at the some of the example cases to understand the response of the government and justice system of the country. Next it will look at the current data and statistics of the cases to examine its increase. Finally, all the national, regional and international legislations regarding the commercial sexual exploitation and abuse will be studied to determine where Pakistan stands on the matter and how much further modifications are needed in the legal system to tackle the issue and bring about the much needed improvement.

title: Reflections of Global Supply Chains in Mirror Trade Data
affiliations: Queen Mary University of London - School of Business and Management and University of Southampton

detail.title: Reflections of Global Supply Chains in Mirror Trade Data
detail.abstract: Mirror trade data is the official statistics of imports and exports for the same commodity as reported separately by pairs of trade partners. In this paper, we utilize mirror trade data from United Nations Commodity Trade Statistics Database (UN Comtrade) to analyze global logistics and supply chains. In particular, we use the data to estimate: (1) Trade lead times, i.e., the length of time between the recording of the export at the source end and the corresponding import at the destination end, with international transport as the main component, and (2) Transshipment within transit blocs, wherein imports or exports to the destination country pass through another country within a customs-bonded transit bloc. Our estimates of trade lead time provide insights into the modes of transport and systematic shifts in lead times at both individual commodity and aggregate levels. The transshipment model identifies indirect sources of imports and enables reconstructing trade flow networks. Using the case study of UK and Western Europe imports from from Asia, we estimate the changes in aggregate trade lead times between 2018 and 2023, measure the Rotterdam Effect, and explore the impact of Brexit on transshipment patterns. We provide a practical tool for reducing import-export discrepancy in mirror trade data and tracking international trade lead times, key for trade and supply chain analysts. We show, for instance, the trade lead times have increased since 2022, consistent with proprietary data, which has clear implications for inventory management and supply chain risk management.

AI.tldr: 本研究利用联合国商品贸易统计数据库的镜像贸易数据，分析全球物流和供应链，估算贸易前置时间和转运模式，为贸易和供应链分析师提供实用工具。
AI.research_question: 如何利用镜像贸易数据估算全球贸易前置时间和识别转运模式？
AI.motivation: 镜像贸易数据作为贸易伙伴双方分别报告的进出口官方统计数据，可用于深入分析全球物流和供应链运作，但目前缺乏系统性的分析方法。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于国际贸易统计理论和供应链管理理论，利用镜像贸易数据的差异来推断物流时间和转运行为。
AI.method: 使用联合国商品贸易统计数据库(UN Comtrade)的镜像贸易数据，开发统计模型来估算贸易前置时间和识别转运模式。
AI.findings: 贸易前置时间自2022年以来有所增加，与专有数据一致；成功识别了转运模式并重建了贸易流网络；量化了鹿特丹效应和英国脱欧对转运模式的影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了基于镜像贸易数据估算物流时间和识别转运行为的系统方法论，丰富了国际贸易统计分析方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 开发了减少镜像贸易数据进出口差异的实用工具，为贸易和供应链分析师提供了追踪国际贸易前置时间的关键工具，对库存管理和供应链风险管理具有重要价值。

title: To Profit or not to Profit? Evidence from Chile's For-Profit Voucher Schools
affiliations: Universidad Alberto Hurtado - Economics Department, Central Bank of Chile - Economic Research and Universidad Alberto Hurtado - Economics Department

detail.title: To Profit or not to Profit? Evidence from Chile's For-Profit Voucher Schools
detail.abstract: This note examines whether for-profit management affects educational outcomes in Chile's universal voucher system. Using administrative panel data for all primary voucher schools from 2010-2014, we compare for-profit and nonprofit schools along inputs and student performance. For-profit schools serve more disadvantaged students and use lower-cost inputs, such as lessqualified teachers, but provide more instruction hours and smaller classes. Once observable characteristics are controlled for, we find no significant differences in standardized test scores between for-profit and nonprofit schools. These results suggest that in this context, allowing for-profit management neither improves nor harms measured educational outcomes.

title: Citation Network of United Nations Resolutions Reveals Norm Diffusion Patterns in Multilateral Governance
affiliations: University of Geneva, University of Geneva, University of Geneva, University of Geneva and University of Geneva

detail.title: Citation Network of United Nations Resolutions Reveals Norm Diffusion Patterns in Multilateral Governance

declarations.declarationOfInterest: Professor Nicolas Levrat is the fourth Special Rapporteur on minority issues. He was appointed by the Human Rights Council on 13 October 2023 and took up his functions as Special Rapporteur on 1 November 2023.

detail.abstract: While scientific citation networks have been extensively studied, governance citation networks remain underexplored, despite their potential to reveal how ideas and norms emerge in response to complex global challenges. Given the interconnected nature of these challenges, which require governance approaches beyond the scope of individual institutions, this study examines whether normative developments are primarily shaped within institutional boundaries or through inter-institutional linkages. We analyse the full corpus of resolutions (1946-2024) adopted by the United Nations General Assembly, Security Council, and Economic and Social Council, applying network analysis and natural language processing to trace citation patterns over time. Our findings show that intra-organ citation dominates, reflecting the distinct mandates and autonomy of each organ. Yet, structural and temporal patterns reveal significant inter-organ linkages that contribute to the emergence and diffusion of shared norms. These results provide new insights into the dynamics of norm development and the evolving anatomy of multilateral governance.

title: Geographic Diversification of RMBS and Systemic Risk
affiliations: Florida International University (FIU) - Hollo School of Real Estate

detail.title: Geographic Diversification of RMBS and Systemic Risk
detail.abstract: Conventional portfolio theory generally presumes that asset performance is independent of portfolio management. The secondary mortgage market provides a unique setting for evaluating the independence of mortgage performance from security design, with a focus on the motivation of issuers to diversify mortgage pools geographically and the ex post assignment of mortgage servicers to manage the security's mortgage pools. Using loan-level data from non-agency or private-label residential mortgage-backed securities (RMBS) and finding that RMBS performance is associated with the market structure of mortgage servicing is consistent with an ex post association between mortgages and mortgage securitization. This is distinct from concerns of moral hazard and non-random selection of mortgage origination or securitization. It also suggests that the benefit of geographically diversifying mortgage pools-a strategy encouraged by rating agencies to mitigate localized risk-may have unintended consequences by contributing to an idiosyncratic risk that is not diversifiable by construction.

detail.abstract: Insensitivity to financial sustainability has led some firm to undeserved winding up and significance of the pharmaceutical firms to the health and economic stability of the nation requires a review of the contingency factors that are capable of influencing her financial sustainability attainments. This study therefore examines the effect of contingency factors on the financial sustainability of the pharmaceutical firms in Nigeria. The study adopts a survey research design to ascertain the effect of contingency factors on the financial sustainability of the pharmaceutical firms in Nigeria. The study gathered the data from 234 respondents out of a sample frame size of 330 from 10 largest firms in Nigeria. Multiple regression analysis revealed that leadership style (β = 0.711; p < 0.000); organization culture (β = 0.185; p = 0.000) both has positive and notable effect on the financial sustainability efforts of the pharmaceutical firms in Nigeria. The study concludes that the leadership style and organization culture enhance financial sustainability practices in the firms under the study. The study recommends that Companies' management should adopt a transactional leadership style and resilient culture in order to achieve more financial sustainability.

title: Fiscal Sources of Inflation Risk in EMDEs: The Role of the External Channel
affiliations: Bank for International Settlements (BIS), Bank for International Settlements (BIS), Bank for International Settlements (BIS) - Monetary and Economic Department and University of California, Berkeley - Department of Economics

detail.title: Fiscal Sources of Inflation Risk in EMDEs: The Role of the External Channel
detail.abstract: We examine the fiscal sources of near-term inflation risk in a panel of emerging market and developing economies (EMDEs). Using quantile panel regressions, we find that an increase in the fiscal deficit is associated with a large and highly non-linear shift in the distribution of one year ahead inflation: that is, the right tail of inflation risk expands by more than average inflation. These effects are substantially larger in EMDEs than in advanced economies. We also show that this shift in the inflation distribution is closely related to a similar shift in the distribution of future currency depreciation. This external channel is stronger when the share of public debt in foreign currency is large, when foreign investors hold a greater share of domestic currency debt, and when interest payments on debt are sizeable.

detail.abstract: This chapter examines the intersecting dynamics of digital and financial exclusion, with a particular focus on their impact on elderly populations within the European Union. It argues that these overlapping forms of exclusion require targeted legal scholarship and a regulatory approach attuned to the specific vulnerabilities of older individuals. Addressing these challenges necessitates interdisciplinary, evidence-based research, underpinned by rigorous study design and guided by clearly defined avenues for legislative intervention. By identifying gaps in knowledge and methodology the chapter seeks to contribute to academic discourse and to inform policy and practical initiatives aimed at enhancing financial inclusion and equity for the elderly.

title: Democracy Does Mitigate Gender Bias: A Gender Stereotypes Perspective
affiliations: University of Auckland Business School and The Hong Kong Polytechnic University

detail.title: Democracy Does Mitigate Gender Bias: A Gender Stereotypes Perspective
detail.abstract: The recent global regression in democratic norms adds a new layer to the democracy–gender inequality puzzle. In this context, we examine whether and how exposure to democratic institutions mitigates gender-related cognitive biases worldwide. Using a harmonized individual-level survey, we confirm that democratic exposure reduces stereotypes across female leadership, executive roles, education, childcare, and occupational tasks—strongest for leadership attitudes, weakest for occupational roles. The effect is amplified among individuals with altruistic tendencies and liberal orientations. Yet, the efficacy of democratic exposure in shaping gender perceptions is contingent on contextual factors, including sustained economic growth, political stability, peace, and low corruption. A complementary model shows that individuals shaped by democratization prioritize environmental stewardship over immediate economic expansion, further reinforcing the decline in gender-biased perceptions.

declarations.funderStatement: The research was solely sponsored by the researcher

detail.abstract: The incessant report of abysmal teaching quality in Nigeria polytechnics necessitate the appraisal of the management control system in place in this public higher institute of learning. The study examine the effect of control packages on the teaching quality of polytechnics in Nigeria. The study adopt a survey research design. Data were obtained from 169 respondents through structured questionnaires. Multiple regression analysis was employed and the study revealed that administrative control (β =-0.311; p < 0.000) was found with significant negative effect; cybernetic controls (β = 0.758; p < 0.000) have a notable and positive effect while the rewards and compensations control (β =-0.047; p > 0.353) was found with negligible and negative effects on the quality of teaching in Nigeria public polytechnics. The study concludes that effective control element such as administrative, reward and compensation, and cybernetics controls improved the utilization of the resource and ensure attainment of optimum performance. The study recommends the Nigeria polytechnics managements should implement efficient policies and procedure, effective renumerations, and accurate financial and nonfinancial metrics in attempt to improve their performance and able to compete with foreign counterpart.

title: Regenerative Transformation As Strategic Renewal: Challenging The Growth Paradigm In Contemporary Business
affiliations: Institute for Change Leadership and Business Transformation

detail.title: Regenerative Transformation As Strategic Renewal: Challenging The Growth Paradigm In Contemporary Business
detail.abstract: The pursuit of growth has long served as the dominant measure of organizational success, shaping management theory, governance models, and strategic transformation agendas. Yet mounting ecological strain, social fragmentation, and institutional fatigue suggest that expansion cannot remain the sole marker of legitimacy in the twenty-first century. This article interrogates the growth imperative as a historically contingent construct rather than an inevitable trajectory, tracing how economic thought and managerial practice have institutionalized scale and speed as proxies for value. It then examines emerging alternatives such as slow growth, green growth, postgrowth, and degrowth, highlighting their potential and limitations in reframing organizational purpose. Building on systems thinking and regenerative leadership scholarship, the article advances the concept of regenerative transformation: a paradigm in which organizations are viewed as participants in living systems whose viability depends on reciprocity, sufficiency, and resilience. This perspective extends beyond disruption management and efficiency, emphasizing cultural transition, ecological integration, and expanded performance metrics that include trust, cohesion, and ecosystem health. A framework of regenerative indicators, including carbon equity, social investment ratios, and employee flourishing, illustrates how aligning measurement with intent reshapes accountability and value creation. By analyzing hypothetical yet plausible case signals, from firms prioritizing ecosystem restoration to policies embedding regenerative procurement, the article situates regenerative transformation as an emergent, though scattered, post-growth logic. It concludes that the future of business transformation will not be defined by the velocity of expansion but by the wisdom with which organizations align ambition with ecological and social thresholds.

title: A Column-Generation-Based Framework for Dynamic Network Optimization with Service Customization
affiliations: Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU), Antai College of Economics and Management, Students, University of Chicago - Booth School of Business, Shanghai University of Finance and Economics - School of Information Management and Engineering, Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU) and The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen

detail.title: A Column-Generation-Based Framework for Dynamic Network Optimization with Service Customization
detail.abstract: This paper discusses a network optimization problem that dynamically adjusts network configuration, inventory management, and order fulfillment, motivated by a real-world challenge of a leading logistics company. This problem involves a number of supply and warehouse nodes, and a large set of customers with heterogeneous service and operational requirements. We formulate it as a mixed-integer program, which can be seen as a variant of network design problems. Existing off-the-shelf solvers struggle to obtain high-quality solutions within a reasonable time limit due to the service constraints, complex operational requirements, and the problem size. To address the idiosyncrasies of service constraints, we exploit the block-angular structure of the MIP formulation and develop a column-generation-based decomposition algorithm to utilize customer-oriented subproblems with personalized service constraints. Various reformulations and necessary strategies are introduced to accelerate the vanilla method and improve solution quality. Our numerical experiments demonstrate that the proposed framework achieves near-optimal solutions within an average absolute gap of 0.70% while reducing computation time by 73% compared to state-of-the-art solvers. An ablation study is conducted to analyze the impact of different reformulations, network scales, constraint configurations, and solution strategies.

AI.findings: 所提框架实现了平均0.70%的绝对差距接近最优解，相比最先进求解器减少73%计算时间。

detail.abstract: This paper studies how financial covenants, provisions included in most loan contracts, influence firm investment. I develop a structural model incorporating covenants and find that they allow for 4.7% higher aggregate investment relative to a no-covenants baseline. While covenants are beneficial overall, the model also reveals costs faced by firms attempting to avoid covenant violations. In two applications of the model, I find that, first, the transmission of aggregate shocks to firm financing crucially depends on firms' efforts to avoid covenant violations. Second, the model shows that earnings-based covenants allow for higher investment in industries with low asset pledgeability but offer no advantage when assets can be easily pledged.

detail.abstract: We study how trade liberalization affects financial and innovation decisions of large firms across major G7 countries. We document how firms increase their cash holdings when their country's trading partners lower their import tariffs, while we find no effect of a decrease in the country's own import tariffs. Specifically, we find that the increase in cash holdings occurs before tariff cuts by trading partners and is associated with higher R&D spending and patent filing after the cuts. Our results are consistent with the predictions of a model in which higher expected returns to innovation from enhanced export market access lead to higher cash buffers.

title: Securities Law Enforcement and Credible Deterrence: Lessons for India from the United States and Singapore
affiliations: Jagran Lakecity University

detail.title: Securities Law Enforcement and Credible Deterrence: Lessons for India from the United States and Singapore
detail.abstract: This study undertakes a comparative examination of securities law enforcement frameworks in India, the United States, and Singapore, focusing on the structural allocation of power, procedural mechanisms, and interagency coordination. This study observes that, while the United States adopts a parallel investigation model, where the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and the Department of Justice (DOJ) conduct independent yet coordinated proceedings, Singapore employs a joint investigation framework integrating the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) and the Commercial Affairs Department (CAD) to ensure procedural fairness and transparency. By contrast, India centralizes investigative, adjudicative, and prosecutorial powers within the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI), a model that raises concerns regarding functional overlap, procedural efficiency, and the perception of impartiality. Drawing on statutory provisions, case law, regulatory manuals, and policy reports, this study identifies the critical enforcement gaps in India's current framework. Emphasis is placed on the evidentiary standard required to establish violations, absence of structured inter-agency cooperation, and limited adoption of global enforcement best practices. The analysis situates these shortcomings against the principles of credible deterrence articulated by the International Organization of Securities Commissions (IOSCO), arguing that without institutional separation of functions and strengthened coordination between civil and criminal enforcement authorities, India's capacity to address market misconduct will remain constrained. The paper concludes with a set of targeted reform proposals designed to enhance enforcement efficiency, align domestic practices with IOSCO benchmarks, and strengthen market integrity through credible and transparent regulatory actions.

title: Grain of Salt: When Bad Science Meets Improper Consumer Marketing
affiliations: International Institute of Information Technology - Bangalore

detail.title: Grain of Salt: When Bad Science Meets Improper Consumer Marketing

declarations.declarationOfInterest: I have no interest, or conflict of interest, concerning this article.
declarations.ethicsApproval: Not applicable.
declarations.funderStatement: No funding was received.

detail.abstract: This analysis examines the commercial exploitation of questionable academic research in consumer health marketing, focusing on Puro Wellness's television advertising campaign in India for "Puro Healthy Salt" and its citation of the paper "Halite; The Rock Salt: Enormous Health Benefits" (Sarker et al., 2016). The company's aggressive marketing claims that rock salt provides cardiovascular and digestive benefits, supported by apparent academic validation, illustrate how predatory publishing enables commercial health misinformation. Critical examination of the cited research reveals systematic scientific failures including complete absence of empirical methodology, therapeutic claims directly contradicting established medical evidence, editorial quality consistent with predatory publishing practices, and violations of regulatory standards governing health claims. The case demonstrates how academically-appearing publications from predatory journals create pathways for unsubstantiated health claims to reach consumers through commercial advertising, potentially causing public health harm through treatment delays and medical non-compliance. This analysis underscores the urgent need for coordinated responses between academic integrity initiatives and consumer protection agencies to address the commercial weaponization of predatory research in health marketing.

AI.tldr: 本文分析了Puro Wellness在印度电视广告中利用可疑学术研究（Sarker等人2016年论文）进行商业健康营销的案例，揭示了掠夺性出版如何为商业健康错误信息提供学术伪证，并呼吁学术界与消费者保护机构协同应对。
AI.research_question: 掠夺性学术出版如何被商业健康营销利用来传播未经证实的健康声称，以及对公共健康造成的潜在危害？
AI.motivation: 商业健康营销中日益频繁地引用可疑学术研究来支持产品声称，这种现象通过掠夺性出版获得学术外观，可能对消费者健康造成严重危害，需要系统分析其机制和影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于学术诚信理论、健康传播理论和消费者保护理论，分析掠夺性出版与商业营销的交叉领域问题。
AI.method: 案例分析法，通过对Puro Wellness电视广告活动及其引用的Sarker等人（2016）论文进行批判性审查。
AI.findings: 被引用的研究存在系统性科学缺陷：完全缺乏实证方法、治疗声称与既定医学证据直接矛盾、编辑质量符合掠夺性出版特征、违反健康声称监管标准。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了掠夺性学术出版如何为商业健康错误信息创造传播路径的理论机制，建立了学术诚信与消费者健康保护的理论联系。
AI.practical_contributions: 为学术诚信倡议和消费者保护机构提供了协同应对的商业武器化掠夺性研究的实践框架，有助于防止类似公共健康危害。

title: Outsourcing Efficiency: Why Germany's Emission Gains Stay Local but the CO 2 Doesn't: A Structural Decomposition Analysis of GHG Emissions and Trade Effects, 1996-2022
affiliations: RWTH Aachen University - Institute for Future Energy Consumer Needs and Behavior (FCN), RWTH Aachen University - Institute for Future Energy Consumer Needs and Behavior (FCN) and RWTH Aachen University - Institute for Future Energy Consumer Needs and Behavior (FCN)

detail.title: Outsourcing Efficiency: Why Germany's Emission Gains Stay Local but the CO 2 Doesn't: A Structural Decomposition Analysis of GHG Emissions and Trade Effects, 1996-2022
detail.abstract: Despite global efforts to mitigate climate change, industrialized nations like Germany often miss their greenhouse gas (GHG) reduction targets. Accurate insights into emission dynamics are essential for developing targeted mitigation strategies. This study uses Structural Decomposition Analysis (SDA) to examine the drivers and inhibitors of Germany’s GHG emissions from 1996 to 2022, utilizing the newly developed Python tool TOAD (Trade-Oriented Analysis through Decomposition). TOAD applies the Dietzenbacher and Los (1998) method across four accounting schemes: Territorial-based (TBE), Consumption-based (CBE), Production-based (PBE) and Balanced Emissions (BE). The results show that the Activity Effect is the dominant driver under the TBE scheme, contributing approximately +309 Mt CO2-eq., while the Emission Intensity Effect emerges as the most significant mitigating factor, reducing emissions by around −617 Mt CO2-eq. The Activity Effect captures changes in the scale of final demand, whereas the Emission Intensity Effect reflects changes in the amount of emissions per unit of output. Under the BE perspective, however, the net reduction amounts to only -38 Mt CO2-eq., as increased emissions embodied in imports (+132 Mt CO2-eq.) offset much of the domestic efficiency gains. Trade-related outsourcing of emissions, particularly through intermediate and final goods, plays a substantial role in shaping Germany’s GHG footprint. These findings emphasize the importance of integrating trade-adjusted perspectives in emission accounting and highlight structural factors that may undermine national climate targets.

AI.tldr: 本研究使用结构分解分析(SDA)和新开发的Python工具TOAD，分析德国1996-2022年温室气体排放动力。结果显示活动效应是主要驱动因素，而排放强度效应是最重要的减排因素。但贸易外包导致出口温室气体增加，减少了国内效率改善的净效果。

AI.theoretical_framework: 结构分解分析(SDA)理论，Dietzenbacher和Los(1998)方法，四种排放账户方案：地域基础(TBE)、消费基础(CBE)、生产基础(PBE)和平衡排放(BE)
AI.method: 使用新开发的Python工具TOAD，采用结构分解分析方法，分析德国1996-2022年间的温室气体排放数据
AI.findings: 活动效应在TBE方案下是主要驱动因素(+309 Mt CO2-eq.)，排放强度效应是最重要减排因素(-617 Mt CO2-eq.)。但BE视角下净减排仅-38 Mt CO2-eq.，因进口体现排放增加(+132 Mt CO2-eq.)抑制了国内效率改善
AI.theory_contributions: 提供了贸易调整视角下的排放账户理论框架，扩展了结构分解分析在环境经济学中的应用
AI.practical_contributions: 告诉政策制定者贸易外包对国家气候目标的差异影响，建议采用更全面的排放账户方法，以避免结构性因素娱视国内减排成果

declarations.ethicsApproval: Ethics were used with participants

detail.abstract: The objectives of this study are to best identify consumer perception of green practice, and their understanding of greenwashing. By understanding consumer perception, we can further identify best practices for companies to communicate their sustainability efforts. This will in turn help to ensure that companies who are working hard from an environmental standpoint reap the benefits of their efforts and likeminded consumers can spend their money in a conscious way. Using online surveys and a thorough literature review, this study exams the following three questions: 1) How do consumers perceive and interpret environmental claims? 2) Are consumers more likely to support brands with clear and credible sustainability initiatives? 3) How do consumers understand and interpret greenwashing? The findings of this study encourage business to market in a transparent, quantitative and easy to follow manner when showcasing sustainability efforts. This study aims to provide recommendations and actionable advice for environmentally conscious businesses to communicate these practices with consumers.

title: Higher Profit, Lower Risk? How Large Language Models Shape Decision Behavior in Supply Chain Optimization
affiliations: Technical University Munich, Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) - Center for Transportation & Logistics, University of Augsburg and University of New South Wales (UNSW)

detail.title: Higher Profit, Lower Risk? How Large Language Models Shape Decision Behavior in Supply Chain Optimization
detail.abstract: Problem definition: Leading supply chain software vendors are integrating Large Language Model (LLM)-based capabilities into their platforms. Although these features move platforms beyond static interfaces with predefined workflows, whether enabling dynamic, conversational interactions improves supply chain decisions remains unclear. This research investigates if access to LLM-aided optimization affects individual decision-making in a stochastic supply chain network design problem. Methodology/results: We designed an interactive LLM-based framework with external optimization capabilities to conduct a behavioral lab experiment. In Part 1 of the experiment, participants select suppliers and production sites under disruption risk. The treatment group has access to the LLM-optimization decision support, while the control group completes the task without this aid. In Part 2, we provide all non-dominated solutions, i.e., decisions that maximize expected profit for a given risk level, and elicit individuals' context-specific risk-reward preferences to assess alignment with their prior decisions. Despite providing all participants with the normative optimal solution in Part 1, chat access increases the likelihood of selecting higher performing solutions. Moreover, comparisons between Part 1 and 2 solutions uncover systematic deviations between groups: participants without chat access tend to undershoot their preferences, settling for suboptimal decisions that sacrifice profit at a given risk. Interestingly, participants with chat access frequently overshoot, taking on more risk than intended in favor of higher expected returns. Overall, chat access attenuates the influence of participants' risk preferences on Part 1 solutions. Managerial implications: LLMs can democratize optimization by improving the interpretability of complex supply chain solutions for non-experts. However, solving problems through interactive chat can lead managers to focus on profit-driven queries, leading to outcomes that increase risk beyond organizational preferences. Thus, organizations must make deliberate, behaviorally-driven design choices when deploying LLM-driven optimization, to ensure decision outcomes align with their risk preferences.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过行为实验发现，在供应链网络设计决策中，接入LLM优化支持虽然能提高决策绩效，但会导致决策者承担超出预期的风险，需要谨慎设计LLM交互界面以确保决策结果符合组织风险偏好。
AI.research_question: 接入基于大型语言模型(LLM)的优化辅助是否会影响个体在随机供应链网络设计问题中的决策行为？
AI.motivation: 主要供应链软件供应商正在将LLM功能集成到平台中，但这些动态对话式交互是否能真正改善供应链决策尚不明确。
AI.theoretical_framework: 行为决策理论、风险偏好理论、人机交互理论
AI.method: 设计了一个具有外部优化功能的交互式LLM框架，进行行为实验室实验。实验分为两部分：第一部分处理组使用LLM优化支持选择供应商和生产地点，对照组不使用；第二部分提供所有非支配解并评估风险-回报偏好。
AI.findings: 1) 聊天接入增加了选择更高绩效解决方案的可能性；2) 无聊天接入的参与者倾向于低估偏好，接受次优决策；3) 有聊天接入的参与者经常超调，承担比预期更高的风险以换取更高回报；4) 聊天接入减弱了参与者风险偏好对决策的影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 1) 揭示了LLM辅助优化对决策行为的系统性影响；2) 发现了聊天交互导致的决策偏差模式（超调现象）；3) 拓展了人机交互在复杂决策环境中的理论理解。
AI.practical_contributions: 1) LLM可以民主化优化技术，提高复杂供应链解决方案的可解释性；2) 提醒组织需要做出行为驱动的设计选择来确保决策结果符合风险偏好；3) 为LLM在供应链管理中的实际部署提供了重要指导。

title: Patents in Paradise: The Evolution of Patent Law in the Cayman Islands
affiliations: Bush School of Government & Public Service / School of Law, University of Kansas School of Law and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Patents in Paradise: The Evolution of Patent Law in the Cayman Islands
detail.abstract: This study examines the Cayman Islands' unique position in the global intellectual property (IP) landscape, contrasting its success as an exporter of financial and legal services with the inherently domestic nature of patent protection. We hypothesize that due to this limitation, the Cayman Islands functions as a strategic, cost-effective jurisdiction for augmenting patent protection initially obtained elsewhere. Our research provides the first comprehensive analysis of Caymanian patents, and through a quantitative examination of patent family data-including filing trends, economic valuation, geographic distribution, and assignee profiles-we find strong empirical evidence to support this thesis. Our findings reveal a disproportionate presence of high-value patent families in the Cayman Islands, particularly within the pharmaceutical and telecommunications sectors. This concentration aligns with the jurisdiction's specific economic characteristics, such as its medical tourism industry and high per capita income, as well as the established international strategies of major pharmaceutical companies. The analysis demonstrates that patent registration in the Cayman Islands is a distinct, specialized function that complements its broader role in global finance and law, offering tailored, low-cost domestic IP rights within a globally oriented portfolio. This study provides a benchmark for how other small jurisdictions can successfully navigate and compete in the global legal market through a specialized approach to intellectual property.

AI.tldr: 开曼群岛在知识产权领域的独特定位研究：作为金融法律服务出口成功案例，却主要作为低成本专利保护补充策略，特别在医药和电信领域高价值专利家族集中。
AI.research_question: 开曼群岛如何在专利保护本质上具有国内属性的限制下，成为全球知识产权战略中的成本效益优化管辖区？
AI.motivation: 开曼群岛作为金融和法律服务出口的成功与其专利保护的国内性质形成鲜明对比，需要探究其如何在这种限制下发挥战略作用。
AI.theoretical_framework: 知识产权全球化理论、专利战略管理理论、小管辖区专业化竞争理论
AI.method: 定量分析专利家族数据，包括申请趋势、经济估值、地理分布和权利人概况
AI.findings: 开曼群岛存在不成比例的高价值专利家族集中，特别是在医药和电信行业，与其医疗旅游产业和高人均收入等经济特征相符
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了小管辖区通过专业化方式在全球法律市场竞争的理论框架，拓展了知识产权全球化理论的应用边界
AI.practical_contributions: 为其他小管辖区提供了通过知识产权专业化策略参与全球法律市场竞争的实践基准和参考模式
