title: A Tale of Two Transitions: Mobility Dynamics in China and Russia after Central Planning
affiliations: University of Chicago, University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) - Global Economics and Management (GEM) Area, University of Chicago - Stone Center for Research on Wealth Inequality and Mobility and Hong Kong University of Science & Technology (HKUST)

detail.title: A Tale of Two Transitions: Mobility Dynamics in China and Russia after Central Planning

publicationDetails.detailsText: University of Chicago, Becker Friedman Institute for Economics Working Paper No. 2025-110
publicationDetails.journalName: Becker Friedman Institute for Economics Working Paper Series

detail.abstract: This paper examines intergenerational mobility in China and Russia during their transitions from central planning to market systems. We consider mobility as movement captured by changes in status between parents and children. We provide estimates of overall mobility, which involves mobility during transition to a system's steady state, as well as steady state mobility, which captures long-run mobility independent of transitional dynamics or shifts in the marginal distribution of outcomes across generations. We further decompose overall mobility into structural and exchange components. We find that China exhibits more overall educational mobility than Russia mostly due to greater structural mobility, while Russia exhibits greater steady state educational mobility. In contrast, both the overall and steady state occupational mobility is similar in China and Russia. Comparing these results to the US, we find that steady state mobility in education is substantially higher in the US and Russia compared to China, but occupational steady state mobility is comparable in all three countries.

AI.tldr: 中国和俄罗斯在转型期间的代际流动性研究：中国教育流动性更高，俄罗斯稳态教育流动性更高，两国职业流动性相似，美国稳态教育流动性最高
AI.research_question: 中国和俄罗斯在从计划经济向市场系统转型期间的代际流动性差异是什么？
AI.motivation: 理解不同经济转型国家在代际流动性方面的差异，以及转型过程对社会移动性的影响
AI.theoretical_framework: 代际流动性理论，结构性流动性与交换性流动性的分解，稳态流动性与过渡性流动性的区分
AI.method: 对中国和俄罗斯的代际流动性进行估计，分解为总体流动性、结构性流动性和交换性流动性，并与美国进行对比
AI.findings: 中国教育总体流动性高于俄罗斯（主要由于结构性流动性），俄罗斯稳态教育流动性高于中国，两国职业流动性相似，美国稳态教育流动性最高
AI.theory_contributions: 提供了一种分解代际流动性的方法论案，区分了转型期间的过渡性流动性与长期稳态流动性
AI.practical_contributions: 为中国和俄罗斯的政策制定者提供了有关代际流动性的实证结果，有助于理解转型过程对社会移动性的影响

title: I Didn't Know Either: How Beliefs about Norms Shape Strategic Ignorance
affiliations: University of California, Merced - Department of Economics

detail.title: I Didn't Know Either: How Beliefs about Norms Shape Strategic Ignorance
detail.abstract: People often avoid information as a way to justify selfish behavior. However, such behavior often unfolds in social contexts, where expectations about others' behavior may shape moral decision-making. This study investigates how beliefs about descriptive norms influence strategic ignorance in a modified moral wiggleroom game. Participants first predicted how often others acquired information, then received randomly assigned feedback indicating high or low rates of ignorance before making their own decision as the dictator. Individuals were more likely to seek information when told that most others typically did so, and more likely to avoid information when told that ignorance was common. Norm-conforming behavior differed between ignorance expectants-those who expected ignorance and reveal expectants-those who expected information acquisition. Ignorance expectants adjusted only when norm cues strongly contradicted their prior beliefs, whereas reveal expectants exhibited modest but consistent responsiveness across norm environments. There is no evidence of ex-ante self-serving belief distortion, though limited behavioral change constrained opportunities to test for ex-post justification. These findings suggest that strategic ignorance responds to descriptive norms, but not through motivated belief distortion.

AI.tldr: 研究表明，人们会根据他人行为的描述性规范来调整自己的信息获取策略，当被告知大多数人会获取信息时，个体更可能寻求信息；当被告知无知很常见时，个体更可能避免信息。但不同预期群体对规范的反应模式不同，没有证据表明存在动机性信念扭曲。
AI.research_question: 描述性规范信念如何影响道德决策中的战略性无知行为？
AI.motivation: 人们经常通过避免信息来为自私行为辩护，但这种行为发生在社会环境中，他人行为的预期可能影响道德决策。
AI.theoretical_framework: 战略性无知理论、描述性规范理论、道德决策理论
AI.method: 修改版道德摇摆空间游戏，参与者先预测他人信息获取频率，然后接收随机分配的高/低无知率反馈，最后作为独裁者做出决策
AI.findings: 个体在被告知大多数人获取信息时更可能寻求信息，在被告知无知常见时更可能避免信息；无知预期者和揭示预期者对规范的反应模式不同；没有发现事前自我服务的信念扭曲证据
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了描述性规范对战略性无知的影响机制，挑战了动机性信念扭曲的解释，深化了对社会规范在道德决策中作用的理解
AI.practical_contributions: 为设计干预措施减少战略性无知行为提供了理论依据，有助于改善组织和社会中的道德决策环境

title: The Real Effects of Tax Havens
affiliations: School of Economics and Business, NMBU, University College Dublin (UCD), Université Libre de Bruxelles (ULB) and Université Paris Dauphine

detail.title: The Real Effects of Tax Havens

declarations.funderStatement: We gratefully acknowledge financial support from the Fund for Scientific Research (FNRS), grant MIS/BEJ F.4533.23, and the Research Council of Norway, grants 325720 and 341289

publicationDetails.journalName: Skatteforsk Centre for Tax Research Paper Series

detail.abstract: It is common to summarize the impact of tax havens as a shift of tax revenues from high to low-tax jurisdictions. This chapter discusses the economic impact of tax havens that goes beyond a zero-sum transfer of the tax base, what we label real effects. We review the literature and focus on exploring how profit shifting affects employment, investment, and innovation in firms. We consider in turn how real effects shape market structure and their implications in general equilibrium. In conclusion, we propose some potential pathways for future research in terms of methodology and areas that we deem promising for further exploration.

AI.tldr: 本文综述了避税天堂对经济的真实影响，超越了传统的税收转移视角，重点探讨了利润转移如何影响企业的就业、投资和创新，并分析了这些真实效应对市场结构和一般均衡的影响。
AI.research_question: 避税天堂除了税收转移外，对经济还有哪些真实影响？利润转移如何影响企业的就业、投资和创新活动？
AI.motivation: 传统观点将避税天堂的影响视为高税区向低税区的零和税收转移，但忽略了其对实体经济活动的真实影响，需要更全面地理解避税天堂的经济后果。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于避税天堂经济学、企业行为理论和一般均衡理论，分析利润转移对实体经济的影响机制。
AI.method: 文献综述法，系统梳理和评述现有关于避税天堂真实经济效应的研究文献。
AI.findings: 利润转移不仅影响税收分配，还会显著影响企业的就业决策、投资行为和创新能力，进而改变市场结构和整体经济均衡。
AI.theory_contributions: 拓展了避税天堂研究的理论框架，从单纯的税收转移视角转向更全面的真实经济效应分析，为理解企业全球化行为提供了新视角。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了更全面的避税天堂影响评估框架，有助于设计更有效的国际税收政策和监管措施。

title: Heterogeneous Currency Risk
affiliations: Department of Economics at Harvard University and Stockholm School of Economics

detail.title: Heterogeneous Currency Risk

keywords: Financial Markets; Saving and Capital Investment

detail.abstract: Regulators in many emerging markets face a tradeoff: Restricting banks from holding currency mismatches on balance sheet may result in more widespread currency mismatch among bank-dependent domestic firms, including small and medium-sized enterprises (SME). We argue that macro outcomes following a depreciation event depend on the joint distribution of (i) firm foreign currency exposures and (ii) firm marginal propensities to invest, which can be higher for these SMEs. We characterize macro dynamics in this setting using a model in which firms face idiosyncratic profitability risk, liquidity constraints, and foreign currency debt revaluations. Calibrating our model to micro data from Peru, we find that depreciations are costlier than in a model that considers the exposure of a representative large firm. We conclude that exposures of SMEs to debt revaluations are an important macroeconomic channel for currency devaluations.

AI.tldr: 这篇论文研究了新兴市场中银行货币不匹配限制对中小企业的影响，发现货币跌值对小企业的冲击比大企业更大，是重要的宏观经济传导机制。
AI.research_question: 银行货币不匹配限制如何影响中小企业的货币暴露和宏观经济效果？
AI.motivation: 监管机构在限制银行货币不匹配时面临两难选择：要么银行持有货币不匹配，要么中小企业面临更广泛的货币风险。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于企业特异性盛利风险、流动性约束和外币债务重新评估的宏观经济模型。
AI.method: 使用微观数据对密鲁模型进行检验，分析企业外币暴露和投资倿倾的聚合分布。
AI.findings: 货币跌值在考虑中小企业暴露的情况下成本更高，比代表性大企业模型的预估更严重。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了企业外币暴露与边际投资倿倾的聚合分布对宏观结果的重要性，丰富了货币低估宏观效应的理论基础。
AI.practical_contributions: 为新兴市场监管机构提供了政策建议，应关注银行货币限制对中小企业的间接影响，并考虑小企业货币风险的宏观经济含义。

title: Financial Sector Interconnectedness, Monetary Policy Transmission and Credit to the Non-Financial Sectors
affiliations: Bank of Portugal

detail.title: Financial Sector Interconnectedness, Monetary Policy Transmission and Credit to the Non-Financial Sectors
detail.abstract: This paper studies how interconnectedness among the financial sectors interacts with monetary policy transmission and credit to the non-financial sectors. It finds that it attenuates the effect of monetary policy: credit growth is less affected by changes in policy rates in the presence of interconnectedness. The latter is more salient in the case of credit provided by banks to the aggregate private non-financial sector and households individually. Additionally, both the interconnections between banks and non-banks, as well as between both sectors, are important. For this purpose, the paper relies on measures of intra-financial assets, which are determined, for banks and non-banks and in a large sample of European countries, using consolidated and non-consolidated financial account data. These measures uncover significant changes in the structure of these positions: on the one hand, there was a notable increase of intra-financial assets among the non-bank financial sectors and between the latter and banks while, on the other hand, intra-financial positions of banks have progressively declined since the Global Financial Crisis, in line with the reduction in intra-bank activity and the deleveraging efforts of the sector.

AI.tldr: 金融部门间的相互联络弱化了货币政策传导效果，使得政策利率变化对信贷增长的影响减小，尤其是银行向私营非金融部门和家庭提供的信贷。银行与非银行金融机构之间以及两者内部的相互联络都起重要作用。
AI.research_question: 金融部门间的相互联络如何影响货币政策传导和向非金融部门的信贷提供？
AI.motivation: 理解金融系统内部相互联络对货币政策效果的影响，帮助政策制定者更好地评估和调整货币政策措施。
AI.theoretical_framework: 金融相互联络理论、货币政策传导机制、信贷供给渠道理论
AI.method: 使用欧洲国家的合并与非合并财务账户数据，构建银行和非银行金融机构的内部金融资产指标，分析金融部门间相互联络对货币政策效果的调节作用。
AI.findings: 金融部门间相互联络弱化了货币政策对信贷增长的影响；银行向私营非金融部门和家庭的信贷受影响更为显著；银行与非银行之间以及两者内部的联络都重要；全球金融危机后银行内部资产逐渐减少，非银行金融部门内部以及与银行之间的资产增加。
AI.theory_contributions: 完善了金融相互联络对货币政策传导效果影响的理论框架，揭示了不同金融部门间相互联络的异质性作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为货币政策制定者提供了重要参考，帮助关注金融系统内部结构变化对政策效果的影响，提高政策调控的精准性和有效性。

title: Make-or-Buy versus Make-and-Sell: Industry Structure and the Trade-off between Economies of Scale and Specialization
affiliations: Frankfurt School of Finance & Management - Economics Department and WHU - Otto Beisheim School of Management

detail.title: Make-or-Buy versus Make-and-Sell: Industry Structure and the Trade-off between Economies of Scale and Specialization
detail.abstract: In many industries, a core strategic question faced by downstream firms is whether to outsource input production or services-and if so, to decide between buying from a pure input supplier or from a firm that uses the input itself. This paper develops a game-theoretic model to study these questions, explicitly accounting not only for the classic make-or-buy decision but also the possibility for firms to adopt a "make-and-sell" strategy by supplying inputs to other downstream firms. Specifically, we consider an environment where downstream firms require a common input but differ in their ideal input characteristics. In this setting, outsourcing decisions involve a trade-off between specialization and economies of scale, departing from the traditional view that the two are inherently linked. The trade-off arises because if several firms produce in-house, inputs are better tailored to the specific needs, but scale economies are left unexploited. The resulting industry structure emerges endogenously from firms' strategic production and sourcing decisions. Our analysis shows that a pure input supplier can be active in equilibrium, even though it offers neither technological nor competitive advantages. The reason is that it better balances the need for specialized inputs and the gains from economies of scale than downstream firms. We also find that the pure supplier’s payoff is non-monotonic in its bargaining power, and characterize conditions under which the resulting industry structures are efficient. Our results are robust to various extensions, including economies of scope in production.

AI.tldr: 本文开发了一个博弈论模型，研究下游企业在外包决策时面临的选择：自制、从纯供应商购买，或从使用该投入品的竞争对手购买。研究发现纯供应商可以在均衡中存在，即使没有技术或竞争优势，因为它能更好地平衡专业化需求和规模经济收益。
AI.research_question: 下游企业应该如何做出外包决策？是选择自制、从纯供应商购买，还是从使用相同投入品的竞争对手购买？
AI.motivation: 许多行业中的核心战略问题是外包决策，传统观点认为专业化和规模经济是内在关联的，但现实中企业需要在这两者之间做出权衡。
AI.theoretical_framework: 博弈论模型，分析下游企业在投入品生产或服务外包决策中的战略选择。
AI.method: 构建博弈论模型，考虑下游企业对共同投入品的需求但理想特征不同，分析内生形成的行业结构。
AI.findings: 纯供应商可以在均衡中活跃，即使没有技术或竞争优势；纯供应商的收益与其议价能力呈非单调关系；在某些条件下形成的行业结构是有效的。
AI.theory_contributions: 挑战了专业化和规模经济内在关联的传统观点，提出了新的权衡框架；解释了纯供应商存在的理论机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为企业外包决策提供理论指导；帮助管理者理解在专业化和规模经济之间的权衡；为行业结构分析提供新的视角。

title: The Epistemic Function of Institutions
affiliations: Mercatus Center at George Mason University and Leiden University Centre for the Arts in Society (LUCAS)

detail.title: The Epistemic Function of Institutions
detail.abstract: This chapter analyzes the epistemic functions of institutions in economic life. We distinguish between four different perspectives: (1) institutions as shared mental models that guide interpretation and behavior (Denzau and North); (2) institutions as environmental heuristics that support task performance under cognitive limitations (Gigerenzer); (3) institutions as social technologies that facilitate the division of knowledge and cooperation (Hayek); and (4) institutions as enacted practices constitutive of economic action, rooted in 4E cognition theories (Gallagher). These four conceptions are complementary for applied research, because they recognize different epistemic and economic functions of institutions. But theoretically these perspectives are only partially compatible, because of their differing cognitive underpinnings-ranging from internalist to external and enactivist views. We argue that there are several reasons to move beyond internalism (also called cognitivism) which implies that institutions are primarily relevant as aids to the individual mind. Accounts rooted in externalist (also called the external mind) are more compatible with institutional economics, and an economics which recognizes the relevance of fundamental uncertainty. In such accounts institutions are not merely rules or heuristics as is commonly assumed but come to occupy a central epistemic role as points of orientation and generators of knowledge. As such institutions perform cognitive functions in economic life that no individual mind could perform.

AI.tldr: 本章分析了制度在经济生活中的认知功能，区分了四种不同视角：共享心智模型、环境启发式、社会技术和实践构成。这些视角在应用研究中互补，但在理论上因认知基础不同而部分兼容。作者主张超越内部主义，采用外部主义视角，认为制度在根本不确定性下扮演核心认知角色。
AI.research_question: 制度在经济生活中扮演什么样的认知功能？不同理论视角如何理解和解释这些功能？
AI.motivation: 现有制度经济学研究对制度的认知功能理解不足，需要系统梳理不同理论视角并探讨其兼容性，以深化对制度在经济生活中认知作用的认识。
AI.theoretical_framework: 四种理论框架：1) Denzau和North的共享心智模型理论；2) Gigerenzer的环境启发式理论；3) Hayek的社会技术理论；4) Gallagher的4E认知理论（基于实践构成的观点）
AI.method: 理论分析框架，通过比较和综合四种不同的制度认知功能理论视角
AI.findings: 四种视角在应用研究中具有互补性，但在理论上因认知基础（从内部主义到外部主义和生成主义）不同而部分兼容；外部主义视角更适合制度经济学和承认根本不确定性的经济学
AI.theory_contributions: 系统梳理了制度的四种认知功能理论，提出了超越内部主义（认知主义）的理论框架，强调了制度作为知识生成器和导向点的核心认知角色
AI.practical_contributions: 为制度设计和政策制定提供了更全面的理论指导，特别是在面对根本不确定性的经济环境中，制度设计应考虑其认知功能而不仅仅是规则约束功能

title: Leveraged Buyouts as a Financial Engineering Strategy: Global Perspectives, Indian Insights, and Regulatory Landscape
affiliations: ICFAI Business School (IBS) Hyderabad, India

detail.title: Leveraged Buyouts as a Financial Engineering Strategy: Global Perspectives, Indian Insights, and Regulatory Landscape

keywords: Leveraged Buyouts as a Financial Engineering Strategy Dr. Srikanth Potharla Leveraged Buyouts as a Financial Engineering Strategy: Global Perspectives

detail.abstract: This article provides a comprehensive examination of Leveraged Buyouts (LBOs), tracing their evolution, theoretical foundations, strategic rationales, and practical execution across global and Indian contexts. It begins by outlining the mechanics of LBOs, highlighting their reliance on high debt financing secured by the target company's assets and cash flows, and the role of special purpose vehicles (SPVs) in structuring transactions. The discussion integrates multiple theoretical lenses-agency theory, free cash flow hypothesis, capital structure theory, and behavioral finance-to explain the motivations, governance implications, and potential pitfalls of LBOs. Historical milestones, including the rise of mega-deals in the U.S. and U.K., the post-2008 slowdown, and the resurgence in the 2010s, are juxtaposed with India's gradual adoption, shaped by regulatory constraints, evolving debt markets, and private credit growth. The article analyzes value drivers such as tax shields, operational discipline, and concentrated ownership, alongside risks from over-leverage, debt overhang, and market cyclicality. It also compares regulatory frameworks across jurisdictions, detailing the influence of takeover codes, disclosure norms, and capital market depth on deal feasibility. Contemporary trends such as ESG-linked financing, technology-enabled due diligence, and increased private equity involvement are assessed for their impact on future LBO activity. A series of global and Indian case studies illustrates varied deal structures, outcomes, and stakeholder effects. Policy recommendations emphasize the need for transparency, minority shareholder protection, and prudent leverage management. By combining academic theory with market practice and jurisdictional analysis, the article offers a holistic reference for scholars, policymakers, and practitioners seeking to understand the strategic and economic significance of LBOs in an evolving financial landscape.

AI.tldr: 本文全面分析了杠杆收购（LBOs）的理论基础、战略理由、实践执行以及全球和印度市场的差异。通过多理论视角、历史演变、价值驱动因素和监管对比揭示LBOs的机制、风险和发展趋势，为学者、政策制定者和实务工作者提供综合参考。
AI.research_question: 杠杆收购（LBOs）在全球和印度市场中的理论基础、实践执行、价值创造机制以及监管环境如何影响其发展趋势和成效？
AI.motivation: 将学术理论与市场实践相结合，提供一个全面的视角来理解LBOs的战略意义和经济影响，以满足学术界、政策制定者和实务从业者在时代变化中的需求。
AI.theoretical_framework: 代理理论、自由现金流假诺、资本结构理论、行为金融学
AI.method: 理论分析、历史演变分析、监管对比分析、案例研究（全球和印度案例）
AI.findings: LBOs依靠高债务融资，通过税收盾彩、运营纪律和集中手指控制创造价债，但面临过度杠杆、债务压力和市场周期性风险。监管环境和市场深度影响交易可行性，当代趋势如ESG融资、科技尾调和私募股权作用日益增强。
AI.theory_contributions: 整合多重理论视角来解释LBOs的动机、治理含义和潜在风险，为理论研究提供了更全面的分析框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 通过全球和印度案例研究展示了不同交易结构、结果和利益相关方影响，为实务工作者提供了实践指导和政策建议，强调透明度、少数股东保护和谨慎杠杆管理的重要性。

title: Evaluating Land Use/Land Cover Dynamics in Guder-Huluka Rivers Catchment of Upper Nile Basin: Implication for Sustainable Land Management in Ethiopia
affiliations: Addis Ababa University, Addis Ababa University, Debre Berhan University and Wolkite University

detail.title: Evaluating Land Use/Land Cover Dynamics in Guder-Huluka Rivers Catchment of Upper Nile Basin: Implication for Sustainable Land Management in Ethiopia
detail.abstract: The land use/land cover dynamics has broad effect on human, animal and plant at global level, which triggers climate change and loss of biodiversity. The primary objective of this study is to find out the changes of land use/land cover (LU/LC), assess its drivers, magnitude and implication for land management over thirty years (1994-2024) in the Upper Nile Basin. The methods used for this research were GIS techniques; field assessment, household survey, key informant interview, and focal group discussion. The land use/land cover change analysis for the year of 1994, 2004, 2014 and 2024 were conducted using both supervised and unsupervised maximum likelihood image classification was employed in combination with the visual interpretation of satellite images to categories and map LULC classes of the study landscape maximum likelihoods classifier technique. The study analysis indicated that five types of land use types were identified, these are cultivated land, forest land, grassland, built-up mainly settlement and water bodies. The analysis indicated that cultivated and settlement increased by 21.68% and 130.6%, respectively. On the other hand, forest land and grassland decreased by 12.9% and -9.63%, respectively, but the water body is constant throughout the study periods. The change was primarily due to expansion of cultivated land and built-up area by gaining lands from forest and grassland. The output suggests that there is a significant increase in cultivation land and urbanization with the expense of decreasing of forest land and grassland. Agricultural activities and settlements were showing radical increment in gentle slope areas while the remnant forest left in high altitude areas. In the steep slope part of the catchment area, the local farmers have been saved grassland from their farm land for their livestock feeding. The socio-economic survey data emphasized that population growth, cultivated land expansion, firewood and construction wood scarcity, soil loss, and settlement expansion as the driving factors for land use /land cover changes. Therefore, the findings highlighted the importance of introducing sustainable land management that help to create balance the need of local community and the landscape ecology.

AI.tldr: 上尼罗河港基地30年间土地利用变化分析，耗材地和建筑用地大幅增加，森林和草地减少，人口增长和农业扩张是主要驱动因素
AI.research_question: 上尼罗河港基地1994-2024年间土地利用/土地覆盖的变化趋势、驱动因素及对土地管理的影响
AI.motivation: 土地利用/土地覆盖变化对全球气候变化和生物多样性丢失产生重大影响，需要研究具体水文基地的变化规律
AI.theoretical_framework: 土地利用变化理论、生态系统动态理论、人地关系理论
AI.method: GIS技术、地面调查、家庭调查、关键信息人访谈、小组讨论，使用监督和非监督最大概率图像分类技术
AI.findings: 耗材地增加21.68%，定居点增加130.6%，森林地减少12.9%，草地减少9.63%，水体保持稳定，变化主要由农耕地和建筑用地扩张导致
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了水文基地土地利用变化的理论研究，提供了长时序变化的实证数据支撑
AI.practical_contributions: 为当地土地管理提供了科学依据，建议引入可持续土地管理策略，平衡社区需求与生态环境保护

title: Electric Vehicle Tensions: An Event Study of Chinese EV Corporations and Western Trade Protectionism
affiliations: Independent and Independent

detail.title: Electric Vehicle Tensions: An Event Study of Chinese EV Corporations and Western Trade Protectionism

declarations.declarationOfInterest: Not applicable
declarations.ethicsApproval: No applicable
declarations.funderStatement: Not applicable

detail.abstract: This paper examines how Western policies impact global electric vehicle (EV) markets, with a focus on Chinese manufacturers. Using a classical event-study approach and Fama-French five-factor models, we analyze daily stock price reactions to Western policy announcements and Chinese EV product launches. Results show that Chinese product launches tend to negatively impact global competitors, highlighting their growing market power. In response, Western trade policies cause immediate, statistically significant losses for Chinese EV firms, though they have limited positive effects on Western companies. The findings suggest that while protectionist policies can weaken foreign rivals, relieving competitive pressure, they do not necessarily lead to appreciable gains in expected profits for domestic incumbents.

AI.tldr: 本文通过事件研究法分析西方政策和中国电动车产品发布对全球股市的影响，发现保护主义政策虽能削弱中国企业但无法给西方公司带来显著盈利。
AI.research_question: 西方政策如何影响全球电动车市场，尤其是中国制造商与西方企业之间的竞争动态？
AI.motivation: 电动车行业全球化特征显著，中国制造商快速占领市场份额，引发西方国家的贸易保护政策响应，需要研究这些政策的实际效果。
AI.theoretical_framework: 事件研究法(Event-study approach)、Fama-French五因子模型，金融市场效率理论
AI.method: 采用日度股价数据，分析西方政策公告和中国EV产品发布的股价反应，进行统计显著性检验
AI.findings: 中国产品发布对全球竞争对手产生负面影响；西方贸易政策立即造成中国EV企业的统计显著损失，但对西方公司的正面效果有限
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了贸易政策在全球化股票市场中传导机制的理论研究，提供了保护主义政策效果的实证证据
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供关于贸易保护政策实际效果的实证参考，帮助企业理解全球政策环境变化对市场竞争的影响

title: Governing Self-Modifying AI: A Federal Framework for Runtime Safety
affiliations: Cinderpoint Dynamics

detail.title: Governing Self-Modifying AI: A Federal Framework for Runtime Safety
detail.abstract: Self-modifying artificial intelligence systems can alter their own code during operation, creating runtime safety risks that current U.S. policy frameworks do not adequately address. This paper proposes a three-pillar federal framework combining mandatory technical safeguards, organizational oversight, and shared learning mechanisms to ensure safe deployment of adaptive AI. The framework includes runtime monitoring with deviation alerts, clear liability rules, and a national AI incident registry modeled on existing vulnerability disclosure systems.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一个三支柱联邦框架来解决自修改AI系统的运行时安全风险，包括技术保障、组织监督和共享学习机制
AI.research_question: 如何构建有效的政策框架来确保自修改人工智能系统的安全部署？
AI.motivation: 当前美国政策框架无法充分应对自修改AI系统在运行时修改自身代码所带来的安全风险
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于风险管理理论和适应性治理框架，结合技术安全、组织监督和知识共享三个维度
AI.method: 提出三支柱联邦框架设计：技术保障措施、组织监督机制和共享学习系统
AI.findings: 需要强制性的运行时监控与偏差警报、明确的责任规则以及国家AI事件注册系统
AI.theory_contributions: 为自修改AI系统安全治理提供了综合性的理论框架，整合了技术、组织和制度三个层面的治理要素
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了具体的实施建议，包括建立类似现有漏洞披露系统的国家AI事件注册机制

title: Generative AI's Impact on Student Achievement and Implications for Worker Productivity
affiliations: Hebrew University of Jerusalem - Department of Economics, Hebrew University of Jerusalem and The Hebrew University of Jerusalem

detail.title: Generative AI's Impact on Student Achievement and Implications for Worker Productivity
detail.abstract: Student use of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in higher education is reshaping learning and redefining the skills of future workers. Using student-course data from a top Israeli university, we examine the impact of generative AI tools on academic performance. Comparisons across more and less AI-compatible courses before and after ChatGPT's introduction show that AI availability raises grades, especially for lower-performing students, and compresses the grade distribution, eroding the signal value of grades for employers. Evidence suggests gains in AI-specific human capital but possible losses in traditional human capital, highlighting benefits and costs AI may impose on future workforce productivity.

AI.tldr: 人工智能工具的使用提高了大学生成绩，特别是低分学生，但压缩了成绩分布，影响了成绩的信号价值，同时带来了AI特定人力资本增长与传统技能损失的判断困难。
AI.research_question: 生成式AI工具如何影响高等教育中的学术表现？对将来劳动力生产率有何利弊？
AI.motivation: AI在高等教育中的广泛使用正在改变学习方式和重定义未来劳动者技能，需要识别其对学术表现的影响和对劳动力市场的潜在启示。
AI.theoretical_framework: 人力资本理论，教育信号理论，技术补偶性与替代性理论
AI.method: 利用以色列顶尖大学的学生-课程数据，采用差分差分析法，比较ChatGPT推出前后不同AI兼容性课程的成绩变化。
AI.findings: AI的使用提高了总体成绩，特别是低分学生获益更多；成绩分布变得更为压缩，减弱了成绩的信号作用；学生获得了AI特定人力资本，但可能损失了部分传统技能。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了技术进步对人力资本累积和教育信号作用的理论理解，提供了AI时代下学术表现重构的实证基础。
AI.practical_contributions: 为教育机构和企业提供了关于AI应用对学生能力评估和劳动力市场信号的实证见解，有助于形成更有效的教育政策和人才选拤策略。

title: Institutional Limits to Gender Equity: Structural Constraints and Title IX Enforcement in US College Athletics
affiliations: University of Michigan at Ann Arbor and Towson University - Department of Economics

detail.title: Institutional Limits to Gender Equity: Structural Constraints and Title IX Enforcement in US College Athletics
detail.abstract: We examine how NCAA institutions respond to Title IX compliance imbalances in athletic programs with a focus on institutional constraints. Using data from 2003 to 2022, we study whether lagged imbalances in sports programs, athlete participation, and expenditures by gender predict subsequent adjustments. Our results indicate that institutions respond to imbalances by expanding athletic opportunities for women. The slight asymmetry in marginal responses suggests that compliance efforts are often shaped by structural boundaries. We highlight an emerging tension in the post-House v. NCAA landscape: the dual pursuit of Title IX compliance and scholarship expansion reflects increasingly divergent institutional objectives.

AI.tldr: NCAA院校通过扩大女性体育机会来应对Title IX合规失衡，但结构性限制导致边际响应不对称，在House v. NCAA案后合规与奖学金扩张目标日益分化
AI.research_question: NCAA院校如何应对Title IX合规失衡，以及制度约束如何影响这种响应
AI.motivation: 研究Title IX合规失衡背景下院校的响应机制，特别是在制度约束条件下的调整行为
AI.theoretical_framework: 制度约束理论、组织响应理论、性别平等政策执行理论
AI.method: 使用2003-2022年面板数据，分析体育项目、运动员参与和支出方面的性别失衡对后续调整的预测作用
AI.findings: 院校通过扩大女性体育机会来应对失衡，但边际响应存在轻微不对称，表明合规努力受到结构性边界限制
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了制度约束下政策合规的动态调整机制，拓展了组织响应理论在体育政策领域的应用
AI.practical_contributions: 为NCAA院校Title IX合规实践提供实证依据，指出后House v. NCAA时代合规目标与奖学金扩张目标之间的张力

title: Integrating ESG into SME Financial Decision-Making: A Practical Model for Emerging Economies
affiliations: University of London

detail.title: Integrating ESG into SME Financial Decision-Making: A Practical Model for Emerging Economies
detail.abstract:
The worldwide transition to sustainable and responsible business practices has transformed Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) principles from a marginal issue to a fundamental component of company strategy. Despite the abundance of literature and frameworks for major multinational businesses, a notable deficiency remains in the application of these models to Small and Medium-sized Enterprises (SMEs), especially in emerging economies. These firms, essential to their national economies and pivotal for attaining global sustainability objectives, encounter distinct challenges including resource limitations, knowledge deficiencies, and the necessity of emphasizing short-term economic growth. 

This research presents a pragmatic, incremental methodology to address this disparity. The framework, named the Phased ESG Integration Model for Emerging Market SMEs, is a systematic, three-phase methodology intended to be scalable and implementable. The process commences with a Foundational Assessment, when subject matter experts perform a streamlined materiality analysis to synchronize ESG priorities with fundamental business strategy and stakeholder expectations. Subsequently, Operational Integration emphasizes the execution of high-impact, low-cost "quick wins" that yield immediate financial benefits, thus alleviating the challenge of short-term financial constraints. The last step, Measurement, Reporting, and Value Creation, assists SMEs in formulating straightforward key performance indicators and transparent reporting to unveil new prospects, including access to specialized sustainable finance. 

The approach is based on the premise that a supportive ecosystem is crucial for its success. The document emphasizes the essential functions of governments, financial institutions, and major enterprises in delivering specific incentives, customized finance, and capacity-building resources. Case studies from emerging economies, such as Qatar and Colombia, demonstrate how this multi-stakeholder partnership can convert the theoretical necessity of ESG into concrete economic and social advantages. The model offers a practical solution to the distinct issues faced by emerging economies, delineating a clear framework for SMEs to integrate sustainability into their financial decision-making, bolster resilience, and promote inclusive, long-term economic development.

AI.tldr: 本研究为新兴市场中小企业提出了一种分阶段的ESG集成模型，通过基础评估、运营集成和测量报告三个阶段，解决中小企业在资源、知识和短期经济压力方面的挑战，并强调多方利益相关者合作的重要性。
AI.research_question: 如何为新兴市场中小企业开发一种可扩展、可实施的ESG集成模型，以解决其资源有限、知识缺乏和短期经济压力等特有挑战？
AI.motivation: 尽管ESG原则已成为全球企业战略的核心组成部分，但现有研究和框架主要集中在大型多国企业，新兴市场中小企业在ESG应用方面存在显著空白，而这些企业对于国家经济和全球可持续发展目标至关重要。
AI.theoretical_framework: 研究基于可持续发展理论和利益相关者理论，强调支持性生态系统对于ESG成功集成的关键作用，包括政府、金融机构和大型企业的参与。
AI.method: 研究提出了一种分三阶段的渐进式方法论：基础评估阶段（专家进行简化的重要性分析）、运营集成阶段（实施高影响低成本的"快速胜利"项目）、测量报告与价值创造阶段（制定简洁KPI和透明报告）。
AI.findings: 该模型通过实际案例（如卡塔尔和哥伦比亚）验证了其可行性，多方利益相关者合作能够将ESG理论需求转化为具体的经济和社会政策利益，为中小企业提供了可持续发展的实践路径。
AI.theory_contributions: 本文填补了现有ESG研究在中小企业特别是新兴市场中小企业领域的研究空白，提出了一种基于渐进效应和生态系统观的新理论框架，丰富了可持续发展理论在微观企业层面的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 研究为新兴市场中小企业提供了一个具体可操作的ESG集成框架，帮助其充分利用有限资源实现可持续发展，同时为政府、金融机构等利益相关方提供了支持中小企业ESG转型的具体政策建议。

title: The Yeoman's Portfolio: Measuring Risk Preferences Historically Using Crop Choice
affiliations: University of Connecticut and University of Connecticut

detail.title: The Yeoman's Portfolio: Measuring Risk Preferences Historically Using Crop Choice
detail.abstract: We design a new method for measuring the risk preferences of agents in the past using data on agricultural production decisions. Using our method, we estimate risk preferences in 93% of contiguous U.S. counties decennially from 1890 to 1920. Our results reveal substantial cross-sectional heterogeneity in preferences centered at risk neutrality, and temporal variation in response to aggregate shocks. We show that measured risk aversion is negatively correlated with financial risk-taking within and outside the agricultural context, is representative of the underlying household preference distribution, and that individuals in counties with higher exposure to the American frontier were more risk-taking.

AI.tldr: 通过农业生产决策数据进行历史风险偏好测量，发现美国县级风险偏好存在显著差异，且与金融风险承受度负相关，西部边疆开发影响风险偏好
AI.research_question: 如何重新构建历史时期个体的风险偏好？风险偏好在空间和时间上的变化模式是什么？风险偏好如何影响经济行为？
AI.motivation: 传统风险偏好测量方法在历史数据中应用有限，需要开发新方法来重新构建历史上个体的风险偏好，以理解经济发展和行为选择的深层机制
AI.theoretical_framework: 期望效用理论下的风险偏好模型，农业生产决策理论，空间经济学中的偏好传播机制
AI.method: 设计新的风险偏好测量方法，利用农业生产决策数据，对美国连续53个县1890-1920年每十年进行风险偏好估计
AI.findings: 发现显著的空间异质性（以风险中性为中心）和时间变化（响应总体冲击）；风险避免程度与金融风险承受度呈负相关；美国西部边疆更高的县个体更偏向风险承受
AI.theory_contributions: 开发了重新构建历史风险偏好的新方法，扩展了偏好测量在时间维度上的应用，为理解偏好形成和传播提供理论支撑
AI.practical_contributions: 提供了美国历史上风险偏好的空间分布图谱，为政策制定者理解地方经济行为差异提供参考，对于理解边疆开发对人们风险态度的影响具有重要意义

title: Measuring Drug Trade Intensity and Economic Development: A Framework for Analyzing Institutional Degradation Pathways in Latin America
affiliations: Independent

detail.title: Measuring Drug Trade Intensity and Economic Development: A Framework for Analyzing Institutional Degradation Pathways in Latin America
detail.abstract:
Drug trafficking poses a persistent threat to economic development across Latin America, yet existing research provides limited guidance on specific mechanisms through which illicit economies constrain growth or how effects vary across country contexts. This study addresses these gaps by developing a comprehensive framework for analyzing drug trade impacts on economic development and constructing a novel Drug Trade Intensity Index (DTII).

We develop a comprehensive measure of drug trade intensity using principal component analysis to combine indicators across three institutional dimensions: security deterioration, corruption, and economic distortion. Our analytical framework employs panel fixed effects models with geographic characteristics as instrumental variables to address endogeneity concerns.

Our framework theorizes that drug trade affects economic development through three distinct institutional degradation pathways, with systematic geographic heterogeneity. We hypothesize that security deterioration should dominate in transit countries, where trafficking organizations compete violently for route control, while corruption should have the largest impact in production countries, where operations require systematic state capture.

This research makes four key contributions: (1) the first multi-dimensional measurement framework for drug trade intensity, (2) a comprehensive empirical strategy for establishing causal relationships, (3) systematic geographic heterogeneity theory providing testable hypotheses, and (4) a complete implementation framework for future research.

Our theoretical analysis demonstrates that effective anti-drug policies must be tailored to countries' specific roles in trafficking networks. Transit countries should prioritize violence reduction, while production countries should focus on judicial reform and anti-corruption efforts. Beyond drug policy, our framework has implications for understanding economic development in fragile states and other contexts involving illicit economies.

The institutional degradation caused by drug trade is neither inevitable nor uniform across contexts. Countries can take evidence-based actions to mitigate effects, but success requires understanding which institutional channels matter most in their specific circumstances.

AI.tldr: 本研究开发了一个分析毒品贸易对经济发展影响的综合框架，构建了新颖的毒品贸易强度指数（DTII），通过三个制度退化路径（安全恶化、腐败和经济扭曲）分析影响，并发现地理异质性效应。
AI.research_question: 毒品贸易如何通过不同的制度退化机制影响拉丁美洲的经济发展？这些影响在不同国家背景下有何差异？
AI.motivation: 现有研究对非法经济如何制约经济增长的具体机制以及不同国家背景下的影响差异提供有限指导，毒品贸易对拉丁美洲经济发展构成持续威胁。
AI.theoretical_framework: 制度退化理论框架，提出毒品贸易通过三个路径影响经济发展：安全恶化、腐败和经济扭曲，并具有系统性地理异质性。
AI.method: 使用主成分分析构建毒品贸易强度综合指标，采用面板固定效应模型，以地理特征作为工具变量解决内生性问题。
AI.findings: 毒品贸易对经济发展的影响具有地理异质性：过境国的安全恶化效应主导，生产国的腐败效应最大。有效的禁毒政策需要根据国家在贩运网络中的具体角色量身定制。
AI.theory_contributions: 1）首个多维度的毒品贸易强度测量框架；2）建立因果关系的综合实证策略；3）提供可检验假设的系统性地理异质性理论；4）为未来研究提供完整的实施框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定提供实证依据：过境国应优先减少暴力，生产国应注重司法改革和反腐败。框架还可用于理解脆弱国家和其他涉及非法经济情境下的经济发展问题。

detail.abstract: This paper analyzes patterns of majority language acquisition in an economy consisting of a majority group and multiple minority groups. We consider contexts in which allows individuals choose among three options: full learning, partial learning, or no learning of the majority language. The key innovation in our approach is the introduction of a conformity factor in language acquisition, where peer pressure and community status may outweigh communicative and economic incentives for some individuals. Notably, we identify a non-monotonic relationship between the level of conformity and the distribution of full learners, partial learners, and nonlearners in equilibrium. This finding is significant for policy considerations, as small adjustments in language acquisition costs may unpredictably influence language acquisition patterns across minority groups.

AI.tldr: 这篇论文分析了多数群体语言获得模式，通过引入从众因素考察个体在完全学习、部分学习和不学习之间的选择，发现了从众水平与语言获得分布之间的非单调关系，对语言政策有重要意义。
AI.research_question: 多少数群体组成的经济体中，从众因素如何影响个体对多数语言完全学习、部分学习和不学习的选择？
AI.motivation: 传统语言获得研究主要关注通信和经济刺激，忽视了社会从众压力和社区地位等社会因素的影响。需要探索这些因素如何形成语言学习的非单调关系。
AI.theoretical_framework: 语言获得理论、游戏理论、从众行为理论，重点考虑社会规范和同伴压力对个体语言选择的影响。
AI.method: 理论建模方法，构建包含多数群体和多个少数群体的经济模型，设置三种语言学习选择，引入从众因子来分析平衡状态下的语言获得分布。
AI.findings: 发现了从众水平与完全学习者、部分学习者和非学习者分布之间的非单调关系，语言获得成本的小幅调整可能导致不可预测的语言获得模式变化。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了语言获得理论，将社会从众因素系统地纳入分析框架，提供了解释语言学习选择的新视角。
AI.practical_contributions: 为语言政策制定者提供重要启示，语言获得成本的微调可能造成意想不到的结果，需要更加谨慎地设计政策措施。

detail.abstract: This paper computed the monetary policy uncertainty for the economy of Pakistan using leading English newspapers in Pakistan. The computed index captures events of high uncertainty mainly triggered by events of economic distress in Pakistan, such as the high probability of sovereign default in April 2023. It also captures political and climate related events such as the ouster of the former prime minister Imran Khan in April 2022, and the devastating floods of July 2022. We test the information content of the computed index using a structural vector autoregression model, and find that it has a significant effect on macroeconomic variables of Pakistan's economy after controlling for important events such as the COVID-19 pandemic. The results remain robust to different checks applied during the course of the analysis.

AI.tldr: 这篇论文通过已基斯坦预主要英文报纸计算了已基斯坦的货币政策不确定性指数，该指数抓取了经济、政治和气候相关事件导致的不确定性。通过结构向量自回归模型验证，发现该指数对已基斯坦宏观经济变量有显著影响，结果稳健。
AI.research_question: 已基斯坦货币政策不确定性指数的构建方法是什么？该指数是否能够有效抓取实际事件导致的不确定性？它对已基斯坦宏观经济变量的影响如何？
AI.motivation: 已基斯坦经济面临着各种内部和外部冲击导致的高度不确定性，包括经济、政治和气候变化。建立一个量化的货币政策不确定性指数有助于理解这些不确定性对经济的影响机制。
AI.theoretical_framework: 货币政策不确定性理论，新闻报导指数构建方法，结构向量自回归(SVAR)模型
AI.method: 使用已基斯坦预主要英文报纸构建货币政策不确定性指数，通过SVAR模型检验指数的信息内容和对宏观经济变量的影响，并进行多种稳健性检验
AI.findings: 构建的指数有效抓取了经济困境(如2023年4月主权违约风险)、政治变动(如2022年4月前首相被骗退)和气候灾害(如2022年7月洪浴)导致的不确定性。SVAR分析显示该指数对已基斯坦宏观经济变量有显著影响，结果稳健
AI.theory_contributions: 提供了开发中国家货币政策不确定性指数的方法论，扩展了不确定性测量理论在不同经济环境下的应用
AI.practical_contributions: 为已基斯坦政府、中央银行和投资者提供了量化货币政策不确定性的工具，有助于更好地预测和应对经济、政治和环境冲击导致的经济风险

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The author declares no known competing financial interests or personal relationships that could have appeared to influence the work reported in this paper. The author has no affiliations with any stablecoin issuers, banking institutions, or regulatory agencies discussed in this paper.
declarations.ethicsApproval: This study did not involve human participants, personal data, or experiments requiring ethics committee approval. All information used in the analysis is derived from publicly available laws, regulations, policy documents, and secondary sources.

detail.abstract: This paper presents a doctrinal and policy analysis of regulatory arbitrage in cross-border stablecoin lending across the Asia-Pacific (APAC) during 2024-2025. It examines how divergences in banking and payments law, licensing thresholds, prudential treatment, and AML/CFT obligations create incentives for platforms to structure lending across jurisdictions. The study analyses official frameworks and events including: Singapore's single-currency stablecoin regime (15 Aug 2023); Hong Kong's Stablecoins Ordinance effective 1 Aug 2025 and the HKMA licensing pathway; Labuan FSA's Admissibility Framework for Digital Currencies (30 Dec 2024); Japan's 2023 amendments to the Payment Services Act enabling bank/trust issuance; Australian proposals for digital asset platform licensing (Treasury 2025); FATF's June 2025 update to Recommendation 16 (Travel Rule); and Basel's final standards for cryptoasset exposures. We develop a comparative matrix, enforcement/milestones timeline, corridor-specific conflict analysis, and reform proposals centred on licensing passporting, uniform Travel Rule triggers, and Basel-aligned prudential treatment for stablecoin lending exposures.

AI.tldr: 本文对2024-2025年亚太地区跨境稳定币借贷的监管套利进行了教义和政策分析，研究了银行支付法、许可门槛、审慎监管和反洗钱义务的差异如何激励平台进行跨司法管辖区的借贷结构安排。

AI.method: 教义分析法、政策分析法、比较矩阵构建、时间线分析、走廊冲突分析
AI.findings: 亚太地区各司法管辖区在稳定币监管方面存在显著差异，包括新加坡的单币种稳定币制度、香港的稳定币条例、日本支付服务法修正案等，这些差异为平台提供了监管套利机会。

detail.abstract:
Artificial Intelligence (AI) has transitioned from experimental innovation to a foundational infrastructure that underpins national economies, institutional functions, and societal interactions. As of 2024, over 80% of enterprises globally deploy AI across core business processes (McKinsey Global Survey, 2024), and AI integration into public services and education is accelerating rapidly (OECD AI Policy Observatory, 2023). This pervasive adoption has made AI not merely a tool but a systemic agent of change—affecting everything from healthcare diagnostics to border control and school assessments. However, with rising deployment comes rising complexity and risk. According to PwC’s Global AI Study (2024), 72% of reported AI-related failures stem not from flawed algorithms, but from organizational governance gaps—such as unclear roles, absent risk protocols, and non-existent stakeholder redress mechanisms. Meanwhile, regulatory frameworks like the EU AI Act (Regulation 2024/1689), ISO/IEC 42001:2023, and the EU Data Act (Regulation 2023/2854) are raising the bar for legal compliance, transparency, and accountability. 

Against this backdrop, this whitepaper introduces AIGN OS—the world’s first certifiable AI Governance Operating System. AIGN OS is a governance infrastructure engineered to be auditable, modular, and globally applicable. Its seven-layer architecture operationalizes governance logic across the AI lifecycle: from principle to protocol, from compliance to certification. By integrating six sector-specific frameworks (including education, SMEs, and agentic AI), AIGN OS enables organizations to move beyond static templates and implement live governance systems.

More than a framework, AIGN OS is a verifiable trust infrastructure that makes responsible AI measurable, certifiable, and ready for regulatory inspection. It provides a unified system to align legal duties, technical oversight, cultural readiness, and stakeholder accountability—closing the gap between principle and practice. With real-world pilots in government agencies, universities, and multinational enterprises, AIGN OS marks a paradigm shift: from fragmented compliance to systemic governance-by-design.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了AIGN OS——世界上第一个可认证的AI治理操作系统，旨在解决AI部署中的组织治理差距问题，通过七层架构实现从原则到协议、从合规到认证的全生命周期治理。
AI.research_question: 如何构建一个可审计、模块化且全球适用的AI治理基础设施，以解决组织治理差距并满足日益严格的监管要求？
AI.motivation: 随着AI的广泛部署，80%的企业在核心业务流程中使用AI，但72%的AI相关失败源于组织治理差距，而非算法缺陷，同时欧盟AI法案等监管框架提高了合规要求。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于AI治理理论、风险管理理论和合规框架理论，整合了欧盟AI法案、ISO/IEC 42001:2023等监管标准。
AI.method: 设计了七层架构的AIGN OS操作系统，整合六个行业特定框架，通过政府机构、大学和跨国企业的实际试点进行验证。
AI.findings: AIGN OS能够实现可测量的负责任AI，提供统一的系统来协调法律职责、技术监督、文化准备和利益相关者问责，弥合原则与实践之间的差距。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了世界上第一个可认证的AI治理操作系统理论框架，实现了从碎片化合规到系统性设计治理的范式转变。
AI.practical_contributions: 为组织提供了可审计的治理基础设施，使负责任AI变得可测量、可认证并准备好接受监管检查，适用于教育、中小企业和代理AI等多个行业。

title: The United Kingdom, Canada, and France Must Recognize Kurdistan’s Statehood
affiliations: Middle East Forum

detail.title: The United Kingdom, Canada, and France Must Recognize Kurdistan’s Statehood

keywords: Right of Self-Determination of Ethnic Minorities in the Middle East

detail.abstract: For over a century, the Kurds—one of the world’s largest stateless nations—have been denied the right to self-determination. While Western powers prepare to recognize Palestinian statehood, they remain silent on Kurdistan, despite the Kurds meeting every criterion for sovereignty and sacrificing tens of thousands of lives fighting terrorism. International law speaks of “all peoples” having this right, yet the Kurds are excluded, their cause ignored in the UN, ICJ, and ICC. This double standard exposes the hypocrisy of states that preach freedom but refuse to apply it consistently. If the world can champion Palestine, why not Kurdistan?

AI.tldr: 这篇论文通过对比巴勒斯坦和库尔德独立问题的异同待遇，揭露国际社会在自治权问题上的双重标准和假伪性
AI.research_question: 为什么国际社会在库尔德人民自治权问题上存在双重标准，并忽视库尔德满足主权国家所有标准的事实？
AI.motivation: 库尔德作为世界上最大的无国家民族之一，一直被拒绝自治权，而同时西方国家却准备承认巴勒斯坦独立，这种双重标准需要被揭露和批判
AI.theoretical_framework: 国际法中的人民自治权理论，国家主权理论，国际关系中的双重标准和假伪性分析
AI.method: 对比分析法，将库尔德与巴勒斯坦的情况进行系统对比，包括满足主权国家标准的程度、参与反恐主义战斗的贡献等
AI.findings: 国际社会在库尔德自治权问题上存在明显的双重标准，库尔德满足所有主权国家标准但被忽视，而联合国、国际法院和国际刑事法院等机构都忽视这一问题
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了国际法中人民自治权的论述，揭露了国际政治中的选择性道义和政治策略性利益考量
AI.practical_contributions: 提高了对库尔德问题的公众认知，为库尔德人民主张自治权提供了理论支撑，对国际社会的双重标准行为构成批判

detail.abstract: We study the impact of financial sector reform, namely financial and capital account liberalizations on saving, investment, and economic growth in Indonesia. Analyzing data up to the pre-pandemic (COVID-19) period, e.g. from 1980-2019 and using the ARDL bounds test approach, we found that long-run gross domestic saving rate and gross fixed investment in Indonesia are explained by real GDP and lagged real GDP, respectively; long-run economic growth is largely explained (positively) by physical capital, labor force, and net capital inflows. It is evident from our study that the financial and capital account openness indicators, real interest rate and net capital inflows respectively, do not impact saving and investment in long-run. At the same time, the financial openness indicator does not seem to have any influence on long-run economic growth. Overall, the effects of financial and capital account liberalizations on saving, investment, and economic growth in Indonesia were rather mixed. Based on this, we suggest some policy implications for Indonesia.

AI.tldr: 金融部门改革和资本帐户开放对印度尼西亚的储蓄、投资和经济增长影响混合，金融开放指标在长期中对经济增长无显著影响

AI.motivation: 研究金融开放政策在发展中国家的实际效果，为政策制定提供实证基础

title: Algorithmic Lords: Digital Feudalism and the Collapse of Hierarchy
affiliations: Rutgers Business School - Rutgers University

detail.title: Algorithmic Lords: Digital Feudalism and the Collapse of Hierarchy
detail.abstract: This article theorizes the rise of "digital feudalism," a novel mode of organizational and societal power, as artificial intelligence and platform technologies fundamentally restructure the logic of hierarchy, work, and democratic agency. Contrary to early promises of digital disintermediation and democratized organizations, we show how algorithmic management collapses traditional managerial layers while replacing visible authority with opaque, centralized control exercised by platform owners and algorithm designers-modern "digital lords." Through a critical synthesis of organization theory, platform capitalism, and debates on techno-feudalism, the paper examines how data abundance and algorithmic rule abolish the roles of human mediators, assign workers to a new status of "algorithmic vassalage," and subvert classic mechanisms of autonomy, accountability, and collective action. Case vignettes from gig platforms, corporate HR, and social media detail the concrete mechanisms through which algorithmic governance erodes voice, manufactures consent, and encloses opportunities within proprietary infrastructures. We further analyze the resulting "democratic time lag"-the growing gap between fast-moving algorithmic institutions and slower, human-centered democratic or regulatory systems. By tracing how digital platforms entrench dependency and inequality at machine speed, we argue that the collapse of hierarchy is not a story of worker emancipation, but of renewed subjugation in new, less visible forms. The article concludes by surveying emerging strategies for organizational governance, digital democracy, and resistance-emphasizing the urgent role for organizational studies in exposing hidden power, theorizing alternatives, and supporting institutional adaptation as the social contract is rewritten in the age of AI.

AI.tldr: 这篇论文提出"数字封建制"概念，论证了AI和平台技术如何通过算法管理替代传统管理层，形成不透明的集中控制，使工人转化为"算法附属"，損害自主性、责任制和集体行动机制，导致民主制度延迟问题，并探讨了相应的组织治理和抵抗策略。
AI.research_question: 人工智能和平台技术如何根本性地重构了组织和社会权力的逻辑，形成了什么样的新垄式组织权力？
AI.motivation: 质疑早期关于数字去中介化和组织民主化的说法，目的在于揭示算法管理实质上如何造成了更为雷同和不可见的中央控制形式，以及这种变化对工人自主性、责任制和集体行动的消极影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 组织理论、平台资本主义、技术封建制辩论，重点分析算法管理如何替代传统管理层级，形成不透明的集中控制。
AI.method: 批判性综合分析方法，通过合成组织理论、平台资本主义和技术封建制辩论，并使用离散工作平台、企业HR和社交媒体的案例例证来详细描述具体机制。
AI.findings: 算法管理替代了传统管理层，但形成了更为不透明的集中控制；数据丰富性和算法规则消除了人类中介者的角色；工人被赋予"算法附属"新身份；经典的自主性、责任制和集体行动机制被突破；产生了"民主制度延迟"问题。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了"数字封建制"新概念，为理解AI和平台技术重构组织权力的方式提供了新视角；丰富了组织理论对技术权力的分析；推进了关于技术封建制的辩论。
AI.practical_contributions: 揭示了算法管理对工人权利的威胁；为组织治理、数字民主和抵抗提供了实践建议；强调了组织学研究在暴露隐藏权力、理论化替代方案和支持制度适应方面的紧迫作用。

title: Idiosyncratic Skewness and Market Timing of Capital Structure Decisions
affiliations: Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz Universität Hannover and Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz Universität Hannover

detail.title: Idiosyncratic Skewness and Market Timing of Capital Structure Decisions

declarations.funderStatement: Substantial parts of this study have been developed during a research stay in Jacksonville, Alabama, and have been (partially) sponsored by the Graduate Academy of the Leibniz University Hannover.

detail.abstract: We investigate the impact of market timing on capital structure by employing idiosyncratic skewness as a proxy for firm-specific mispricing. Consistent with the market timing theory, idiosyncratic skewness is significantly positively related to equity issues, while the impact on debt issues is negative and of less importance. Moreover, we find equity issues to be accompanied by debt retirement programs. Contrasting the market timing theory, these effects are not persistent and vanish after about three years. Both the short-term and long-term results are robust to a wide range of robustness checks. Our results are therefore consistent with a long-term validity of the trade-off theory, including market timing as a short-term factor.

AI.tldr: 本文通过特异偏度作为企业特定定价偏差的代理指标，研究了市场时机对资本结构的影响。结果显示市场时机效应是短期的，而交易成本理论在长期保持有效。
AI.research_question: 市场时机对资本结构的影响如何？特异偏度作为定价偏差代理指标的效果如何？
AI.motivation: 检验市场时机理论的有效性，以及它与交易成本理论在资本结构决策中的相互作用

AI.method: 实证分析方法，使用特异偏度作为主要解释变量，进行多种稳健性检验

title: Probabilistic Forecasting and Curtailment-Aware Trading in the Dutch Balancing Market
affiliations: Erasmus University Rotterdam (EUR) - Erasmus School of Economics (ESE), Erasmus University,  Rotterdam (EUR) - Erasmus School of Economics , Econometric Institute, Erasmus University Rotterdam (EUR) - Erasmus School of Economics (ESE) and Erasmus University Rotterdam (EUR) - Erasmus School of Economics (ESE)

detail.title: Probabilistic Forecasting and Curtailment-Aware Trading in the Dutch Balancing Market
detail.abstract: The increasing share of intermittent renewable energy sources in electricity systems has heightened the importance of balancing markets. In the Netherlands, where renewable sources accounted for over 50% of electricity production in 2024, imbalance prices have become especially erratic due to a unique dual pricing mechanism and growing grid congestion. Despite this, the Dutch balancing market remains underexplored in academic research. This paper addresses that gap by developing and evaluating short-term probabilistic forecasting models specifically designed for the Dutch context. Using historical imbalance and intraday prices, we compare three approaches: a naive benchmark, a LASSO-estimated autoregressive model (LEAR), and an extreme gradient boosting (XGBoost) model trained for quantile-based forecasting. Rather than focusing solely on forecast accuracy, we embed the predictions into a stylized trading framework that allocates volumes between the intraday and balancing markets. This framework also incorporates curtailment, a critical operational measure now prevalent across the Dutch grid. Our findings show that while XGBoost delivers better probabilistic calibration, the LEAR model more effectively identifies price spikes, resulting in superior performance in certain trading strategies. Forecast-informed trading yields up to 13% higher revenues, and the inclusion of curtailment enhances profitability by removing downside risk. The results highlight that imbalance prices can be forecasted effectively, and incorporating these forecasts into trading strategies can yield significant financial benefits. However, high statistical forecast accuracy does not always translate into superior financial outcomes.

AI.tldr: 本文开发了荷兰平衡市场的短期概率预测模型，比较了三种方法并嵌入交易框架，发现预测指导的交易可带来13%的收益提升，但高统计预测精度不一定转化为更好的财务结果。
AI.research_question: 如何为荷兰平衡市场开发有效的短期概率预测模型，并将这些预测应用于交易策略中以获得财务收益？
AI.motivation: 荷兰可再生能源占比超过50%，导致平衡价格异常波动，但学术研究对此市场关注不足，需要专门针对荷兰双定价机制和电网拥堵的预测模型。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于概率预测理论、时间序列分析（自回归模型）和机器学习（XGBoost），结合电力市场交易理论。
AI.method: 使用历史不平衡价格和日内价格数据，比较三种方法：朴素基准、LASSO估计的自回归模型（LEAR）和用于分位数预测的XGBoost模型，并嵌入包含限电措施的交易框架进行评估。
AI.findings: XGBoost具有更好的概率校准，但LEAR模型能更有效识别价格尖峰，在某些交易策略中表现更优；预测指导的交易可带来13%的收益提升，包含限电措施可增强盈利能力。
AI.theory_contributions: 填补了荷兰平衡市场研究的空白，提出了专门针对双定价机制和电网拥堵的预测框架，揭示了统计预测精度与财务结果之间的非对称关系。
AI.practical_contributions: 为市场参与者提供了有效的交易策略工具，展示了如何将预测模型实际应用于平衡市场交易，并通过包含限电措施来管理下行风险。

title: Digitalization and Environmental Sustainability: Evidence from Selected BRICS Economies
affiliations: Nelson Mandela University

detail.title: Digitalization and Environmental Sustainability: Evidence from Selected BRICS Economies
detail.abstract: Information and communication technology (ICT) has become a dominant tool for disseminating information and knowledge in the 21st century by enabling faster communication, making research easy, facilitating skill acquisition, making international collaborations much easier, and acting as a catalyst for business operations. However, the use of ICT has raised environmental concerns, due to the increased consumption of ICT. This study examined the effect of ICT on carbon emissions in selected BRICS economies between 2009 and 2022. To adopt the appropriate estimation techniques, panel unit tests (LLC and IPS) were conducted. The tests revealed a mixed sequence of integrations between the variables, i.e. I (0) and I (1). This necessitates the use of panel ARDL estimation techniques. Using the PMG (pooled mean group) estimator, the panel ARDL was selected as the appropriate model for this study. The FMOLS (fully modified ordinary least squares) and FE (Fixed effects) methods were also utilized in this study as part of the robustness assessment. The findings from the panel long-run ARDL reveal that ICT, national output, and financial development increase emissions, while innovation reduces them. Furthermore, the findings from FMOLS and FE confirm the results obtained from ARDL. Therefore, this study recommends using green technology to achieve net-zero emissions, reducing our digital carbon footprint on an individual and societal level, and scaling adaptation while reducing global emissions as a means of improving environmental sustainability within BRICS nations.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了ICT对BRICS国家碳排放的影响，发现ICT、国家产出和金融发展会增加排放，而创新会减少排放。建议使用绿色技术、减少数字碳足迹来实现净零排放。
AI.research_question: ICT对BRICS经济体碳排放的影响是什么？
AI.motivation: ICT在21世纪成为信息传播的主要工具，但其使用增加了环境担忧，特别是碳排放问题
AI.theoretical_framework: 环境经济学、ICT影响理论、碳排放理论
AI.method: 面板数据分析（2009-2022年BRICS数据），使用面板单位根检验（LLC和IPS）、面板ARDL模型、PMG估计器，以及FMOLS和FE方法进行稳健性检验
AI.findings: ICT、国家产出和金融发展会增加碳排放，而创新会减少碳排放。FMOLS和FE方法的结果与ARDL结果一致
AI.theory_contributions: 提供了ICT与环境影响关系的新证据，丰富了环境经济学理论，特别是在新兴经济体背景下
AI.practical_contributions: 为BRICS国家制定环境政策提供依据，建议采用绿色技术、减少数字碳足迹、实现净零排放的具体措施

title: "Measured as Criminals and Labeled as Tea": Surveillance Under Chinese Exclusion
affiliations: Georgetown University Law Center

detail.title: "Measured as Criminals and Labeled as Tea": Surveillance Under Chinese Exclusion
detail.abstract:
In 1875, Congress passed the Page Act—one of the earliest federal immigration laws in the United States-beginning a long period of federal immigration law that facilitated heavy scrutiny of Chinese immigrants and excluded most Chinese people from the U.S. From then until nearly a century later, Chinese exclusion was federal law. Even as millions of European immigrants arrived, settled, and naturalized, the vast majority of would-be Chinese immigrants were systematically barred from coming to the U.S.

In addition to passing a series of highly restrictive race-based laws to carry out Chinese exclusion, the U.S. also built and operated a massive government apparatus to document and surveil Chinese Americans. Treated as perpetual outsiders, the few Chinese people who were permitted to migrate to the U.S. were categorically photographed, measured, interrogated, and required to prove their right to exist in the United States through extensive documentation and external validation by white witnesses. Many Chinese Americans suffered constant invasions of their privacy that generated perpetual fears and significant harms over the course of entire lifetimes. These measures not only restricted Chinese Americans' movement and livelihood but also reinforced a racialized framework of suspicion.

This Article offers a comprehensive overview of surveillance under Chinese exclusion in the U.S. and draws connections between past and present, situating Chinese exclusion surveillance within the broader history of state surveillance targeting marginalized populations. In doing so, it sheds light on the longstanding use of privacy erosion as a tool of racial oppression, and highlights harms and themes of surveillance under Chinese exclusion that echo into the present day.

AI.tldr: 本文系统分析了1875年《佩奇法案》开启的美国排华时期监控体系，揭示了联邦政府如何通过系统性监控、文件要求和种族化审查机制对华人移民进行压迫，并探讨了这种历史监控模式与当代监控实践的连续性。
AI.research_question: 美国排华时期的监控体系如何运作？这种历史性的监控实践与当代监控机制有何联系？
AI.motivation: 填补对排华时期系统性监控研究的空白，揭示隐私侵蚀作为种族压迫工具的历史延续性，为理解当代监控实践提供历史视角。
AI.theoretical_framework: 批判种族理论、监控研究理论、移民法律史、隐私权理论
AI.method: 历史文献分析、法律文本解读、档案研究、比较历史分析
AI.findings: 排华时期建立了全面的政府监控机制，包括强制拍照、身体测量、审讯、文件证明和白人证人制度，这些措施不仅限制华人行动自由，还强化了种族化的怀疑框架，造成终身性的心理伤害。
AI.theory_contributions: 拓展了监控研究的种族维度，提出了隐私侵蚀作为系统性种族压迫工具的理论框架，建立了历史监控与当代实践的理论连接。
AI.practical_contributions: 为当代移民政策和监控实践提供历史警示，为华人社区争取权益提供历史依据，为政策制定者理解监控的种族化后果提供参考。
